story_0-0-0.text: Yotsuyu and Kaede, both in white dresses, confront each other in a mysterious, ethereal space...
Why!? Kaede!?
Yotsuyu's dress morphs into a deep crimson...
Why do we have to fight each other!?
Because we chose to walk different paths-
Because for those who were chosen by the Fruit of Chaos, there is no other path but that of conflict-
But I'm still me!
And you're still you, Kaede!
Yotsuyu......
Kaede turns to face Yotsuyu...
Alice, long hidden from sight, shall become the Red Queen...
But before then...
Yotsuyu's consciousness returns to the battlefield...
What...was that!?
Why was, Kaede and I...?

Where am... I...?
Where is... everyone...?
Kaede, Kaede! Please respond!
This is Yotsuyu! Can anyone respond to me?
Sitara! Fumika! Miss Yumi!
Rin! Rei! Is anyone there!?
Commander! Aika! Ayaka! Talk to me! Anyone!
*static* Yots...yu? Yotsuyu...that you?
Kaede! Where are you?
Where's everyone? Are they alright!?
*static* Hordes...Vice...assaulted the Shard...destroyed...at our limit.......
Kaede!?
This is a story set in the far future, of Actresses: maidens wielding the power of Alice Gear to protect humanity.
Some time ago...
Yotsuyu pumps herself up and enters the Narukozaka building...
I'm Hirasaka Yotsuyu, a newbie Actress!
I'll be working here at Narukozaka Manufacturing starting today!
I'm 15 this year with an Actress license, and in my first year of high school right now!
Looking forward to working with everyone!

Narukozaka's Newbie Actress
Hirasaka Yotsuyu
You're a Narukozaka representative, right?

commands.command: Not exactly.

items.text: Eeeeeh!?
You weren't a senior staff member?

commands.command: I'm new here too.

items.text: For real!?
I'm so sorry!
I thought I heard an Actress Commander would be here today, I must've gotten it mixed up!

story_0-0-0.text: Kaneshiya Sitara here, nice to meet'cha~

Narukozaka's Boisterous Geek
Kaneshiya Sitara
I'm Momoshina Fumika.

Carrot, Stick and Encyclopedia
Momoshina Fumika
I see you two are the newbie Actress Yotsuyu, and our commander from today onwards, respectively.
I've heard from the Director about you two.
Your name was...what was it...
Sitara presents to you a smartphone-esque device.
Here you go, your very own AEGiS Terminal~
Just register your name on here real quick-
You do as told.
Alrighty, OK~
Through this device, you may accept Vice combat contracts from AEGiS at your discretion.
Now then, let's take a job and get out there right now~
Yotsuyu's here with us too, may as well!
Yes! Please treat me well!
Yotsuyu dons a Combat Suit.
Ooh~, freakin' cute! Anyways, let's have the Commander decide our Gear.
Yotsuyu equips a full loadout selected by you.
Oooh~ Looking sharp~! Now then, let's get you started on the sortie~
And so, the three Actresses sortie into open space...
Welcome to the Tutorial System, designed for newbies just like you!
Let’s start with basic movement!
Click and drag, or use control keybinds, to move.
Now, let’s give it a try!
Yotsuyu moves to the waypoint.
Well done! Is this talent I see?
Acquired targets will have a lock-on HUD overlay over them.
Press X or click to shoot at the target.
Yotsuyu fires at the Clios, destroying it.
Amazing! Feeling good from your first Vice takedown?
When an enemy gets close, respond with your Melee Weapon!
Press C or click the Melee button to hit enemies in range.
Yotsuyu destroys the Tachypli with her sword.
Hold X or left click, then tap/click again to use your firearm's Charged firing mode.
Charged shots are powerful attacks that vary between different firearms.
This Rifle you're holding is able to lock onto multiple targets and fire at them simultaneously.
Yotsuyu spools up her Rifle's charged fire and unleashes it on the three Elflow, destroying them at the same time.
And that was the basic Tutorial. We wish you a good Actress life!
This program was brought to you by Yashima Heavy Industries, advanced tech you can trust.
Y'know, this is my first time actually fighting. Am I doing this right?
Ah, yeah, you're all good~
An Actress with Alice Gear on can't be beat!
You're doing fine.
After all, only small Vice are expected to appear during this contract.
Doesn't get more "small fry" than this!
Got it! Hirasaka Yotsuyu, ready for anything!
Good~! That's the spirit, yup!
A Serpent appears...
Woah! Wh-wha!? What's going on?
Waha~! A Boss! It's happening-!
An irregular Heavy-class Vice. It's a chance for bonus pay.
Make sure to take it down!

Roger dodger~ ♪
Target in my sights~
Just have to smash it, then! Roger that!
After the sortie...
Aha, glad we managed to get through that one~
When that big Vice came out, I really didn't know what to do for a second.
It has been a while since our last Heavy-class engagement. The company will benefit from this too.
Think we'll get a special bonus~?
An envelope of cash! Maybe even a big bag of gold!
You're expecting too much there.
Erm...was what we did really all that impressive?
Well, us two have been running things by ourselves until now, so it wasn't as easy.
Glad to hear that I've been pulling my weight as a newbie so far.
Still though, can't believe you guys pulled a boss for your first job. You and the Commander must have some powerful luck, Yotsuyu!
Narukozaka's future is lookin' up!
This just in:
We have breaking news regarding the once prestigious Narukozaka Manufacturing.
Oooh!? We've already made headlines-
Narukozaka, which has been financially unstable in recent times...
...is now being considered for acquisition by Murakumo Industries, a member of the Yashima Group.
There are views that this could be a decisive maneuver to unify the Actress industry once and for all.
The headline takes local newspapers by storm...
"Murakumo Proposes Acquisition of Narukozaka"
"Actress Industry Restructuring In Progress"
"Is Narukozaka...GOING DOWN!?"
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?

story_1-1-1.text: Welcome to today's Pickup Actress corner.
As always, I'm your host, Usamoto Anna.
Our guest today, Agatsuma Kaede, is currently in the third year of her Actress career.
I believe this is your second year with your current team?
Yes, that is true.
During this season, your Vice takedown rate has been at the top among Actress teams, far beyond any others.
And that's not all—your personal performance has also been impressive. I dare say you'll be setting a new monthly takedown record soon.
Say, what's the secret to this amazing streak of yours?
It's all thanks to the support from Rin and Rei... er, my teammates, and the agency.
Your agency is Murakumo Industries, the company headquartered in Sasazuka with its own in-house Gear manufacturing, yes?
Correct.
I hear they have been doing very well lately, what with their recent announcement to purchase their industry peer Narukozaka Manufacturing-
Is that so?
Murakumo has been treating me well, and I would like to repay that favor.
Finally, many people look to you as the leading Actress of a new generation. Would you like give us a word or two on that sentiment?
As an Actress, I still have a long way to go.
I would like to gradually hone my skills and perform well to meet the expectations placed upon me.

Ah~
How amazing~
Agatsuma Kaede, huh...
We're about the same age, but she's a top Actress already!
...Yotsuyu. You're getting too close to the TV...

Ah-
Sorry
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
I can't shake the feeling that I've seen that person before...
From where, I wonder...
They're a pretty famous bunch y'know. Plenty of chances to see them around~
More importantly, Murakumo Industries!
And how they're about to pull a hostile merger on us!
What would happen to us if that came to pass?
Isn't it great, Fumika?
We're going to become Actresses for a famous company right away!
A modern day Cinderella story!
What are you even saying?!
Murakumo has Kaede and her team already.
If it was up to me, we'd immediately be laying off employees.
Of course, huh~
This is goodbye, Fumika...
I am talking about you here!
That aside, I hope you understand that nobody can say what will happen to us all.
Eh- Am I gonna get fired right after landing the job?
What's going to happen to us, Commander?

commands.command: I...don't think that'd just happen?

items.text:
Oh thank god...
That's good to hear!
I would prefer if you don't resort to such dubious reassurances.

commands.command: I don't know either but......maybe......

items.text: EEH!? Really?
Well, not like our Commander's been with us for very long, so it makes sense he doesn't know much.

story_1-1-1.text: I have a better source of information in mind!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area

Narukozaka Manufacturing Alice Gear Engineering Department Head
Iwata Souichirou
...so, yer grabbed the Commander and the Actresses and came straight to me?
I figured you, Mr. Iwata, would have known something with how long you have worked here.
You and the Director go way back, right?
Did the Director say anything about our current predicament?
Look, it's a big surprise to me too, the whole Murakumo merger deal.
Oi Aruto, yer heard 'bout any of this?

Department Engineer
Suzuki Aruto
Eeeeeeh!? How could I have known~?
No way I'd have known if even you didn't, gramps.
Yer got a point there......
Sorry yer wasted yer time comin' here, but that's how it is.
Dunno a thing about their management, but yer sure this isn't just one of those baseless rumors yer heard?
That's true! Thank god it's nothing to worry about.
......but you know?
Is it so wrong to say that we're having a hard time?
Look at this Combat Suit, can't you tell just how old it is?
Aren't we the only ones to still use the Type 88 at this point?
Speaking of which, that Combat Suit Kaede was wearing looked completely different, color and shape and all!
That is the newest Combat Suit model with a redesign from a famous designer.
And here we are, using something from 12 years ago...
I'm starting to think that this merger might not be such a bad thing...
The hell yer on 'bout yer uninformed whelps!
I'm tellin' yer, their basic performance aren't even much different!
"The Type 88 suit is pretty much perfect, and the reliability is nothing to scoff at."
"From a maintenance standpoint, it's much better to go with something we're all used to!"
"No need to burn all that money on yearly upgrades like the other idiots do!"
God knows how many times we've heard that spiel by now.
Anyways, that's how it's gonna be!
If yer got time to waste spoutin' nonsense, then go enhance your weapons and gear or somethin'!
......yessir.
......yessir.
......yessir.

story_1-1-11.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area

Head Engineer Iwata~
Did you make that Heavy-class detector we asked for?
'Course not! Yer think a miracle machine like that actually exists?!
The hell's this request anyways?!
Yer'all dreamin' in broad daylight now?!
Should've expected that...
Aww...
Nooo, not even O Head Engineer can help us? C'mon, I beg of you, our God of the Engineering Department!
Flatterin' me ain't gonna get yer anywhere.
In the first place, all that Vice research stuff's top secret at AEGiS.
Us civvies don't get jack for info.
It it was only a skills problem though then I woulda been able to do somethin' at least.
But this? Naw, nothin' I can do.

Auuugh...
Even Iwata, the God of the Engineering Department, can't save us...
Well, I do feel like this is more of a job for an inventor than a maintenance engineer.
Oh well~ In that case, let's pray to another God!
...which "other God?"
Ah, maybe the God of Invention?
Nah~
In times like these there's no other choice but to pray to Yotsuyu, O Goddess of Fortune!
Wha, me!?
Remember your debut battle? And that one sortie just earlier?
We came across Bosses both these times, right?
At the very least, you seem to have a better chance at encountering Heavy-class Vice than we do.
Haha~ you got me there.
But it's not like I know what to do either, y'know?
If it all goes well you'll be a goddess in my eyes!
I beg of you, O Vice Goddess!
Eeeh, I'm the Goddess of Vice now? Not Fortune?
Sitara, stop. That's too thoughtless no matter how you frame it.
Anyhow~ Let's go try our luck! Whatever happens, happens!

story_1-1-13.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Man, I sure didn't think we'd actually come across a Boss this time too~.
Happens once in a while, I'm sure, coincidences and all.
In the short time since Yotsuyu joined us, we have destroyed a whole three Heavy-class Vice,
Which has allowed us to instantly clear six months worth of debt!
So we're out of the woods now?
Is the company gonna be fine from now on?
Well, things should work out if we keep going at our current pace, no?
That being said, there are still the accumulated deficits up to this point, as well as the debt from investing in various equipment.
This just in, we just received some very good news to share!
Agatsuma Kaede, an Actress under Murakumo Industries...
...has just become the youngest to set a new monthly Heavy-class Vice takedown record!
As a beacon of hope for this generation of Actresses, it certainly doesn't look like Kaede's performance will stop here!
I'm sure her future will be one that we can all look forward to seeing!
On a related note, Murakumo currently leads in Vice takedown rate by a very significant margin.
Thanks to this, their finances have also been growing at a steady rate,
...and just recently, the company has announced that they are now in a position to become a majority shareholder in Narukozaka's board.
Stay tuned for more news on the Actress industry restructuring situation!
Right, it doesn't look like we can let our guards down just yet.
We're certainly not just going to sit quietly while Murakumo does as they please.
Let's keep on doing our best! And then some more!
Woohoo~! Here comes the spicy development!
A powerful and looming rival!
Friendship!
Effort!
Victory!
Could this mean I'm gonna awaken some secret power of my own next~?
Now hold on just a moment... Are you serious?
Well, kinda?
What's the harm? Let's all go for it together! Y'know, with a cheer!
Don't we have anything? Some kind of battlecry, like "Narukozaka fight on!" or so.
Something that get us united as one, spirits fired up, that sort of deal.
Nah, nothing like that. We're a company of the... liberal arts type, see?
We've never quite been heated enough to do something like that.
Eeeeh~ Why not?
Let's pump ourselves up to take down Murakumo~!
Aha~ Seeing Yotsuyu this fired up...
...Really makes me think she might just go and do something super reckless next.
Let's keep our calm and not lose sight of reality, alright?
Aww...
Well, let's just do what we can!
"What we can" as in avoiding the merger while knowing our limits, that is.
And we were getting ourselves pumped up and all...
Kind of a letdown...

story_1-1-3.text: I knew about how an Actress' job is to exterminate Vice and all,
but I didn't know they showed up this often.
Well, this stuff usually doesn't come up on the news, unless a Heavy-class plows through a city sector or something.
When it comes to smaller Vice, Tokyo Shard, by itself, deploys Actresses a few hundred times per year just to handle them.
A few hundred times per year... isn't that like almost once a day!?
And that is precisely what gives a civilian agency like us work to do.
Let's go get some kills and grab that bounty money!
Not "bounty money," Vice Combat Rewards and Official Subsidies.
And that money will go to the company as earnings?
And that is why we're heading out for more work, to help the company recover.
Uuuugh- I became an Actress to help people, and yet..

story_1-1-5.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Nnnh...
What's up Fumika? Why the long face?
Is something not going well?
To get to the point:
We are running at a <color=#f26b6bff>loss</color>!
A <color=#f26b6bff>loss</color>!?
A <color=#f26b6bff>loss</color>!?
Huh? We weren't making money at all?
We went out a good couple times, didn't we?
Yes.
We took down lots of Vice, didn't we?
We did.
Then why haven't we been making any profit?
Well, to put it simply...
Taking down smaller Vice isn't profitable.
Even if we take down a significant amount, we still wouldn't have earned much considering our expenses.
No way......
Ah, in that case, we'll just have to go after Heavy-class Vice instead.
I swear......you do realize how that's much easier said than done.
Murakumo's got an iron grip on all the Boss-fighting jobs in the area, see~
They're the uh...ah, the AEGiS Designated Contractor!
They have a no-bid contract with AEGiS Tokyo for Heavy-class combat missions.
Eeeh- how's that fair?
Wait, but didn't we take a Heavy-class down before?
That was an irregular appearance.
You see, a Heavy-class sometimes appears when smaller Vice are destroyed.
And those kinds of spontaneous occurrences are fair game.
So you're saying it's not a zero percent chance, right?
Commander! Let's take on more jobs!
Especially ones where it seems like a Heavy-class might show up later!
If only it would go as well as you say...
It'll all work out!
I certainly wish I could be as optimistic as you, Yotsuyu.
If we put in the effort, I'm sure something good will happen!
Yotsuyu comes up to you.
Commander, please!

story_1-1-7.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Well aren't yer doin' a great job! Pretty good fer just a beginner Actress!
Ahaha- it's all thanks to Sitara and Fumika's help, and support from everyone in the company~
Another big one today, eh?
How'd you do it?
That's like, two whole Heavy-class encounters in such a short time!
Never seen this kind of luck in the whole time I've been working here!
Oi Aruto!
Quit slackin' off and go contact the collectors already!
One step ahead of you~
Picked the company with the highest buy offer too!
The "collectors?"
A Heavy-class carcass can fetch quite the sum, as it happens.
People actually want that stuff?
It's desirable research material. Yenno, for the Vice eggheads.
Wow, really?
All this money from the AEGiS bounties and the collectors, makes me all giddy just thinking about it!
Hey, Mr. Iwata,
Let's get ourselves a new Gear diagnostics rig!
One of those fully automated ones!
Yer daft? An Emission scanner first, obviously!
I swear, all yer youngins only think 'bout taking the easy way.
Continuin' from before,
's not just the good pay,
All the experimental tech the boffins pass to us in return 's big too.
Always go for the Heavy-class Vice! That's the ironclad rule of the Actress business.
Back when we're at our best...
That money and tech was what let us develop our own gear, all by ourselves.
Narukozaka's glory days, indeed.
...'s all in the past now.
Can't we just go back to doing that?
Yeah, let's get to it!
Like-I-said, that's not possible~
We ain't even got the right to take Heavy-class jobs anymore.
Nnnh...
Just do yer usual stuff and look out for the big ones.
And make damn sure to put 'em to the grave when they come—don't let a single one slip away.
Got it!
If yer do, then get the hell back out there!
Standin' round's not gonna get anythin' done!

story_1-1-9.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Guess Heavy-class Vice don't show up that easily after all, huh.
We are relying on pure luck here. It's not surprising if none appears.
Rather, that is more usually the case.
That's right.
It's always the one thing you want that never shows up~
Like when you buy a whole bunch of snacks for the included toys, and all you get are dupes! Makes me wanna cry!
What are you even talking about anymore!?
Is there nothing we can do about this?
If there was, we would've been doing that already.
It would certainly be helpful if we could predict their appearances somehow...
That's it!
What is it this time?
Don't we just need a radar for this?
Well, the AEGiS early-warning grid includes radars, yes.
Those installations work to monitor the Shard's surroundings and alert AEGiS to Vice appearances.
Not that, a Heavy-class detector!
A "Vice Radar"!
If we get our hands one, we can find out exactly where a Heavy-class will show up!
That's great! We gotta use one!
Don't just make up something that doesn't exist!
It doesn't?
It doesn't, no. Probably just something that Sitara dreamed up.
No no no, hear me out here~ Surely Head Engineer Iwata can make one that works.
Aren't you expecting far too much out of him?
What are you saying? That's exactly where an engineer's talents would shine!
You know the staple scenes where the mechanics get their spotlight.
Like, "I figured you'd be needing this!"
And bam, the stuff's long been made, no surprise!
You've lost me at this point.
Well...it wouldn't hurt to at least send a request to Engineering, I suppose.
Alright, I see how it is! Time for Plan B then.
"Plan B"? What's that?
A backup plan. Well, in this case it would be her next proposal.
Though she probably said that without having even thought of anything. Am I wrong?
Sitara turns to you.
Commander, "The Plan", if you would.

commands.command: Alright, leave it to me.

items.text: Ooh ooh, what is it?
You don't have to play along with Sitara's absurdities, you know.

commands.command: "The Plan", as in...?

items.text: Gaaah~
Oooh, I'm so, so disappointed in you, Commander...
Here I was, trying to pass the stage to you since you were just standing there...

story_1-1-9.text: Figured we'd get to this point, so...
Allow me to reveal our Plan B!
If a Rare doesn't show up, we'll just keep going until we get one!
So it's back to that...
What, "throw enough mud at the wall and some will stick"?
A war's all about numbers, and a luck-based game is all about how many times you try, bro!
Who's your "bro"!?
Then, sis?
That's no better!
We are sortieing, now!

story_1-2-14.text: Welcome to "Today's Newsflash".
As always, I'm your host, Usamoto Anna.
Our first news of the day will be Murakumo's new equipment.
The company has revealed today an entirely new set of Weapon and Dress Gear models.
And according to official specification data, their performance far exceeds those of all previous designs.
We're looking at a revolution in Actress equipment here!
Indeed, these new products stand to upend the very concept of Alice Gear technology itself.
Seems like we can look forward to the exploits of Murakumo's Actresses from here on!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Sitara! Fumika! Check this out!
Kaede and her team are getting new equipment!
I saw, yes.
Murakumo sure has a lot of money to swing around if they can just pull out new gear like that.
Isn't it just the coolest!
I wanna get to use something like that one day...
Nnnh~ I can just dream of it~
Mhm, mhm.
Alright, alright.
Ghhh-! What's with the cold shoulder?
C'mon, show a bit more excitement-!
Hey Commander!
You saw the news too, right?

commands.command: I did, why...?

items.text: You want to try on cool gear like that too, right!?

commands.command: Yeah, for sure!

items.text: Wait, really!?
The, the Commander dressed up as an Actress!?
Are you for real?
Ahaha...
I feel a little bad now for starting this.

commands.command: That's a little...

items.text: Aw, I thought you'd understand for sure.
Please give it a try though!
I'm sure it'll look great on you!
Ah~hahaha...
That's impossible, you know.

story_1-2-14.text: Their Actresses are the best of the best, led by Kaede of all people!
And they're using powerful leading-edge equipment!
They got stylish designer-model Combat Suits too!
And furthermore! They have an officially-authorized monopoly on all Heavy-class Vice combat missions too!
I'm not seeing any way Narukozaka can win against all this!
No way! There's nothing we can lean on?
Fumika ponders.
No. Nothing.
Do we really have nothing left at all?
All we have left now...
...is our courage!
You're right! Let's beat them with our fighting spirit!
I swear, trying to act all cool, you two.
Do you seriously think for one moment that we can best Murakumo with courage and spirit alone?
Of course we can!
Let's do it!
Do it how?
Nnnh...
Nnnh...!
If you don't know, then use your head and think.
If you can't come up with anything, then get back to work.
Grr~ I'll show you~!
Fumika turns to you as you stare at her.
Wh-what is it, Commander?
It's not like I wanted to be the one to take their frustration or anything...
Honestly, this sort of thing should be your responsibility, Commander.

story_1-2-15.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Waaaah~ Mr. Head Engineer, the demon with glasses is bullying me~
Who're you calling a "demon with glasses"! That's slander!
Oh shut the 'ell up!
Don't bring yer stupid racket into the workplace 'ere!
Do something, Mr. Head Engineer~
Murakumo came out with some super strong new gear~
Aah? Hell's that?
Ah-! I've heard of that!
Murakumo's new product line! Exclusive stuff loaded to the brim with hyper-advanced tech!
Off-the-charts specs! That's what you're talking about, right~?
The internet's all over it too!
Sure's fast of 'em. Thought the stuff hadn't even been announced fer that long.
They ever proved those on-paper specs?
'Course they did!
If this gets fielded, we'll be seeing some exciting times!
Hmph, like hell the test results're enough.
If it's not reliable when yer push it to the brink, then it's too dangerous to be used!
Yer never know without gettin' yer own hands on it fer real.
C'mon, don't say that~ Make us something similar! You can, right~?
Yer think it's simple like that!?
Tech 'ere's too different from theirs, ain't nothin' gonna make up for that.
All we can do 'ere is build on existing tech.
So it's all about the insurmountable gap in capital at the end.
Don't think 'bout givin' up from the start, yer young'ins.
When it comes down to it, tech's only as good as whoever's usin' it.
If yer can't beat 'em in specs, do somethin' with yer skill!
If we could, we wouldn't be in our current predicament right now.
Then we just gotta make it up with courage!!
Fighting spirit!
There you go retreating into the same old willpower nonsense again!
Calm yer horses.
Murakumo's new models might look impressive 'n all, but.
Getting 'em Actresses used to the equipment is gonna take time.
How many hours yer think they'd need to get retrained with the new gear?
If yer got the time to worry about dumb stuff...
...then go get better with the gear yer already have!
Just like how Mr. Head Engineer put it! Let's get out there now!

story_1-2-17.text: Speaking of which, Murakumo sure has lots of money.
And enough to buy us out~
Hey! We haven't been bought out just yet!
Look, back in the day Narukozaka was quite amazing too.
My parents are big Narukozaka fans, so I've always heard a lot about the company from them.
How the Actresses here were sensational, and how the equipment developed here flew off the shelves.
So, pretty much how Murakumo's like right now?
Head Engineer Iwata talked about this too!
Apparently Murakumo was even one of our subcontractors back in the day!
Wow, our company's pretty amazing too, huh!
...it's all history now, from long before we joined.
And now, oh, how the turns have tabled.
Don't say it like it's not your business.
Then we'll just have to keep up the effort!

story_1-2-19.text: Today we've got an exclusive pre-sortie interview with none other than Miss Agatsuma Kaede!
Let's hear what she has to share about Murakumo's new gear!
Handing off to our field reporter:
...Huh?
Can we have a word on the new equipment announced by your company recently?
...Right now?
Umm... It hasn't been issued to us yet, so I don't know much about it.
Any comments on its advanced technology and groundbreaking nature?
I am afraid that I am unfamiliar with its technical aspects.
But...
As an Actress, I will perform to the absolute best of my abilities, no matter the equipment.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
That's a humble honor student right there, alright!
Got her head perfectly on her shoulders even with that new gear!
Just what I'd expect from Miss Kaede!
I swear, if only she could just be a little more careless.
No matter how hard we work, it just doesn't feel like we'll ever catch up.
Mhm, this is going great~
Which part of this is going great!?
"It's all over!"
"There's no way out of this pinch!"
That's the kind of situation where it's standard for the protags to make a comeback, y'see~
And how exactly would one make said comeback?
Well, that responsibility falls onto Fumika, obviously.
Why me!? Shouldn't it be on the Commander?
Because that's just what glasses girls do?
My eyesight has nothing to do with this!
Well then, secret weapon time!
A secret weapon! We've got something like that?
Just so you know, I'd rather not submit another strange request and make the Head Engineer angry again.
No no no, not that kind of secret weapon. I'm talking a hidden hand our enemies can't even begin to think of.
This is the point where a transfer student enters the story and turns it all around!
A transfer student?
I'm talking about you, Yotsuyu!
But I haven't transferred schools at all.
Transfer student, new employee, same thing really.
Is that how it works?
Don't bother taking what she said seriously.
Soooo with all that said, isn't our victory inevitable?
If we go by how the world works, we're basically guaranteed to win!
For the love of... give it a rest already.
But hey, that helped cheer me up at least!
If I do my best, Narukozaka will be fine too, right?
Let's get going then!
Yotsuyu leaves to prepare for sortie...
Eheheh~ Reality doesn't go as smoothly as that, though.
You of all people have no right to say that.

story_1-2-21.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Another Heavy-class showed up this time.
...This is something to be happy about, right?
Of course it is! We took it down without a hitch!
It helps from a company perspective too.
There's been complete radio silence from the Director, but we do still need significant funds to resist the merger.
There should be no harm in good company performance, either.
To sum it up:
Just gotta take out more and more Vice and rack up that score~
Let's throw ourselves at it!
Easily understood!
Just gotta keep it up!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Alice Gear Maintenance Center
Gramps! We're stretched thin over here too!
Yer numbskull! Is all yer can do complain?
With more Actresses going out more often we'll need to do maintenance more, y'know.
Since the company's been doing better lately, can we start using the room over there too?
Never thought I'd see the day when we'd be needin' the high-level stuff in the Alice Gear Maintenance Room again.
's been 7 years, huh...
Less reminiscing and more unlocking that door, if you would~
Shut yer ass up! I'll go open it now!
Now stop slackin' and go tell the girls already!

story_1-2-23.text: I suppose it's unreasonable to expect a Heavy-class to appear every time.
Guess the "Vice Goddess Yotsuyu" bonus stage is over~
Uuu~ I told you I'm not some "Vice Goddess"~
Oh wow! That one was super freakin' cute!
I think that's enough, please, Sitara?
Since you're a god, how about "Lucky Girl God Yotsuyu"?
Um... I do everything from chores to errands around here, so...
That kind of title doesn't really fit me.
Alright, alright, enough idle chatter, we're going on another sortie.
We have to go for the smaller jobs too when there aren't any big ones!
What, there's only so much we can do.
Considering our capabilities and the company's situation, we don't exactly have another choice here...

commands.command: Just as Fumika said.

items.text: See.
Oh no!
Fumika went and brainwashed our Commander!
Eh? Really?
It's too late for him, Yotsuyu... He's already dancing to her tunes!
No way!
You must be kidding.

commands.command: I don't think that's the case.

items.text: What are you saying?
Do you even have any other plan to propose?
Well then, Commander! Bet you must've seen through our talents in full!
Does that mean we can do even better than we are right now?
If that's the expectation, then we really have to work as hard as we can.
I'll show you! My hidden talent or whatever!
Look at you, saying such irresponsible things again.
Not that I'm upset, though.

story_1-2-25.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Nnnnh...
Really does feel like a Heavy-class shows up every few sorties.
Our encounter and takedown rates have both increased since you joined us.
...Still, compared to Murakumo who gets the first pickings for these missions, these rates are just meager.
Sitara taps away at a workstation...
Lemme see-
Whoa! That's over 5 times the old energy gain!
What's this 'energy gain' you're speaking of...
What're you looking at?
A chart on Murakumo's financial performance.
Ours isn't too shabby either, but theirs is in a whole other world of their own.
While Narukozaka's performance is trending upwards slightly, Murakumo's drastic increases have no signs of stopping at all...
Seeing it laid out like this makes it all feel so much clearer~
I-indeed. Visualizing data is important.
Let's keep our heads high and keep it up!
If we can take down lots of big Vice, it'll all be fine!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
It'd be nice if a Heavy-class Vice would just show up...
Wait... Right, this isn't a good thing to wish for.
Since, if the Vice runs riot, wouldn't it be a problem for everyone?

commands.command: Yeah.

items.text: A world without the Vice would be the best, right?
Certainly.
Though that would leave us completely jobless too.
Well, us students do get to be a bit more carefree.
That being said, it would certainly be a problem for the Commander and the people at Narukozaka.
Commander...
Even though it would bring him unemployment...
...he, as a Commander, continued to wish for a world of peace...
Don't go and make up feelings for him to express.
In the first place, it's not as if the Vice would simply disappear from us wishing for it.

commands.command: Don't worry about it!

items.text: You're right!
No problem if we just take them down!
That's what Actresses are for!!

story_1-2-25.text: I beseech thee! Grant us Heavy-class encounters please!
Uuuh... Even if you pray like that...
I guess I can just chant "Show up~ Show up~" or something?
Turning to occultism... A symptom of the terminally desperate right there.

story_1-2-27.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Head Engineer-!
What-? Yer need me-?
Someone from Daily Tokyo AEGiS News came to meet you-!
Called herself Jinguji Mari-! What do we do-?
Ain't got time fer interviews! Send 'er away.
Mari barges in anyway...
You know that's not going to work on ol' me, Mr. Iwata?

The Photojournalist Zooming Across the Universe
Jinguji Mari
Wha... Hmph, it's you.
Thought I'd heard that name from somewhere before......
So yer a paparazzi or somethin' now?
At least call me a cameraman-journalist~
Surely you can spare some time for a lil' chat, at least?
For old times' sake?
......Just 5 minutes.
Oi! Everyone take ten!
Aight~
The other engineers go for their break...
I'm here today because I wanted your expert opinion as an engineer on something.
If it's about Murakumo's new tech then yer got the wrong person.
Go bother them about their own stuff instead.
C'mon, it's not like they'd give a straight answer even if I asked nicely~
So, how about it?
Whatever, but hell if I've any means of knowin'.
Ah, just what kind of research could've produced all that crazy advanced tech they showed off?
There are some that say regular R&D stuff don't go operational this quickly, y'know.
Must've got geniuses in their teams then.
Or, perhaps, "restricted research"...
...Who knows~? Not out of the question, wouldn't you say~?
Don't spit those kind of things lightly.
Think about it—if they illegally researched the Vice without AEGiS authorization...
...Then it wouldn't be a stretch for them to be able to develop revolutionary new gear, right?
Thought I told yer to go ask Murakumo.
What I'm saying isn't completely unfound, y'know~
Yer got any proof?
...No... 'course not.
Wouldn't be here talkin' to me if yer did.
Say, you know about the concept of "compliance"?
I might be old, but I ain't gone senile just yet.
Followin' the law, yeah?
Any good company person would know this stuff.
You see, in certain businesses that violate the law,
Their other sections start exploiting legal loopholes and such too.
Influenced by the company atmosphere, you could say.
Where're yer goin' with that?
Don't you think something feels off about Murakumo's rapid business growth?
Kinda unnatural for them to be taking down only Heavy-class Vice in such large quantities, no?
Just takin' advantage of their no-bid contract from AEGiS.
Shouldn't yer know this perfectly well already?
But that alone doesn't explain everything, now does it?
To take down a Heavy-class Vice, there has to be one that shows up in the first place.
Ever since Murakumo got their Designated Contractor status,
Do you know just how much more often Heavy-class Vice started showing up?
......what're yer sayin'?
I have a certain suspicion, you see.
About whether Murakumo is intentionally keeping some of the Vice in the Tokyo Shard perimeter alive,
Engineering a condition for Heavy-class Vice to increase in numbers...
Well, it's just a rumor from the Under-Shard anyways.
's nothin' but slander.
Keep makin' a fuss without proof and yer gonna get taken to court.
Guess you're right~
Don't worry about me though! I know full well what I'm doing~
See you for another chitchat next time~
Mari leaves...
How 'bout yer never come back!
......Swear t' god that idiot, riskin' to be someone she's not.
Mmnh...so what does all that mean?
Wait!
Does this mean......Kaede and her team were cheating?
Not just something made up by a gossip reporter?
"Don't trust the media! The truth is always somewhere on the internet!"
Ignoring Sitara being extreme as always,
Gaaah~
I don't know if there is any truth to this,
But, the possibility is there.
Wha......seriously!?
Well, without investigating...

story_1-3-28.text: Welcome to "Today's Newsflash".
In a recent update, Murakumo states that they plan on fielding their new equipment series as soon as possible.
Their representative Agatsuma Kaede has a few comments for us today:
We have already completed the necessary familiarization training.
Yes, that is correct.
We have been training in simulations even before the official announcement was made.
I would like to apologize for the silence up until now.
We are currently in the final adjustments phase.
We hope to be able to present results from actual combat soon.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Ooh~ Looks like they were all prepped up and ready to go.
Like, "Bring it on anytime you Vice scrapheaps!"
That sort of feel.
They're deploying the new gear already!?
Geez, they may as well just take out every single Vice out there at this point.
Still, Miss Kaede just doesn't strike me as the cheating kind!
Fumika turns to the two, away from her workstation.
I wouldn't be so sure about that.
Just now, I had a look through Murakumo's mission records on the AEGiS network.
What did you find out?
In summary...
There is a bias in their Heavy-class combat mission completion rates.
Erm... So what does that mean?
Well-
There's a bias in Murakumo's mission completion rates when it comes to Heavy-class Vice!
That's just a repeat of what Fumika said!
To put it more simply:
At the Command Center...
Murakumo's Heavy-class takedown rate within the Tokyo Shard interior during the past few years is 99.7%, almost 100%.
This covers the city airspace, industrial sectors, forests and mountain ranges, and finally, spaceport facilities.
On the other hand, their takedowns in the outer perimeter of the Shard were few and far between.
This of course includes the Shard's outer walls.
The outer walls... What that reporter mentioned...
About the rumor that Murakumo is allowing Heavy-class Vice to multiply undisturbed?
This would be the area in question, yes.
Wait, don't tell me!?
They did provide reasons for delaying their missions, at the very least, but...
"Target inactive. Low priority."
"Target missing. Investigation in progress."
...and such. Dozens of Heavy-class missions, put on hold or cancelled for similar reasons.
Rather unnatural, I am inclined to say.
Fumika turns to you.
Commander.
I believe this lead is worth investigating.
Kindly accept a mission to the Shard's outer walls for us, if you would?

story_1-3-29.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Do you think there's really Heavy-class Vice at the Shard's outer walls?
That's what we are sortieing for this time. To investigate.
Right now, it's still merely a rumor.
It could just be slander from those who are envious of Murakumo's growth.
And perhaps there are valid reasons for the delays and cancellations of the Heavy-class missions as well.
I guess there's that.
In any case, there's nothing bad about not finding any Heavy-class Vice there.
That would clear our suspicions of Murakumo at the very least.
You're right!
But, if there are lots and lots of Heavy-class Vice there...
Then what that reporter, Jinguji, told us suddenly becomes that much more credible.
Hence, we need to make sure.
Got it!
Sitara creeps up...
..."Let's make sure."...
Said Fumika, as she moved the Shard's outer wall from its place, ever so slightly.
...Under the cover, what she saw...
Was a huge amount of swarming Vice! Vrrrr!
Aaaaah!!
Taking joy in creeping us out, I see.
I'd appreciate it if you refrained from making that disturbing sound again.
Vrrrrrr!
Can you not!
Ee~hehe~
Let's go check the walls out then-
VRRRRRR!
GIVE IT A REST!
One Serpent encounter later...
Oh wha!? They really did show up!
I believe our worst fear has just been realized.
We...we don't know for sure yet.
Let's just deal with these ones for now!

story_1-3-31.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
I swear to god, those obstinate pieces of rock are pissing me off!
What's it this time?
So, I reported our findings to AEGiS HQ.
I made the report as comprehensive as I could, even enclosed Murakumo's mission log data!
And then?
"We cannot respond to individual inquiries."
That was how they replied. We were ignored! Completely ignored!
What kind of red tape nonsense is this!?
AEGiS is that kind of government organization, after all~
Anyways, in a fit of anger, I then reached out to Murakumo directly.
How'd that go?
"There are justifiable reasons for the delays and cancellations" they say.
"We deny that any sort of causal connection exists" they say!
They're feigning ignorance! Absolutely unforgivable!
Eh~hehe~
What's so funny?
Just thought it's pretty rare to see you this ruffled.
I very much despise being in this kind of state.
That's right...
Cheating's not a good thing to do...
What happened to Yotsuyu?
Her hero Kaede cheating must've put her into shock!
No, I have faith in her.
This has got to be some kind of mistake!
Whoa, that idolization runs deep!
Hahah~...... Is that someone with a crush I'm seeing~?
Eh!?
It's not like that.
She just reminds me of someone who helped me out a while back......
No way! She resembles your first love!?
I told you that's not how it is! I just admire her as an Actress!
Whaaat~! You're ignoring your senior in favor of Kaede when I'm right here for you~?
That's not something you can just compare.
Of course I admire you as my senior too, Sitara.
Mhm~
But I do admire Kaede even more.
Waahhh......
In any case!
The responses from AEGiS HQ and Murakumo confirmed it for me.
They're intentionally overlooking the Vice at the outer walls. I'm 80 to 90% certain at this point.
What's the next step, then? They're ignoring your reports and all.
...Still, it could've just been a coincidence after all.
I mean, we've met Heavy-class Vice completely out of nowhere lots of times too.
Right, Commander?

commands.command: Once is probably just a coincidence, yeah.

items.text: Right? Exactly!
I see.
So you're saying we haven't gatherered enough data.

commands.command: It is no mere coincidence, but rather, fate.

items.text: Eh!? What's that mean?
"It's fate that brought us to each other, Yotsuyu!"
"Ah, Miss Kaede! We were destined to be together after all!"
Wh, wha...what are you trying to say!?
Stop that.
*cheeky expression*

story_1-3-33.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
What a haul~!
Heavy-class Vice one after another!
And we got so many of them too! We're rich!
Almost felt like we were cheating too. Kinda feeling guilty about that.
But with that, the truth is now clear.
Once might be happenstance, but twice is definitely a pattern.
And the third time is fate-
Enough of that, honestly.
I'd rather not be here listening to your interjections all day.
Uuuugh... So cruel...
Ah Lord Spectacles...please have mercy on this poor soul~
Did you say something?
*squeak*!
So...what do we do?
That should be obvious.
We're reporting AEGiS HQ and Murakumo, yeah?
No.
This calls for a formal protest.
If that was directly caused by leaving the Vice alone intentionally, then it is a very big issue.
If Heavy-class Vice can indeed multiply in number, then...
The unpredictable dangers that this could lead to would be a serious concern.
May I lodge the protest, Commander?

commands.command: Go right ahead.

items.text: Understood.
When the time comes, they will have nowhere left to hide.

commands.command: I can't approve of this.

items.text: Why!?
Is this still not enough to make our case?

story_1-3-33.text: We do only have indirect and circumstancial evidence, true...
There's a distinct lack of decisive evidence!
...Putting on airs again, you.
Alright.
I will find irrefutable proof for this.
Fumika looks for evidence on a workstation...
Let's see...Heavy-class combat missions accepted by Murakumo industries...
...Designated Vice targets...unit identification data...
...and finds something suspicious...
There it is!

story_1-3-35.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Um... So, what's going on?
Fumika points to two side-by-side images.
This is the Heavy-class Vice in one of Murakumo's delayed missions.
Namely, the one with "Target inactive. Low priority" listed as the reason.
And this is the Heavy-class we just took down.
They're the same no matter how you look at it!
Indeed. The evidence here should have proved their wrongdoings beyond all doubt!
So, I'm guessing we went with the protest?
We did! So what in the world is going on here!
Why are we now accused of disrupting a Designated Contractor's projects?
Why is it that we get a penalty while they are allowed to walk away scot-free?
"Penalty"?
A punishment, basically.
Even though they're the ones who are breaking the rules. This isn't funny in the least.
Breaking the rules...so Miss Kaede and her team really did cheat, didn't they?
Whether the Actresses doing the actual fighting were in the know or not,
This is definitely deliberate on Murakumo's end, no question about it.
And AEGiS HQ too...
...Why? Why are they doing this?
Wouldn't everyone be happier if we just, worked together and took care of the Vice?
This is just wrong!
Soooo, what is that penalty we got?
Think they'll put us through some kinda punishment game?
Debris cleanup at the Shard perimeter.
Unpaid too.
Working for free? Damn~
Yes, well, I hate this as much as you do.
But if we refuse, we will lose access to missions from AEGiS.
It's sad, but that's the corporate world for you, I guess.
Better to just give in and get it over with.
Umm...
What's the matter, Yotsuyu?
So uh... What's this debris cleanup deal?
Well, what we refer to as space debris...
...Usually includes things like malfunctioned or abandoned components, asteroids, and other such objects lingering in space.
While we Actresses are protected by our Alice Gear's shields,
That's not the case for starships and the Shard, which could be endangered by collisions with these debris.
Debris cleanup is to remove these objects. Think of it as picking up trash on the streets, but in space.
So it's picking up trash!
I'm sorry about this. I didn't mean to force you to go through a terrible job like this because of me.
Not at all!
This'll help people out right? Let's get going!
Yotsuyu leaves happily to prepare for the debris cleanup sortie...
While we waste our time here, the Vice at the outer walls continue to proliferate...
Eventually, they will overflow into the Shard's interior...
Fumika!
We're picking up trash in space! Let's go~!
......I'll be there in a moment.

story_1-3-37.text: This is an emergency broadcast.
An AEGiS Heavy-class Vice alert has been issued.
There are possibilities of Heavy-class attacks in multiple regions centered around Shinjuku.
Please remain calm and act with caution.
More than one Heavy-class unit is expected to appear in these regions.
If you are in the following areas, please find an emergency shelter immediately.
<color=#ff0000ff>Shinjuku, Nakano, Toshima (select areas), Shibuya (select areas)</color>
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
See! What did I say!
Yeeeah- Lots of Heavy-class Vice swarming about alright.
At this rate, the city's safety will be at risk.
We've got to get out there and fight too!
At the Command Center...
This is not the time to be saying that, and you know it!
It's very clear that the city will be endangered if we cannot put up an adequate defense!
Please issue us an emergency no-bid contract too!
I see...... No, that's all.
How'd it go?
Apparently, it doesn't count as an emergency until damage actually occurs.
Clearly the word "danger" doesn't exist in whatever dictionary AEGiS uses.
So we can't head out there then?
I did try contacting Murakumo too, but...
They have no intentions to cooperate with us either.
Ha~ha~n!
They probably think this is a good time to advertise their new gear~
"Quite the dastard you are, Murakumo."
"Hahah, as if I could ever hope to match you, Lord AEGiS"
"Wahahaha~!"
Exactly the kind of exchange their higher-ups would be having, don't you think?
If that's the case, then...why isn't Miss Kaede and her team out there fighting?
Murakumo Industries HQ · Operations Lobby
Please grant us sortie clearance.
Even if the new equipment isn't ready for use, our old Weapon and Dress Gear loadouts are still there.
We can still perform with what we have been using up until now.
Allow us to head out, please!
What... Orders from the parent company, you say...
Is the contract so important? Is company prestige such a crucial thing to maintain?
There are Heavy-class Vice rampaging at our doorstep...
Are you telling us to just sit and watch that unfold?
To watch and do nothing!?
We have here a blade that can defeat the Vice, and you want us not to use it?
What do we Actresses even exist for then!?
Hey Kaede~ How'd the meeting go~?
We are......not cleared to sortie.
Aw~ That sucks~
Can't be helped. The new gear isn't combat-ready, after all.
Just go with the old ones then~
More used to those anyways~
We've been banned from using our old gear ever since the "equipment upgrade".
They're under heavy security in storage now.
Even if we have no Alice Gear to rely on...
I still wish to stand and fight, right now.
Even Actresses can't just punch a Vice out~
Chances are you could manage that though.
Maybe~ Heavies are a no-no, but a smaller one could work?
...Nuh-uh~ No way~ Even if it's Kaede~
I realize that.
But even so...if I could leave just one wound on the enemy...
Oh well~
Rei, what do we do~?
I'm fine with helping out, if it's for Kaede.
Rin, Rei, what are you two...?
Leave it to us~
We'll figure something out.

story_1-3-38.text: This just in—we have an update on the current situation.
Murakumo Industries, who is responsible for countering the ongoing Vice attack,
-has run into issues with the new equipment they issued to their Actresses recently.
According to a report from Daily Tokyo AEGiS News,
The official specifications for the equipment greatly differ from those obtained from internal field trial reports, indicating potential testing data falsification.
They also mention that the late response to the current situation is indeed related to the aforementioned equipment issues.
Murakumo has denied these allegations in an emergency press conference.
However, no sightings of any Actresses operating the new equipment have been confirmed as of now-
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
What in the world is going on!?
This matter is already all over the news! Just how long do Murakumo and AEGiS intend to keep us from working?!
"No one likes to admit to them...to the-
Admit to them already!
Aww... C'mon, it's a famous line, so at least lemme play it out to the end~
More importantly, isn't there anything we can do?
If we just let them be, they're gonna smash up the streets at this rate.
Is there really no other way?
We've already done everything we can at this point...
Seems that this is as far as legitimate methods would get us.
Who cares about legitimacy at this point? Just head out!
Really, you... Trying to kill off the company?
If we break the law, we'll get shut down at a moment's notice.
No, not like what you're thinking~ We just gotta use the Strat we've been using so far.
The "Strat"?
We just gotta run into a Heavy-class while we're on another job.
If we do that...
Then they wouldn't mind if we beat that thing, right?
Are there really any jobs that convenient?
We'll find one by predicting the flight path of the Heavy-class attackers.
Commander, please accept some extermination missions for smaller Vice along these areas.
Huh? I think I'm hearing something?
Encrypted tactical comms. I wonder who it is.
Hey hey~ This is Sitara speaking. Sitara speaking. Come in~.
This is Agatsuma Kaede of Murakumo Industries speaking.
Eh, Miss Kaede!?
I understand that you are an Actress team preparing for emergency deployment?
Please allow my team to assist you, however much that may be worth.
I would like to request that we rendezvous once on the field.
We look forward to working with you.
After fighting through waves of Vice, the Actresses engage a Poisonel Moth...
We've kept you waiting.
I am Ootori Kasumi of the AEGiS SOF Response Force.
We have taken care of the other Heavy-class Vice attackers at this point.
The one you face right now is the only one remaining.
We'll be leaving this to you.

story_1-3-40.text: Earlier, the Heavy-class Vice group invading the New Urban Center-
-was successfully defeated by the timely intervention of the AEGiS SOF Response Force-
-and Narukozaka Manufacturing's brave Actresses, before any damage was even caused!
The Heavy-class Vice alert has been lifted as of a few moments ago as well.
Narukozaka has seldom been discussed in a favorable light as of late, with topics such as weak performance and a potential takeover still fresh on our minds.
But could these recent developments be the start of their return to glory?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Eh~hehe~ We've finally made headlines for real~
You mean the company, not us.
C'mon, what's the difference!
Anyways, thank goodness nothing bad happened to the city.
On the other hand, Murakumo's insufficient response to the Vice attack has become a subject of major concern.
In addition to the specification data for their new equipment being suspected as falsified,
Further issues, such as the company covering up problems with said equipment, as well as collusion with certain AEGiS officials, have also come to light.
Additionally, they are suspected of intentionally delaying Heavy-class takedown missions at the outer walls of the Shard.
These multitudes of exposed issues have led to a recent formal investigation by AEGiS on the company,
and it seems that their directors will be made to take responsibility for their wrongdoings.
Is Miss Kaede gonna be alright?
It's a company problem, so nothing to do with their Actresses, right?
I wouldn't be so sure about that.
Eh? Are they gonna make her take responsibility?
The problem isn't on that end.
Phew, that's good!
For what is worth, Murakumo has definitely gotten themselves into hot water now.
--One week later.
I am Agatsuma Kaede.
Himukai Rin here!
...Takanashi Rei.
We will be in the care of your company starting from today.
Here's to a good relationship from now on.

story_2-1-41.text: Yotsuyu: It was the end of the 21st century, when spacefaring humanity first encountered the mysterious machine lifeforms now known as the Vice.
Yotsuyu: The fierce and destructive conflict that ensued heralded the threat of a ruined Earth.
Yotsuyu: Under the directive of the superintelligent AI ALICE, the planet's Moon was divided into countless pieces.
Yotsuyu: These pieces served as foundations for the Moon Shards—a great fleet of colony ships, on which the surviving population evacuated from Earth into space.
Yotsuyu: From nearly five decades of exodus, spanning half of the Milky Way, research efforts had finally yielded fruit: the Alice Gear system, weapons rooted in High-dimensional Energies.
Yotsuyu: At long last, a means to resist the Vice threat was within humanity's grasp.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
I am Agatsuma Kaede.

Yamato Nadeshiko of Judgement
Agatsuma Kaede
Himukai Rin here!

Wild, Wild Moodmaker
Himukai Rin
Takanashi Rei.

Aloof Mediator
Takanashi Rei
We will be in the care of your company starting from today.
Here's to a good relationship from now on.
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
Miss Kaede? Here!? What's going on?
That's one hell of a plot development!
What!? I haven't heard anything about this!
I've kept you waiting. Allow me to explain.
I am Ootori Kasumi of AEGiS.

Tokyo's Strongest Actress
Ootori Kasumi
Ah! You're the one who sent that transmission at the end of the last battle, right?
Indeed. That was a situation you could handle by yourselves, correct?
Yep, we managed somehow.
You're unbelievable, Yotsuyu.
To have the guts to talk to the strongest Actress in Tokyo like they were equals!
No way! The strongest in Tokyo!?
I didn't think there'd be someone even stronger than Miss Kaede!
My meager skill pales in comparison to that of Miss Ootori.
Wah! I didn't mean to disrespect you.
I'm really sorry for what I said!
Fufu, aren't you an interesting one.
Now then, let's get down to business.
I'm here to relay AEGiS's plans to you.
The fate of Murakumo Industries, whose wrongdoings have now been exposed on a grand scale, has been decided:
Total asset liquidation, and the sale of their Actress division to another agency.
The transfer of Miss Agatsuma and her team is a part of this process.
In fact, the Actress division of Murakumo will be merged into Narukozaka Manufacturing, effective now.
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
Eeeeeeeeeh~!?
The loss of Murakumo, the biggest Actress agency in the industry, has left a gaping hole that must be filled.
During their existence, they were responsible for 40% of all Vice combat missions in the area.
Naturally, with them gone, these missions have been piling up and are waiting to be resolved.
We'd like Narukozaka to expand in terms of personnel, equipment and facilities, rebuild its entire organizational structure,
And ultimately, take over Murakumo's duties of Vice extermination.
That is what AEGiS seeks from you.
Alternatively, think of it as what the entirety of the Tokyo Shard seeks as well.
Of course, AEGiS intends to offer support wherever possible.
A reborn Narukozaka Manufacturing...
And the supervisor to manage it all...
...will be none other than you!

commands.command: Leave it to me.

items.text: Quite the confidence you have there.
That is something I can appreciate.
I'll be expecting a great work from you then, savior of Narukozaka.
Both from AEGiS' perspective...
And from my own...

commands.command: I must decline.

items.text: Interesting.
Are you saying that you do not need AEGiS' support?
In that case, we shall see what you can accomplish on your own.

commands.command: Please let me think about this.

items.text: Is there a problem of some kind?
This proposition ought to be a positive for Narukozaka on every front.
In any case, that is the plan of AEGiS. I am only here to relay it.
The rest will be in your hands.

story_2-1-41.text: Well then, apologies for the disturbance.
My business here is done.
Until next time.

story_2-1-42.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
With this merger with Murakumo,
Narukozaka's gonna hit it big!
Really feels like this has developed into something unbelievable all of a sudden.
I'm just happy to be in the same company as Miss Kaede now.
Everyone, I look forward to working with you all.
Gonna work hard together from now on-!
Likewise.
Huh? Hold on a second.
Since we suddenly got more Actresses...
...The company's labor costs are going to skyrocket!
Fumika's being a scrooge again~
Think about our expenses for once, will you?
We'll be fine!
There's a ton of jobs for us to take, didn't Miss Kasumi just tell us?
Commander! Let's take lots of missions and get them done!
If that's the case... Who would be the ones sortieing here, then?
I believe it would be best for us to go with the teams that we're already accustomed to.
Okay~
The 3 of us then! Let's sor-tee together~
There's that solved, no?
How about it, Commander?
Ooh~
Is this what they call...
A protagonist shift!?
Is Narukozaka Mark 2 gonna debut next week?
"Actresses on Actresses in mortal combat! Will this unsettling scene herald a new age?"
"Find out next time in 'Sortie'! Commander shall witness Fumika's tears!"
What kind of nonsense is that...
You're making it sound like we were bought out, you know.
We are more used to working with the Commander, so we should be the ones to sortie.
Isn't that right, Commander?
Ah, hahaha...
Let's just leave things be.
We're all friends here at Narukozaka from today on, right? Let's get along!
While I do understand where you are coming from...
We are unfortunately limited to one three-man team per sortie at a time.
So let us 3 go sor-tee!
Wanna get moving~!
Could just do that here right now.
Boo~! That's cold, Rei~
Let's go sor-tee together-!
I'm going with what the Commander says.
Indeed, we shall follow the Commander's judgement.
Please treat us well.
Oh well, can't be helped then.
It's your call, Commander!

story_2-1-45.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Um...Commander.
I heard there are many missions to take at the Shard's outer walls... Is this true?

commands.command: Certainly quite a few.

items.text: I knew it...

commands.command: Not in particular, I believe?

items.text: There's no point in being considerate.

story_2-1-45.text: Umm...
If possible, could I ask you to leave these missions to me and my team?
We would like to resolve the problems caused by Murakumo by our own hands.
Yeah, yeah~
Food's not gonna taste good with stuff in our heads, yunno~
Won't you trust us?
We'll do our best.
Well, can't do much if it's absolutely not possible...
Grrrr~!
Trying to steal our screentime by acting all convincing, are you~?
No, we have zero intentions of doing that.
Miss Kaede!
All of us can help with that too!
We're all on the same side at Narukozaka now, right?
Miss Hirasaka...
In the first place, Murakumo's misconduct is entirely the responsibility of its upper management, isn't it?
Not a single one of us here thinks it has anything to do with you and your team, Miss Kaede.
Thank you for your kind words.
However, this... is a matter of our personal feelings.
We need to... make our amends.
Aww~ Surely we can do this together, Miss Kaede!
You totally just want to go on a mission with Kaede, don't you-!
N-no, well, that's a part of it but...
It is!?
I just, don't really like this "former Murakumo" stuff.
The Commander and myself, we're both pretty new to this company.
Just like you all, Miss Kaede. We're not that much different.
So, um...
Uuh... Can't think of a good way to put it, but,
Miss Kaede's one of us, Miss Rin's one of us, and Miss Rei's one of us too.
That's just how Narukozaka is right now, isn't it?
What's wrong with all of us working together?
Miss Hirasaka.
I do understand how you feel.
However......I ask that you understand how we feel as well.
Kaede turns towards you.
Commander. I will leave the rest to you.
The matter of sortie team compositions is yours to decide.

story_2-1-49.text: Is what I heard about us getting a Heavy-class mission true?
And it's at the Shard outer walls too, innit?
Looking at the specified area and the data on the target,
It's probably safe to assume that this is Murakumo-related.
Oh boy, no way Kaede and the others are just gonna stay quiet then.
Bet they'd storm in and negotiate for the mission pretty soon.
This isn't something they need to feel responsible for though.
They're being illogical... I'm sure of it.
Our feelings remain the same on this matter.
We trust you to make the right choice, so.
Kaede, Rin and Rei bow together to you.

story_2-1-51.text: A certain restaurant
Ahem, thank you all for taking the time out of your busy lives to come to this little party today.
Without further ado!
I'd like to announce today that I, Kaneshiya Sitara, and the Commander are getting married!
Whoa! You're joking!
When did you and the Commander get into that kind of relationship?
Stop with this idiocy and host this welcome party for Kaede and the others properly, if you would.
Ahaha~ Figured I just had to say something funny once the mic's in my hand.
Please don't spook us like that again...
You probably should've gotten used to that by now.
Kaede, Rin and Rei, I hereby apologize for Sitara's behavior.
N-no. It was not a big deal.
The surprise was minor enough that it only felt as if my heart was going to stop for a moment.
Didn't know you're weak to surprises, Kaede.
Th-that's not the case.
Carelessness is the enemy, and it is imperative to always condition oneself as if on a battlefield.
*yawn*
Hey, can we eat yet? I'm hungry~
And Rin here wasn't even listening.
Well, since that marks both sides as impolite...
Anyways!
Lots of stuff happened, but the Heavy-class proliferation problem's all dealt with now.
So now, I say we get this welcome party started! Here's to Kaede, Rin and Rei!
Seriously... You could've just said that in the beginning.
Yay! Finally food time! Woohoo!
Oh my! I thought I saw a familiar face and it's Rin! How are you~?
Ah-! It's Koyui-!
It has been a while.
... Hello.
My oh my! Kaede and Rei are here too~!
We're with Narukozaka now~
Wow, how good to hear~! I was worried if you were eating properly~!
So, so~ Whatcha doing Koyui~? New job here~?
If only that was the case~
I'm just here for a meal~
The truth is, I'm actually still jobless~
Just thinking about it is making my appetite slip away~
I really have to find a new job soon~
I have to go~ Bye bye you three~
Huh? Who was that just now?
That's Koyui! The big sis at the caf! From the old company!
The old company... Murakumo, huh.
She served as the nutritionist for our staff cafeteria.
Her food was great!
She took great care of us by creating Actress-specific menus and such.
Oh right, she said she's been looking for a job since the company went down and-
Rin, I don't believe saying that so loudly is...
Ah! Right~ Sorry~
Aaah! I forgot to eat!
Alright, time to dig in!
Rin turns her attention towards her meal...
Oh, Rin...
Kinda...feel a little bad now, iunno.
What's the matter?
About Murakumo, and the people who worked in that cafeteria too.
All because we investigated the outer walls...
Feels like...we turned their lives upside down...
This is not something you should be overly concerned with, Miss Hirasaka.
The problem stemmed from our company, not anywhere else.
I am somewhat responsible as well for not realizing the company's wrongdoings.
"If only I had known about this earlier, I might have been able to stop it."
Such is how I feel as well.
Ah, our company is Narukozaka now.
Apologies.
It's fine!
Murakumo was a special place for you and the others after all.
But, from now on...
Indeed. Let us do our best together.
Please treat me well in the coming days.
Whoa! You don't have to do that, Miss Kaede!
Please don't be lowering your head at me!
That makes me feel more guilty than anything else!

story_2-2-52.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
He-hello... I'm Aikawa Aika.
Er, I, uhm... I'm not really good at fighting, but...
I'll do my best!

Pure, Flower-loving Girl
Aikawa Aika
Until recently, I was, uh...
I was a newbie Actress at Mu-Murakumo, but...
I've transferred to... um, Narukozaka, starting from to-today, so uh...
P-pleashe...
Please treat me well, everyone.
I swear, Aika, what are you even doing?
Uwah!
Just stand back and let me handle this, would you?
Eh? Uhh...
Just watch me!
I am Ichijou Ayaka.
We have arrived due to the insistence of you Narukozaka people!
Know that you're privileged to have us here!

Overconfident Tsundere Lady
Ichijou Ayaka
Ayaka~ That's disrespectful to our seniors~
Hmph... Quite the big mouth she has there, I must say.
We've got our hands on a cheeky newbie here!
Big sis Yotsuyu! Not gonna lay down the law?
Ahaha~ To think I count as one of the senior Actresses here now~
What to do, what to do~
You certainly don't look troubled in the least.
I mean, juniors! Isn't it exciting?
Yenno, to us, you're still a junior too.
Ahaha~ What to do about this~
Excuse me, but... My sincere apologies.
For the disrespectful behaviors of our juniors.
Please accept my apology on their behalf.
Aika and Ayaka are both good children at heart, and so I ask of you all to please overlook this offense.
I don't really mind.
That was basically how much rudeness Sitara shows every day, after all.
What do you mean "every day"!?
I only do it about once per day!
Like you said, every day.
Aika~ Ayaka~ We're together again~!
It's good to be working with you again, Miss Rin.
W-well, I can offer my greetings too!
Yeah, sure you can. If you try.
Yes, Miss Rei. I look forward to working together.
Aika! There's no need to lower yourself that much!
Why go such lengths to be polite? Are you trying to run in an election or something?
Ayaka,
We're starting in a new company, so let's mind our manners a little more, alright~?
Nonsense! They should be the ones offering proper greetings to me!
Ayaka turns towards you.
Do you understand!?
Ah, stop that, Ayaka~ That's the Commander you're talking to~

commands.command: You should keep in mind that manners are important in our society.

items.text: Exactly! It's common sense.
Now give me my proper greeting already!
Ayaka, I told you that's the Commander~

commands.command: What, not even capable of a simple greeting?

items.text: Hah? What did you say?
I'll have you know that my etiquette is perfect.
Greetings. my name is Ichijou Ayaka, and from today onwards I will be under the care of your company.
Up until recently, I have been working as an Actress with Murakumo Industries.
And, due to various circumstances, I have been given the opportunity to join you all here at Narukozaka Manufacturing.
I shall do my best to become a contributing member of this company as soon as possible.
I look forward to your guidance and encouragement.
Hmhm~n, how's that! Perfect, isn't it!
Amazing~! See, Ayaka? You can do it if you try~
Aaaaaaaah!
What did you just make me say!?

story_2-2-52.text: So, what's the plan from now on?
Are we going to be fine taking in not one, but two newbie Actresses like this so soon?
I owe you an apology on this, Miss Momoshina.
They are here because I had petitioned for them to be transferred.
Thank you very much for granting my request, Commander.
Leave those two to me!
I'll take them under my wing as the good senior I am!
Whoa, someone gotta bolt this girl down here!
Or she's going to grow so big of a head she'll just float away!

story_2-2-53.text: You heard her, so get on with it, would you?
Whoa-ho! The Commander's hot with the ladies!
What do you think you're doing to my juniors?
Are my words falling on deaf ears with you, Commander?
Mister Commander, please let us sortie too.
They sure look pumped up and ready to go!
Just take it easy~ 's not like you two have been here for very long and all.
What, looking to goad us away from our opportunities to shine?
We want to make ourselves known, too.
Well, that stuff's up to him, not me, so-
Aika, Ayaka, you two musn't trouble the Commander like that.
He is the one at fault here! For refusing to promise to let us sortie!
I do understand your impatience, but the final decision is still in the Commander's hands.

story_2-2-55.text: This black tea, it smells like roses.
You wanted to talk to us?
Ahaha~ Just thought I'd try to bond with my juniors a little.
Please be kind to me, um...Miss Yotsuyu?
Why is it you that we must acknowledge as our senior?
Especially when we have never needed to refer to Kaede and her teammates as that!
I've been the newest at Narukozaka before, so it'd feel great if I could have juniors of my own~
Did you not became an Actress only recently?
We have been active in this field before you started, I'll have you know.
C-calm down Ayaka, please don't say something disrespectful like that to our senior at the company~
Why, I am just telling the truth.
If anything, we are the real seniors here!
Uuu... Even so, I think it's better to respect someone who's older than you.
It's been a while, Aika~ And you too, Ayaka~
You're both still growing, so make sure to eat your meals properly, alright~?
Is she your senior in the new company?
I'm Hirasaka Yotsuyu from Narukozaka Manufacturing.
Take good care of Aika and Ayaka, alright~?
Got it! Just leave it to me!
I gotta find a new employer soon too~
Guess that makes me their senior officially, after all!
Did I just let my juniors slip away from me?

story_2-2-58.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Mmm... I dunno...
"Ba-ba-bam-!"
...Something like that!
Hm, I guess I'd prefer Rifles.
I ask that our swords be refined.
Some cute equipment, pretty please.
Make sure to aim for a striking and impressive look!
An Enhanced Full Armor package for over here!
I won't ask for anything expensive.
Just as long as it'd let me help people better.
...Good god!
Demandin' little kids, every last one of yer!
*sigh*... I'm sorry about this.
...So? Whose gear are we gonna start upgradin', boss?
If we approach this without a plan, the gear upgrades we end up with may be too biased towards certain areas.
Taking overall balance into account...
Eeeeeh-!? What's the problem with it being unbalanced!?
Ain't it boring to go for perfection on every front!
Chasing after interesting stuff's the spice of life, no?
Pour every bit of money into what you enjoy!
That's what a man's "romance" is made of!
Yer stupid dunderhead!
Never heard of "All things in moderation"!?
Are yer still a child or what?
Just upgradin' whatever yer like ain't gonna get yer very far.
But then we're just gonna end up with everyone using pretty much the same thing!
We gotta go through with personal tastes after all!
Yer youngins'll never get it.
And you're too behind the times, gramps.
What did yer say yer lil' halfwit!?
That's not gonna be enough to make me bend!
I suppose the equipment upgrade plan is all in your hands then, Commander.
Please invest in our gear however you would like.

story_2-2-60.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Gaaahhh, for the love of-!
Enter Sitara, wearing a fake handlebar mustache...
What seems to be the matter, Fumika? Sudden episode of hysteria?
What kind of act is that supposed to be...
Oh y'know, the company president kind.
It's Director here at Narukozaka though, not President.
Of course I am aware, silly you.
You're the old miss in this play, by the way.
Who did you just call an old miss!?
In fact, aren't you the one who's responsible for most of the misses around here?
You keep getting the dates in your reports wrong, and the applications you submit aren't even formatted at all!
Oh no, I've dug up old grudges! What a terrible mistake I have made!
I should have called her the supervisor lady instead!
That's no different!
Um... Excuse me, but what's the deal with this "old miss" and "supervisor lady" stuff?
These are important office terms for people of society, young one.
Back in the Showa era, that is.
For the residents of the Tokyo Shard,
Learning about the Showa era is an obligation!
Wait, that's how it is!?
Just a lie, obviously.
Our sociocultural system is modelled after the 2010s, so if anything it should be the Heisei era instead.
Had it been modelled after a few decades earlier, we would've been living in the golden age of Real Robot shows!
Ah, wait, but then I wouldn't be able to play the latest games!
Oh, what a difficult choice to make!
*sigh*... I do envy you for only having to worry about such trivial things.
Is there something you're worried about?
If there's anything you need a hand with, I, Hirasaka Yotsuyu, will do everything I can to help!
If you say that... Up for lending me a hand with all the extra work that's been falling onto my lap?
Of course!
Sitara runs away at the sound of work...
In that case, we have...
Calculating payslips for our Actresses,
Submitting our Weapon and Dress Gear management applications,
Adjusting sortie shifts,
Managing our Combat Suits,
Tidying the wardrobe lockers,
Checking in with the mission processing assistant from AEGiS...
Can you help with all that for the time being?
...I'm sorry, Fumika, this is pretty out of my league...
Mhm, as expected.
I'm at least grateful for your feelings of consideration though.
Still, I can at least go clean up the office and pick up some trash instead!
And so, Fumika's pain continues...
Can we please hire some full-time office staff already...

story_2-2-62.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Attention!
We will now begin the First Narukozaka Actress Staff Meeting.
Ooh, me, me!
Let's host a video game tournament to help everyone get along!
That'll be rejected.
But I even went ahead and made the tournament brackets! And the league table! And the matchups chart!
Rejected.
Augh... instakilled!?
Once, we were a small company with only me and Sitara, but there are a fair number of us here now.
Therefore, I would like to use this opportunity to collect some requests towards the Commander or our company.
Does anyone have any requests to state?
Me, me, me!
Rejected.
Any others?
Lemme say it at least~
Go ahead, Miss Kaneshiya.
A game-
Rejected.
A dejected Sitara backs away...
Anyone else?
Me~! I wanna sor-tee lots and lots!
Wanna go wild every day! Like, with a bang!
Rin, I don't believe your desires should-
Why?
Aren't requests...things you wanna do-?
That's why I said it-.
Quite straightforward of a comment.
I'd prefer for my equipment upgrades to be prioritized.
Don't want to fall behind the others and all.
Anyone else with something to say?
Umm...
I wish to be more useful to everybody through fighting.
I'll try my best, so, please...
Hard for us to improve if we don't get the opportunities to apply ourselves.
As such, I'd like for us new members be prioritized for sorties.
I'll look after our juniors-
I refuse!
If I must join a team, I'd much rather it be Miss Kaede's team.
Ah, I wanna look at how Miss Kaede fights up close too!
Don't you copy me!
Well, now that we've gotten so many more Actresses, it's a good time to try out different team comps~
The outcome of a battle can be decided at team editing, after all!
What is that about?
Obviously, ga-
Rejected.
Team compositions are up to the Commander to decide.
Ayaka turns towards you.
Inefficient bureaucracy. I will ask him directly then.
I will be on the next sortie! Understood?
Myself at the front, with Miss Kaede and Miss Rin as my teammates.
M-Mister Commander, please don't forget about me too.
Th...that's the meaning behind forget-me-nots.
What are you saying!? Do refrain from disrupting the perfect team I came up with!
Aww... Ayaka, you're being mean~
Even though I just wanted to offer my strength to everyone...
If that's what it is, I'll take good care of you!
And why are you so eager to butt in amid this mess!?
Enough, all of you!
The argument is silenced...
And I was trying to avoid this exact sort of mess with the meeting...
What did I spend all this effort for!?
Gathering demands is quite a difficult thing, it seems.
Commander, I do not believe there is anything I can do here anymore.
I am afraid it is up to you to resolve all of this.
