With our actions causing this rapid expansion in the company's Actress roster...
I suspect similar issues will continue to crop up in the future, but I hope you will handle everything well.

story_2-2-64.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
I can't do this anymore!
Commander! Please tell me we're going to hire full-time office workers!
And while we're at that, an accountant, a General Affairs manager, a legal team, management planners, marketing-
Gah, just about every position in existence!
To hell with the expenses!
Please take a deep breath, Miss Momoshina.
I believe AEGiS is assigning support personnel to us to ease the burden.
You're too hopeful in assuming they wouldn't be slow like the government agency they are.
I am willing to offer what little help I am able to as well.
While I have not done anything of the sort during my time with Murakumo,
I do believe that I will learn quickly.
Thanks. It's a good thing you're here to help.
Our people are, unfortunately, astoundingly terrible with these kinds of things.
The same could be said about Rin and the others.
I suppose we both have the short end of the stick then.
Commander, make sure not to forget about the office staff.
And please keep it in mind not to hire more Actresses until the situation calms down.
Not long afterwards...
Fufu, long time no see~
Figured at the rate things were going, there wouldn't be a company for me to come back to, but looks like you girls are doing pretty well~
Ah, who might you be?
Really now... Sitara? Fumika?
Did you two slack on educating the newbies?
Oh hey, it's the hag.
The...hag?
Who the hell are you calling a hag!
Too bad the Actress industry's been led by super cute & pretty teenage girls since forever~
Of course you'd say that, Sitara, considering being a teen is the only thing you have going for you.
Don't drop the pretty girl part! The super cute & pretty girl part!
Pull yourself out of that squabble already, Sitara. We could do with not wasting more of our time.
Sitara quiets down and steps away...
I'll introduce her.
Everyone, meet Yotsuya Yumi,
A senior Actress at our company-
And a 24-year-old hag.
Si, Ta, Ra...
Sitara runs away.
She should have been temporarily transferred to Nakano since sometime last year-
And now that the contract's over, I'm back.
I sincerely hope that contract wasn't voided early or anything.
Did you really think that was possible?
For all we know, you could've been expelled for bad behavior?
Oh Fumika, just what kind of person did you take me for?
An old hag.
Ah, that was from Sitara.
Like hell it was!
-Anyways, long story short, I'm back, so,
Here's to a good time~

Sweet Temptations, Bitter Expenditures
Yotsuya Yumi
*sigh*
What's that sigh there for!?
The increase in Actresses we got lately has done a number on Fumika, I think.
Hmmm...
Kaede, Rin and Rei introduce themselves...
Followed by Aika and Ayaka...
Sure are a lot more new girls hangin' around~
Yumi notices you.
Oh, what!? Who're you?
The Commander.
Heeeh~ So we got an Actress Commander here now, eh~
Commander~ come hang out at my place sometime, would you~?
Also, I can't really do close-range fights, so can you do me a favor and leave me out of the forefront?
Getting my nails scratched from missions sucks, you know~
Stop piling more problems on top of what we already have to deal with, please...
Between making team compositions with all of our new Actresses. handling equipment upgrades,
And educating the newcomers, my head feels like it's going to explode...
Oh, that's what it was~? Aren't you serious as ever, Fumika~
With team comps, why not just keep going with what everyone's used to? Easier that way and all.
But then, what about us...
We're just being abandoned then!
As for the newbie training? You leave that to me~
Once they're more used to fighting, we can just swap them into existing teams, no?
And with equipment upgrades... Just do whatever seems fitting~
If something seems unbalanced, we can just make up for it with more upgrades later.
Just try doing it to your tastes, Commander.
If it doesn't go well? We'll cross that bridge when we get there~
That personality of yours is what makes cleaning up after you a pain, I swear.
A~hahaha~
If it works, it works~ Especially right now~
Your admin and accounting workloads must be pretty heavy with all the new staff, right?
Pass half of that over, I'll look over them for you.
You can do that?
Yumi pulls up some of the paperwork on a workstation and gives them a look.
You really think Sitara can handle this stuff?
A most compelling argument.
Quite impressive, old hag.
I-I didn't say that.
Payback for earlier!
Yumi flips through more of the documents and comes across something surprising.
Hey, Fumika?
What is it?
This AEGiS contract... we're kinda in a bad spot here, aren't we?

story_2-3-65.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Hey, Fumika?
What is it?
This AEGiS contract... we're kinda in a bad spot here, aren't we?
The Heavy-class combat contract? What about it?
We haven't met the requirement here, no?
Section 9-2, the Vice takedown record?
Don't we need to meet an AEGiS Vice takedown points quota for this?
That won't be a problem.
We did inherit a large sum of points from Murakumo, after all.
Um... Miss Momoshina, this is a difficult matter to speak of, but,
Due to the breach of regulations, Murakumo's Vice takedown record...
...has unfortunately been completely invalidated.
What did you just say!?
Wait, then what happened to that monthly record you set?
It has been revoked as well.
Since, it was not exactly fair, considering how the Vice I destroyed originated from the company's intentional neglect.
But you were still the one who took all of them down, weren't you?
It is fine. I do not mind.
I did not fight those Vice for the sake of a record, after all.
But still......nnngh!
Kinda hard for me to accept that...
So with Murakumo's records being invalidated...
That means we inherited no points from them whatsoever!?
If that's the case... Our Vice takedown record is definitely insufficient to fulfill the contract clause.
At this rate, our designated contractor status for the Shinjuku area, inherited from Murakumo, will be withdrawn.
How many points are we short by?
Fumika checks on a workstation.
Since we only have our own records now...
We're approximately 150,000 points away from meeting the requirements!
150 thousand... How much does that translate to in practice?
Fumika pulls up another page.
Let's see.
According to AEGiS' standards, about 9 Heavy-class Vice units...
Then the next step is clear.
We'll need to take down 9 Heavy-class Vice ASAP.
Before the AEGiS Designated Contractor status is taken from us, that is.
So, with that being said, Commander,
Pass us lots and lots of Heavy-class jobs~

commands.command: Alright, let's get to it!

items.text: Fumika, we have an order for 9 Heavy-class Vice~
Treating this like a store order...

commands.command: Sounds like a worrying amount of work. Are you all going to be fine?

items.text: You say that, but can we really afford to not take these jobs?
With more Actresses, our labor costs go up too, no?
Oh, I'd rather not get my pay docked~

commands.command: Can't do...It's not pay day yet...

items.text: That's fine, we accept card too~
...It's not like you're asking for drinks at a store or anything. Nothing's coming out of your pocket.
In fact, we're in a spot where AEGiS is obligated to give us money, right?
I'd rather you not talk about exploiting others for money in front of minors.
This is an important lesson about society too~
Actresses, hostesses, club hostesses, all pretty similar, don't you think?
Absolutely not.
Well, one day you'll be in that line of work too, Fumika.
Absolutely never!
When that day comes, I'll be seeing you there for a drink, Commander~
...Commander...

story_2-3-65.text: Anyways, a reservation for 9 Heavy-class missions~, I'm counting on you, Commander~

story_2-3-66.text: I heard it's a Heavy-class all-you-can-hunt funfest from today on~
Lots of Heavies to take down, yeah~?
Let's have a compe-tition! See who smashes more of them!
It was always just you proposing it on your own.
Then let's compete from now on-!
For me, personally... I'd like to fight to fulfill my Actress responsibilities, and...
...Seeing how they accepted all of us so readily,
For Narukozaka's sake as well, so...
If we do the compe-tition, we'll smash tons and tons of them-!
Always quick to compete huh, Rin.
It'll be way more interesting too-!
Rin, Narukozaka is currently in a time of crisis.
Let us refrain from thinking about the upcoming fights as fun and games, shall we?
We'd all be more into it if the compe-tition happened though~
That's as far as you'll go!
It'd be a problem if there's only you two in this bout to decide the ace of our reborn Narukozaka!
When it comes to Heavy-class Vice, you can't forget about Hirasaka Yotsuyu!
Yotsuyu slowly rises into the scene as Sitara sings the Gunbuster March...
I'm still in fighting condition right now! Not going to pay any mind to the small fries! Worst comes to worst, I'll ram myself into the enemy!
Er... Is that how you wanted me to put it, Sitara?
Ahaha~ Sorry for barging in like this.
The secret is, Yotsuyu's very presence draws Heavy-class Vice in!
She's a must have for any all-you-can-hunt!
Haha~ You're flattering me too much.
I'll win against Kaede and you too, Yotsuyu!
Rin, please, no infighting with Miss Hirasaka...
Need I remind you that the Vice is our common enemy?
Ah, no, that's not what it's about.
I just thought it'd nice if I can get closer to you, Miss Kaede, even just a bit.
The Maintenance Area ain't yer playground! Shut the 'ell up or I'll kick yer sorry asses outta here!
Sorry for that, I didn't mean to annoy anyone.
I believe I am starting to understand how Miss Momoshina feels...

story_2-3-69.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Fumika is busily working away at a terminal, when suddenly...
Looks like you all have been working hard.
Miss, Miss Kasumi? W-why are you visiting?
Why...you ask?
I'm here to fulfill the promise I made when I asked you to succeed Murakumo.
Ah, so that's what it's about.
What's the matter...? Is there some reason why you wouldn't want me to be here?
...Not in particular.
Hmph... Well, fine then.
Kasumi turns to you.
Commander, I am here today to give you a special directive from AEGiS directly.
I judged that you would be suitable for the task with the fighting strength your company currently has.

commands.command: What kind of directive?

items.text: We would like you to conduct large-scale investigations of the various sectors of space in the vicinity of our Tokyo Shard, whenever necessary.

story_2-3-69.text: The goal of this project is to locate habitable, Earth-like planets and to obtain various resources.
Of course, you will also be destroying any potential Vice opposition along the way.
And any Vice Colonies that you discover, as well...
This will be more difficult than your usual Vice extermination missions, but with the risks come equally high returns.
We will grant you new types of Shells and other items as rewards for aiding in the project as well.
From our perspective, we'd like you to make use of this unprecedented opportunity to enhance your fighting strength even further.
I look forward to a satisfactory reply.

story_2-3-74.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Commander.
We have achieved the Vice takedown points quota set by AEGiS.
With that, we will be able to safely continue as the Designated Contractor for the Shinjuku area.
That was by the skin of our teeth.
Ea-sy pea-sy~
Well~ I wouldn't call something this tame a crisis, really~
You see, a true hell...
...Has no such thing as an end...
H-hell!?
I'm amazed, Miss Yumi.
You're experienced in so many kinds of different things.
...She is a hag after all.
Sitara makes her escape...
Who're you calling a hag there!?
...and Yumi chases her to teach her a lesson...
Thank goodness~ It's all thanks everyone doing their best.
Ahaha~ You're making me blush with those words.
Why are you the one getting all embarrassed?
She said "everyone"! Eve-ry-one!
What possibility is there for that to include you?
Eeeeh!?
I'm not included in that 'everyone'?
Ah, of course.
No way!?
Did I, get kicked out of the circle while I wasn't looking!?
Wawah~! No, no, not like that, not like that!
Ahh, uhm, what do I do, what do I do~
I didn't mean it that way.
Of course you're included when I said 'everyone', Miss Yotsuyu.
...That was what I was trying to say~
Phew... That really spooked me.
*yawn*~
That was it? How bothersome~
Ayaka walks away...
Wait up, Ayaka,
Let's apologize to Miss Yotsuyu together~
Aika follows after Ayaka...
Ahaha~ Guess I've still got a long way to go~
Miss Hirasaka.
Miss Kaede?
That.. the legacy of our former company has caused such trouble for everyone this time, is something I must apologize for.
Th-that wasn't any trouble at all! It's not your fault either, Miss Kaede, so there's no need to apologize!
Even so, I do feel somewhat guilty...
Nnngh~ If you keep saying that, I'll get mad even if it's towards you, Miss Kaede!
Please just drop all that already!
I mean, we're fellow workers at the same company now, aren't we?
......Yes, you're right.
From now onwards, let us both do our best...to protect the people.
Kaede pauses.
Yotsuyu.
Let's work together from now on!
Hrm, you two are on good terms.
As members of Narukozaka now, it is-
I don't really mind.
Narukozaka is Murakumo's successor, right?
Indeed, hence-
Of the areas Murakumo handled.
Shinjuku wasn't the only one...right?
What about the other areas?
Eh!? What are you talking about?
Somewhere out there...
Found it—our next target.
Eheh~ we're ready here.
Let's go at this with everything we got!
Very well. We shall begin then.
Eheh~ Seems like you're having fun, Chieri.
That I am. A real battle is certainly what I'd call fun.
Now, let us pay Narukozaka a visit.

story_2-4-75.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
So in short... Shinjuku wasn't the only area Murakumo was tasked with defending?
That is correct.
From the city centre to Shibuya, Ikebukuro and all the way to the Tokyo Bay... The company covered many different areas during its existence.
That sure was a huge operating area~
There were offices in each of these regions, each with their own complement of Actress employees.
And we're supposed to inherit all of that?
According to Miss Kasumi from AEGiS, I believe so.
That would make filling out our Actress and equipment rosters a top priority then.
Ah, the expenses...
Will our finances even be able to keep up with our needs?
We are AEGiS' Designated Contractor, so I imagine it wouldn't be too hard to raise the money we need.
Just gotta take advantage of our deals with the big players as much as possible.
Then that leaves the problem of our Actress count.
We will have to defend all of these areas, somehow, with our current numbers.
Plan the shifts well enough and things will probably work out, right?
You all appear to be troubled here.
Enter Chieri, Shiina and Kanade...
It must not be easy to defend such an expansive area all by yourselves.
How does letting us shoulder some of that burden in your stead sound?
Excuse me but, who are you? It's not nice to just barge in like that.
Chieri turns to Yotsuyu.
I would ask of you the same question: who are you?
H-Hirasaka Yotsuyu!
Don't tell me, are they our seniors too?
Nah, no way. Don't have to be worried about that.
Chieri turns away from Yotsuyu, ignoring her...
How do you do, Miss Agatsuma Kaede?
Um... and you are?
I am Kondou Chieri, incumbent Student Council President of the St. Amalthea Girls Academy.

Absolute Student Council President
Kondou Chieri
Our academy has invested much into the field of Actress activities.
We are willing to protect the area around the academy with our own hands.
May I ask that you leave the defense of the Shirokane zone to our St. Amalthea Student Council?
Hold on a second! You can't just decide that on your own!
Our company's the successor to Murakumo here.
So we'll protect them all, every last area we inherited!
Aren't you an interesting one.
Our academy has produced top Actresses and AEGiS officials for many generations.
We pride ourselves in our Actress training program, one unsurpassed within Tokyo Shard...
And among the top in the entirety of Outland as well.
The quantity and quality of our Actresses is simply not something Narukozaka can compete against.
No way!
So, how about it, Miss Agatsuma? Would you be willing to hand your no-bid contract for Shirokane over to us?
We will take full responsibility for the extermination of Vice in the area.
Would you give us your trust and cooperation?
That is-
That's the Commander's call to make!
I'm getting ignored!?
What do you say, Miss Agatsuma?
Is it not difficult for you and Miss Himukai to defend every single area by yourselves?
I appreciate your concern, Miss Kondou.
However, we now have colleagues at Narukozaka who are fighting alongside us.
And in addition...
We would need to ask our commanding officer, the Commander, for his input.
I see...
I was saying the same thing though...
So who is this Commander who has earned such trust from none other than you?
Chieri turns to you.
Are you that Commander of Narukozaka?
I see...... Fufu.
We will formally petition AEGiS regarding the Shirokane contract.
Their ruling will be something we can both look forward to.

commands.command: Consider your challenge accepted.

items.text: Good, as it should be.
I do hope you will go easier on us when the time comes.
Fufu.

commands.command: I'd like us to come to a peaceful understanding.

items.text: Then, will you peacefully give up the Shirokane contract to us?
I wouldn't want to see Actresses get hurt at the behest of a Commander who has no will to resist.

commands.command: You wouldn't dare. We have AEGiS' full backing!

items.text: AEGiS is merely looking for a replacement for Murakumo.
As long as said replacement is capable, it doesn't necessarily have to be your company.
And we, the St. Amalthea Girls Academy, are here to prove that.

story_2-4-75.text: Good day.

story_2-4-76.text: AEGiS Tokyo HQ · Operations Lobby
I know how St. Amalthea is a famous school and all, but that shouldn't give them the right to just boss people around, right?
"O-hohoho~ We are the number one ladies' school in the Tokyo Shard."
"If you have any issues with our actions, you are welcome to visit us at Shirogane anytime."
Ghhh-! That sounds infuriating come out of your mouth too, Sitara!
Where even is Shirogane anyways!?
"Oh? You do not even know of Shiroganaise? As expected of commoners..."
I don't really get it, but I can still tell you're making fun of me!
It's Shirokane, not Shirogane. There's no diacritic.
It's the area connecting the Shirokane ports district and Shirokanedai.
The kind of high-class neighborhood you girls would never be able to afford a place in.
"You girls"? Just casually leaving yourself out of that, I see~
It's not like you'd be able to afford it either~
I'll just catch myself a high-ranking official, so no problems there.
Well, if something happens, I hope you'll help me out, Commander~
Um... We were summoned to the AEGiS HQ, correct?
Would it not be more appropriate to be quieter while we wait?
True~ Might get caught in a bad spot if we don't behave well.
Hey hey~ Look who's getting chewed out~
You're one to talk!
Quiet, please.
I've kept you waiting. My thanks for coming today.
Without further ado, let us address the main topic.
Regarding the Shirokane contract and St. Amalthea's request for it...
AEGiS has decided on this ruling:
Narukozaka, the inheritor of the contract from Murakumo, will have its operational capabilities tested.
A test!?
It's all over! We're done for!
Don't just start panicking! You're making fools of yourselves there!
What kind of test will this be?
You will be competing with St. Amalthea in terms of Vice takedown points.
The contract will be awarded to whoever has achieve a higher points total in the area in question, within a given time limit.
To sum it up...
A fight for the number one spot, then.
"Let's see who gets the most in sales!" Like that?
It's... Vice takedown points, not sales.
AEGiS will assess the point gains and publish them in real-time.
A fair competition to see who's more worth of the Shirokane contract would certainly be appreciated, correct?
Oh right! Miss Kasumi!
What's the matter?
You said AEGiS would support us when Kaede and the others came to Narukozaka, right?
Shouldn't we have gotten something by now?
We did already assign a full-time office worker to your company.
I'm Andou Youko. I look forward to working with you all~.
Just a bit more help, if you can!
Not finding the confidence?
Of course we have the confidence.
That is to be expected.
After all, a professional contractor losing to some amateur high school students...
It's simply out of the question.
I'm not the best at tests... But I'll do my best!
I have high expectations for you, Actresses of Narukozaka.
Surely you wouldn't be letting me down?
I am always prepared.
M-me too!
Well said. Make sure to do your best.

story_2-4-78.text: It's time for today's Exciting Battles corner!
As always, I'm your host, Usamoto Anna.
This time, we're bringing you an update on Narukozaka and St. Amalthea's contest for the Shirokane zone.
According to AEGiS' published info, Narukozaka settled on taking out smaller Vice for their first mission.
By dealing with the consistent and numerous horde of small Vice, they've netted a rather respectable points total so far.
On the other hand, St. Amalthea went for a Heavy-class Vice right off the start!
Performing amazingly against the target, their student council trio, consisting of their president and leader Kondou Chieri, Sutegoro Shiina, and Nikitou Kanade, took their first victory with ease!
From their efforts, St. Amalthea has gained an early lead in Vice takedown points by a massive margin.
The current scores at the end of the first round are: Narukozaka at less than 4,000 points!
And St. Amalthea at over 18,000!
There's only enough time for about five more sorties before the contest deadline!
From the looks of things, this contest will be decided by who can defeat the most Heavy-class Vice within that time limit.
I'm sure Narukozaka won't just take this face down either!
Will Agatsuma Kaede, the now-unofficial holder of the monthly takedown record, be able to turn it around!?
Stay tuned to find out!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Ghhh! Narukozaka's losing here!
Uoooh-! We're not gonna lose-!
Like I said, you two are getting too close to the TV!
Commander! We should go for the Heavy-class too!
Turn it around with a bang-!
Rin, Yotsuyu, please refrain from troubling the Commander like that.
With no Heavy-class Vice in the areas we are responsible for, there is nothing we can do.
That I do get, but it's hard not to feel antsy about the contest.
We're falling behind and all!
An opportunity will reveal itself eventually, I am certain. Let us be patient and wait until that moment.

story_2-4-80.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
How do you do, everyone? I'm Sutegoro Shiina, here to give my greetings~

Feminine Vice-President with an Iron Fist
Sutegoro Shiina
Wha-!? Ah, hello there!
...Wait, huh?
Could you be someone from St. Amalthea?
Yes, I am. Vice President of the Student Council, at your service.
Ah-!
You were on TV the other day!
I was, together with Chieri and Nade-chan~
Thinking back, that was a bit embarrasing~
So what brought someone like you here to our office?
Hmm, nothing too important... Just that Chieri seemed interested in you lot, and wanted to learn more about everyone here.
So I'm here to hang out~
Ah, so that's why.
Thought for sure you're here to mess things up for us, since you're from St. Amalthea and all...
I wouldn't do something as rude as that~
Mess things up... Oh, picking a fight? Wanna pick a fight with me?
No, no, Rin, Miss Shiina just said she wouldn't do that.
Aww~ But she looks so strong~
Strong?
Even though she looks so cute and gentle, like a big sister?
"Soft", I think was how people put it?
Eheh~ Thank you for the kind words~
Hearing that makes me really happy~
That wasn't flattery or anything! I just said whatever came to my mind.
I know you're super strong. I can tell.
If we fight, I can definitely get my body moving all I want.
You're actually here to mess things up, right? You're here to fight, right~? Let's do it~!
Hmm...
I don't really know how to do the "mess things up at someone's place" thing~
If anything, I'd be on the side that beats back people who come over to stir up trouble~
Miss Sutegoro, your family manages a Karate dojo from what I know, correct?
Oh my~ So you knew about us~ As expected of the daughter of the Agatsuma dojo~
Shiina does a short Kata performance.
Osu!
Wooow! So cool~!
Let's go to the training room! We can have a, what's it, "kumite"? A duel like that~!
I'd rather not have any duels to the death~
Maybe next time~
Boo~ Boo~ No fun~
I don't know if this will make it up to you, but...
Would you mind if I joined you for a sortie or two?
I do want to know more about you all, since you managed to catch Chieri's attention.
Ooh yeah~! Let's do it~!
Sor-tee time-!
In open space...
Ready anytime on my end here~
I'll be looking forward to seeing how strong everyone is.

story_2-4-82.text: Welcome to the latest Actress newsflash, brought to you by your host, Usamoto Anna.
The contest for Shirokane is heating up, with Actresses from both sides giving it their all!
On the defending side, we have the once-prestigious industry leader: Narukozaka Manufacturing!
Tracing their origins to a repair shop that worked with Weapons and Dress Gear,
Narukozaka grew to become a company of expert technicians, developing their own in-house Gear designs and so much more!
During their heyday, they were host to many of the shining stars within the Actress industry,
And chances are, many of the Actress fans back then are still supporting the company to this day!
On the attacking side, we have a school known for its highly rated Actress education program: the St. Amalthea Girls Academy!
With both a rich history and countless sister institutions in the many Shards across Outland,
Their students soar through the skies to defend Shirokane, where their beloved campus resides!
What a wonderful tale of youth!
The first round of sorties ended with a final result of 4,000 to 18,000 points.
A clear advantage for St. Amalthea right off the bat!
For the second round, both sides took to cleanup operations for small Vice.
And going into the third round with the score at 9,000 to 23,000, Narukozaka finally found its chance to shine!
A much-anticipated turnaround that came in the form of a Heavy-class Vice takedown!
With that, the contest score is now 28,000 to 27,000, with Narukozaka slightly ahead!
But it's not over yet! The contest could still go either way!
Will Narukozaka widen their lead!?
Or will St. Amalthea turn this around!?
We'll be broadcasting the next round of sorties live right on this channel!
It's time for an Actress Live Broadcast! We'll be back right after this next intermission! Stay tuned!

story_2-4-84.text: The fourth round of sorties in the Narukozaka vs St. Amalthea contest has come and gone!
And this time, the Heavy-class point gains have went to St. Amalthea!
In a lightning-fast counteroffensive, their Nikitou Kanade took down two whole Heavy-class Vice in a row!
Her efforts have brought the St. Amalthea points total to 63,000!
With Narukozaka stopping at 32,000 points, St. Amalthea has not only reclaimed but significantly widened their lead!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Nhh- This is so frustrating.
Mrghhh! Frus-tra-ting!
We'll turn it back around this time too!!
Back around-!
Bring on the big Vice! 3 servings! Extra large!
Calm down, you two, alright?
Meanwhile, someone is heard entering from the door...
Prefects! I'll be checking your belongings!
Take out everything you have with you and lay them on your desk!
Eeeh-!? Nobody told us this is a thing-!?
That's not cool!
You teachers and prefects should trust us more!
...Wait, huh? We're not at school right now, are we?
Heheheh...
I got things mixed up!
Grrrr-! Don't get it mixed up to begin with!
And we escorted you here out of respect for you being our high school senior too!
Whatever, it did get everyone's attention.
Anyways, let's try that again!
Good day! I'm Nikitou Kanade, the head of the Disciplinary Committee over at St. Amalthea!
And I'm here for an inspection of Narukozaka today!

Exhaust-Scented Disciplinary Officer
Nikitou Kanade
An inspection? What kind~?
If it's the machines you're looking for, they're over at Engineering~
Why did it occur to you that I should be doing safety inspections for your machinery!?
Don't tell me... It's a physical!?
Ahh~ I've been staying up a bit late recently~ And I'm not exercising much~
I'm not interested in your weight or waistline either!
I mean, no need to be so touchy.
You want some ice cream, Miss Roux?
And who's "Roux"!?
My name's Nikitou Kanade! There's no "roux" in there anywhere!
Huh? You don't get it?
Then I'll be calling you Miss Roux from now on~
Wha!? From Ni-ki-tou-Ka-na-de...
...To that name!?
Excuse me, but...what might be your purpose here for today?
...Ah, oh right! You!
Y-yes?
I'm glad you asked!
Because I just don't get it!
Um... what is it that you don't understand?
Could it be the nickname Sitara gave you just now...?
I'm not getting that either, but that's not it!
I don't get what makes Chieri and Koro-chan so concerned about you people!
-Oh right!
By Koro-chan, I meant Shiina, by the way.
Ah, Miss Sutegoro.
I'll have to thank you all for being nice to her the other day.
Yes...erm...you're welcome.
When she came back that day, she never stopped talking about you all!
And Chieri looked like she was having an awfully good time too!
I just can't make heads or tails of that.
Figuring it out was what brought me here... And what is all this I'm seeing!?
Does your company have no sense of discipline at all!?
Um...I don't quite follow, but my apologies?
There's nothing for you to apologize for!
At a time like this, what should I...
A confused and sleepy Yumi walks up to the scene...
What's with all the fuss~?
Can't you all let me sleep in peace~? I pulled an all-nighter last night and all~
And what's wrong with you! I can tell you've been day-drinking just from the smell!
What's so bad about an adult drinking~? A grown woman has hardships like you wouldn't believe~
A lack of discipline leads to all kinds of troubles!
QUIET!
A very irritated Fumika storms into the room...
Now which one of you has been causing a ruckus all this time!?
Was it you, Sitara!? Rin!?
Augh... Nothing to do with me~ Ahaha~
I behaved though?
Yotsuyu?
N-no! It wasn't me!
Fumika pauses.
Then who could it have been, hmm?
Who was it that has been making it hard for me to train the office worker AEGiS sent us--
Found you!
You must be the mastermind behind Narukozaka's sorry state!
The boss in the shadows, the true presence pulling the strings...
There is no mistake!
What a coincidence—seems I just found who I was looking for too.
The one behind this whole mess, that is.
--Two hours later.
Do you understand now, Miss Kanade?
Definitely!
You've been carrying countless burdens on your back, Miss Momoshina!
Between taking up admin and accounting yourself due to the manpower shortage,
And never stopping in your efforts to fix Narukozaka's discipline...
Well, I suppose...
Does none of them feel ashamed of themselves!?
Heheheh, Miss Momoshina, you can rest easy now that I'm here.
As the head of the Disciplinary Committee, I'll make this company right again!
What's the matter...Miss Fumika?
......Don't ask.
Let's start with combat! Show me how all of you fight around here!
Just so you know, we leave those decisions to our Commander here, so,
Whether or not we sortie is up to him.
Kanade turns to you.
If you won't show me, then I'll take it as you having something to hide!
No need to humor her. Our area contract hinges on our next sortie after all.
In open space...
Are you approaching the requested mission route?
Remember, visual safety confirmation is the basic of the basics!

story_2-4-86.text: Welcome back to Narukozaka vs. St. Amalthea, the contest every Shard in Outland is watching!
In this round, Narukozaka, who was left far behind after last time, has successfully pulled off a string of Heavy-class takedowns!
With their streak bonus, their points total has skyrocketed to 80,000!
On the other hand, St. Amalthea is staying still at a mere 67,000 points.
This neck-and-neck dead heat is finally nearing its end!
Only one round of sorties left for both sides in this competition!
Will Narukozaka secure their victory!?
Or will St. Amalthea show us the power of their tradition!?
Do your best, all of you-!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Congrats on turning it around, everybody.
As someone from AEGiS, I shouldn't really be taking sides, but,
My money's on all of you here~ ♪
Ahem... We have not won just yet.
There is still the final mission before it is decided.
But, from a points perspective,
One Heavy-class takedown already puts you in a really good spot.
Two of those would just widen the gap so much that the other side wouldn't be able to catch up anymore.
A safety lead, right?
What's that mean?
That if we keep it up, we'll win!
Alright! Let's keep it up then!
Indeed, let us not relax our efforts until it is truly over.
Someone is heard entering from the door...
How do you do, people of Narukozaka?
Miss Kondou...
You and Miss Himukai have fought excellently, Miss Agatsuma.
I never imagined that we would be backed into such a corner.
To think that Actresses outside of our St. Amalthea Academy could fight to such an extent,
There may be some hope left for the rest of Tokyo after all.
Ehehe~
Your Shiina's pretty good too!
Tell her I wanna duel her next time~
I can certainly understand that feeling.
Rin leaves...
Kanade told me about a Miss Momoshina. Is she here?
Fumika is...well...
Yotsuyu comes up to the two...
She's reading.
She's finally free from all the accounting and admin work, so if anyone bothers her she might get mad.
What an interesting person. I have to wonder what Kanade saw in her.
Not to be rude, but don't forget about me either!
Fufu~ Hirasaka Yotsuyu, correct?
You actually remembered my name!
I must apologize for disregarding you the last time we met.
Such is not the case anymore. Rest assured that you are certainly on my radar now.
As the one Actress in this company that I find the need to be careful of the most.
No way! You'd ignore Kaede for someone like me...
Miss Kaede, the final sortie is finally upon us.
Indeed.
I suppose I should applaud you all for coming this far?
The contest has not been decided yet.
Oh, but it effectively has been at this point.
Would you let me join you for a single battle?
I'd like to see how you all fare on the battlefield.
...for future reference.
In open space...

Allow me to experience it...
The manner in which you all fight.
The sortie continues as the Narukozaka team and Chieri fight through the Vice together...
So this is how Narukozaka's Actresses fight... Fufu... Good... How very interesting.

story_2-4-88.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Congrats on taking down two Heavy-class Vice in a row!
Your takedown score's now over 100,000, so...
I'd say you've got this in the bag~♪
It wasn't anything we couldn't manage!
Waa~ Thank goodness!
Well, with me on Narukozaka's side, that was to be expected.
Even the seniors in the high school department are no match for us at all~
Yay-!
So-?
Did we win-?
Not over yet, Rin.
It is exactly as Rei says.
St. Amalthea's results have not been released yet.
We must remain alert and prepare for any counterattacks from their side.
Nhhhh~ That's hard to get~
I'm on Kaede's side here too.
Don't you know what would happen if we keep shouting "We won! We won!"!?
You understood the meaning behind my words, Sitara?
Everyone here sure doesn't understand enough!
Phrases like "We won!" and "Did that do it!?"!
Those are absolute taboo! Never say them out loud!
That's how you set up a Losing Flag for yourself!
Whoever says it always ends up losing or failing!
What kind of nonsense is that? I swear.
I agree with not letting our guards down, but we're leading by three Heavy-class Vice worth of points here.
If nothing utterly unexpected happens, I don't see us losing at this point.
A drink to Narukozaka's victory~!
However...
It's the home stretch of Narukozaka and St. Amalthea's contest for the Shirokane zone!
And in St. Amalthea's final sortie...
An absolutely unbelievable turn of events unfolded!
Kondou Chieri, St. Amalthea's ace, has done the impossible!
She took down four whole Heavy-class Vice almost all by herself!
That's a difficult feat to pull off in a single sortie, even for the best of the best!
Even I've only managed it once back in my Actress days!
Thanks to her achievement, St. Amalthea has earned a whole 72,000 points from their final sortie!
Combined with the bonus points from AEGiS, that's over 80,000 in total!
With this, St. Amalthea has finished at 147,000 points,
Easily overtaking Narukozaka's 116,000 total!
The contest ends with a momentous turnaround victory for St. Amalthea Academy!
Narukozaka, with the wide lead they had, had the tables turned on them in a way nobody could have seen coming!
Kondou Chieri... What in the world...
If...if only I was stronger...

story_2-5-100.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Attention, everyone~
Your very reliable Sitara has caught you all yet another Actress~!
No way!
I am very reliable, after all.
She has her connections if nothing else.
Unlike you, glasses nerd.
Glasses, glasses, that's all you ever call me.
......Perhaps I should give contacts a try.
Don't break your character! The soul of the glasses character is in the glasses! That's common sense!
Common sense from where?
Um... Weren't you bringing an Actress over?
Oh, right!
Sitara begins her grandstanding presentation.
It's finally time for the awaited newbie to enter the spotlight!
Volume 2 of the Sitara Collection, AKA SitaColle, presents:
Koashi Mutsumi!
Hello. I'm Koashi.

Narukozaka's New Challenger
Koashi Mutsumi
W-whoa, she actually brought someone!
You sure have a lot of Actresses in your grade!
Nah, she's not from my school. I found her at a Taito, the one near Shinjuku Station's south exit.
Taito in Shinjuku? Sounds like some kind of a fight club.
Close, but no cigar.
The Taito Station...is a famous arcade to all the gamers in the know.
And there, Mutsumi and I communicated with our fists!
A brawl at an arcade!? That's wild.
Not that. We had a fighting game match.
Yeah... Can't believe how good she was at it.
And from there, we hit it off ♪
We lied down beside each other, at a riverbank under the setting sun...
Sitara acts out the scene...
"*pant*......*pant*...... You, you're good."
"*pant*......*pant*...... You're not so bad yourself."
And that's how our friendship bloomed from the rivalry!
Oooh~ Sounds amazing!
We didn't actually go to any riverbank, just a fast food joint for some shakes.
Anyways... She claimed this is more fun than gaming, so I took her invitation to see for myself.
You're baiting someone into joining with your lies again!?
It's true though. Actress stuff is more fun than gaming.
I'm a gamer myself, so I know what I'm talking about!
Well, I've made the decision myself, so sure, I'll join Narukozaka.
That figures~
Mutsumi...
Oh, so you're an Actress here too, Tama.
Sitara asked me to join...
Same...
Oh? Do you two know each other, Mai?
A-ah...erm...I went to the arcade with Sitara, and...
You've got some potential in fighting games, Tama.
I'd love to match you again.
I'm sure I'll have a good time here with you around, too.
M-me too. It feels so much more reassuring with you here.
Ah, could this...
E-hehe~ That's that taken care of!

story_2-5-102.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Isn't it great, Mai? With Mutsumi joining us and all.
The three of you can totally make a team now!
Hyah!?
U-um... You're... not wrong...
If it's with Mutsumi and Sitara, then...
I'll, probably... be fine?
And with this, you'll be able to sortie worry-free!
Behold! The power of video games!
The bond between gamers shall save the universe!
I don't really get it, but that's amazing!
Er...umm...I'm not that much of a gamer, but...
Don't need to sweat the small stuff!
Y-you're right...
By the way, is Mutsumi not here yet?
She said she'll come over after school.
But once she's here, it'll be the Day 1 Session for the Narukozaka Fighting Games Team (pending)!
And Mutsumi arrives, with a friend in tow...
I see, so you work here too, Aika.
It really surprised me~
I didn't hear about you being an Actress at all, Mutsumi~
It wasn't that worth mentioning.
But we've been friends since forever~ You could have at least said something~
Well, I'll look forward to working together.
Let's both do our best~
Hmph, so Mutsumi is in the same grade as us, I see.
In that case, we have three perfectly good Actresses right here.
Let's form a team!
Wow~ That's a great idea, Ayaka~
Mutsumi? What do you think?
Mmn, sure. Let's work together from here on.
It's decided then! We shall be the best team to ever exist!
Mhm, let's all give it our best, the three of us~
Yeah.
...Wait, for real!?
Ah... Uuu... M-my team...
Wh-what should I do now...
I'm so sorry, Tama-chan~
This mess they've gotten themselves in, I swear...
Well... There's your lesson to put some thought into how to expand the Actress roster~
The swampy world of women isn't so easy to navigate.
You're good at that, Yumi, right? Can't you do something about this?
Can't do~
Yumi turns to you.
That's the owner or the manager's job, no~?
Fumika approaches you as well.
Commander, may I ask you to follow up on this issue?
After all, we still need to bolster our numbers further, even after this.
Recruiting more Actresses, huh... *sigh*......
Speaking of which, did you meet any exceptional Actresses while you were at that company in Nakano?
*siiiiigh*...... I'm begging you, please don't have me remember...
A suddenly downcast Yumi walks away...
Uh... Yumi...?

story_2-5-89.text: AEGiS Tokyo HQ · Operations Lobby
...Well, the AEGiS Contractor Designations for Shirokane and its neighboring areas...
...have been transferred to St. Amalthea.
And with this, Narukozaka has lost its preferential status in:
The Shirokane Ports District, Shirokanedai, Takanawa, Shinagawa, Sengakuji, Azabu-Juban, Hiroo, Ebisu, Meguro...
Um... I'm not sure what to tell you all here, but...
Don't give up there, I guess?
We sure lost a lot of areas to them.
Our strength wasn't enough to match theirs.
We must train further to improve ourselves.
Not bad!
Here comes the first spicy development in a while!
Yeeeah! Let's get 'em next time!
Whatever... I'll just do what I must.
I have to try my best too!
I will not stand for my company wallowing in defeat either!
Get anything snatched from you, and you gotta return the favor!
That's the basics in both love and turfs!
I seem to recall you always losing though, Yumi.
Don't push yourself too hard, grams.
You're saying like I'm one!
At the end of the day, our loss here may have been for the best.
What's that supposed to mean, Fumika?
Our turf just got carved up!
Doesn't that make you mad!?
It does, but I doubt we could've maintained our borders in our current state anyways.
We may have expanded our Actress roster, but as a company Narukozaka is still on the smaller side.
Covering an area as wide as we're expected would take a considerable large number of Actresses. More than we have, for sure.
That's not a problem if we just all do our best!
I can fight 24/7 myself!
Don't do that, please. We're an ethical business here.
The Labor Standards Bureau is pretty strict with the rules these days, too~
If they find the need to investigate, chances are you'll be saying goodbye to your AEGiS contracts~
There's no way we'd let anyone work 24/7, for sure.
No to working for a full 24/7, if at all!
To work is to lose after all!
That's not really good either.
Do consider just recruiting more Actresses normally, though~ ♪
Typically, for defending one area,
You'd need at least one Actress team of three.
Considering Narukozaka's current state, I think roughly 15 Actresses or so should do the trick?
If that's all we need, the Commander did tell us that he scouted a few.
Those kinds are never reliable though.
Love lasts as long as money endures, as the saying goes.
They'll vanish the moment they find someone better...
What we need are people who won't run away when it comes down to it!
I don't really get it, but that does sound pretty convincing.
Putting Yumi's tragic past aside,
More manpower is crucial if we want to avoid hemorrhaging the rest of our preferential areas.
Therefore, it's time for us to look into recruiting more Actresses.
Oh, oh! Are we gonna make posters? Hand out fliers?
Ah... If it helps, our previous company did recruitment through TV advertisements.
That sounds amazing! Let's go with that!
That would cost far more than our budget allows.
We could just ask AEGiS to help with that!
Sorry, but we're not allowed to fund ads or promo campaigns for a private business~
Nnnhhh... What else can we do, then...
What about handing out tissue packs with ads in them? I'm pretty good at doing that!

story_2-5-90.text: A certain cafe
This is tricky... Where do we even start from with looking for Actresses to recruit?
Just chalk it up to Yumi being too strict and settle with the ones the Commander found. Easy, right?
She does have a point though.
On-call Actresses we have registered do help when it comes to immediate manpower, but it'd be silly to expect them to prop up the company.
Considering the balance between outsourcing and our core competencies...
I can't understand those magic words you're saying, Fumika!
To put it in simpler terms...
If all we do is import cheap cartoons from foreign Shards, our own animation industry is never gonna grow!
I don't get that either, Sitara!
Yotsuyu realizes something.
Oh yeah!
Hey, Kaede! Would you happen to know someone you can recommend us from your last company?
Murakumo had a ton of Actresses working for it, right?
Please introduce us to any one of them!
Unfortunately, since Murakumo's branch agencies did not frequently interact with each other,
I do not know of any other Actresses aside from the ones who are already here.
Then, what about Rin? Rei?
Was there anybody~? I dunno~
I'm afraid I'm not a social person...
Aw, I see.
W-we were pretty new too, so we only know Miss Kaede, Miss Rin and Miss Rei.
I'm sorry I can't be more helpful.
To begin with, we were newcomers at Murakumo's main office!
Surely you wouldn't expect elites like us to mingle with the subcontracting peasantry.
Ayaka, that's a terrible way to put it~
Why, I was just stating the truth.
Enter a familiar face...
Oh my, hello there~ Everyone's all here again~
Miss Koyui!
You showed up at a great time!
You worked at Murakumo's Actress cafeteria before, right?
Yup~ That I did~
You must've known all of their Actresses really well, then?
Of course I do~
From their faces, names, weights, to what they like and don't like eating~
Even their Emission Aptitude values and personal skills~ I know all of it~
That's what the menus I made for them are based on, after all~
Then please, introduce someone you know to our company!
Ah...um...I'd love to do that, but~
Their addresses, contacts or emails~ I know none of those~
Oh! That must be that "information security" thing!
Correct~ Sorry I can't help you out here~
That sucks... And I thought it was a good idea too...
For the time being... Let us sustain a viable defense of our areas with the numbers we currently have.
Indeed. Recruiting can come after that.

story_2-5-92.text: Inside a subway train
I guess Actresses are the kind of things you can never find when you need one...
There's nobody else except me at my school too.
Fumika is the only other Actress at my school as well.
I haven't heard of any others in Seidai High, at least.
Not in you two's school either, huh...
There's one at mine~
Really!? Can you bring her over next time?
Umm~ Who was it again~ I remember there being someone...
Who was it again?
I wouldn't know myself!
Sorry~
Rin backs away...
My school does have Actresses.
Problem is...
That's Chieri, Shiina and Kanade she's referring to.
Surely you aren't foolish enough to think that they would take you up on the recruitment?
Oh yeah, St. Amalthea.
Nnnh... There goes Operation Recruit-a-Friend I guess...
Psst, psst.
Ain't you forgetting somebody here?
You've got someone in mind, Sitara?
It's not like I don't!
Is that a yes or no!?
Well, I do, but......
You know what, if things go well, I'll bring her over next time~
Nice! Please do bring her over!
Don't expect too much, but just wait and see! ♪
You're giving mixed signals there!

story_2-5-94.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
You think Sitara's gonna bring us a new Actress today?
I wonder what kind of person she'll be~ It'd be nice to see~
I wouldn't expect much if I were you.
It is Sitara we're talking about here.
Yeah... I could totally see her go:
"Tada, the newbie you've all been waiting for is none other than me~!"
Or something along those lines.
Enter Sitara...
Behold! The magnificent entry of an ultra cute newbie Actress!
Debuting at a Narukozaka near you!
But nobody else is seen...
Huh? What's the matter?
You... I'm at a loss for words.
Ahahaha~
Yumi takes a moment.
Saw that one coming~
Wait, what!?
Tama-chan?
Where'd you go?
What now~? Did you pick up a stray cat for this skit too?
Like hell! I did nab a newbie Actress we needed here!
Hyah!?
Sitara, noticing the sound, turns around, and...
Aha! There you are!
Um... Sitara... Please don't move so quickly...
Can't hide behind you like that......
Mai tries to hide behind Sitara again...
Don't hide to begin with-!
...but is dragged out.
So she's our newbie Actress?
Uuuu... Don't stare... Please...
And Mai goes back to her hiding spot...
I-I'm sorry!
C'mon~ Introduce yourself.
H-hello, uh... Uhm... Thanks for having me...
Not that~ That's just a greeting.
B-but...umm... I-it's so, embarrasing...
Ah, figures.
Alright, so, this is Tama-chan here.
She's in the same grade as me and has an Actress license.
And that's why I dragged her over here~
Th-that's, not what you told me... You said we'd go for some tea together after school...
Hear, hear~ Go get her that tea~
Ah! Got it, right away!
Yotsuyu leaves to get the tea...
You brought her here on a lie? I didn't take you for that kind of person, Sitara.
She would've ran off if I didn't go that far.
So she is a cat then.
Um, a-and...
"Tama-chan" is just, the nickname Sitara gave me, so...
That's pretty obvious. So, what's your actual name?
It's...Nikotama...Mai.
See? That wasn't so hard now, was it?
Now, keep going.
Um...p-please be kind to me.

Shy, Delusional Ballerina
Nikotama Mai
And that's a new Actress in our roster, Commander~
Eh? W-what's going on?
Congrats, Tama-chan. Everyone's welcoming you to Narukozaka!
Sitara provides the cheers and applause.
Congratulations!
Congratulations!
Stop that!
Had to scratch my urge to do that...
You cannot simply force her into the company without her own consent!
Fumika turns to you.
With that said, what now, Commander?
Um... er... uh... what, s-should I... do?

commands.command: We're welcome to you joining.

items.text: Okay. I understand.
P-please be kind to me.

commands.command: It's fine if you don't want to. No need to force yourself.

items.text: Ah... Uuu... But, if I don't, then...Sitara...
Augh... I knew it... We can't be friends anymore...
Stop with the fake tears!
It's not that, I... dislike being an Actress.
But, uhm... It just feels, so, embarrassing... to show myself to people...
Um... So... If it's together with Sitara, then... I might... be able... to do it?

story_2-5-94.text: Does that mean you're joining us?
Ah... Um... I... I guess.
Cool! Let's go on a sortie together! We'll get to know each other more!
Yotsuyu suddenly approaches Mai.
Hyah!?
No, uh... I-I don't know...
Mai backs away, only for Yotsuyu to approach her again.
Nothing wrong with it, right?
Yotsuyu turns to you.
Commander, send me out with Miss Mai please!
I'm sorry......
Mai runs away, and Yotsuyu follows...

story_2-5-96.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Mai, in her new Type 88 Combat Suit, is doing a short ballet performance...
Woo-hoo! Super-duper cute!
I don't look weird or anything?
You look A-OK! The Combat Suit fits you really well!
Hyah!?
Tama-chan's got style, so obviously she'd look good even in the lame-ass Suits we're stuck with!
Haah? What'd yer say 'bout our Combat Suits?
I was saying it suited her to a T.
Narukozaka's Suits are the freakin' best!
Hmph...
These matching Suits really do give off that 'one of us' feel.
Um... Uuu... Don't... stare so much... It's... embarrassing...
Mai hides behind Sitara reflexively.
Oh, right! What team is Miss Mai gonna be in?
Mmh... That's what we're stuck on right now.
Ah... umm... If I'm not...with Sitara, then I...
In that case, it'd be Sitara, Mai, and one more person.
Would that be me? Or Fumika?
No... er... I-I don't know...
Eh? Why not?
It's three members per team.
Erm... uh... no...
Tama-chan is pretty shy, see~
Maybe she can't really handle you getting too close for comfort, or Fumika's cold, hard logic?
Eeeh? I'm not scary at all~
As Yotsuyu does exactly what Sitara just accused her of...
Hyah!?
And Mai runs away...
See? She'll run away if you leap at her like that.
How should I do this then...
Hmm hmm... An Actress who could team up with Tama-chan... That's a tough nut to crack.
Ah, for a moment you were sounding like someone smart there!
Eh~hehe~ I've awakened as a reliable character!
Since when!?
Lo and behold! The formidable problem-solving abilities of Kaneshiya Sitara!
So what's the plan?
To be continued! Stay tuned for next week~ ♪
It's like that again... You had me there for a moment, too...

story_2-5-98.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Training Gym
Kaede is practicing sword swings in the gym...
Sei!
Tei!
Yaaaa!
Yotsuyu...!
Practicing by yourself?
Lemme join you for some extra training too!
Yotsuyu... About that...
I am not skilled enough in swordsmanship to teach you.
Training myself is already the extent of my ability.
Don't say things like that!
You've always been the one I admire and the goal I'm trying to reach!
So please, let me train with you!
Yotsuyu, I'm afraid I am not as impressive of an Actress as you may believe...
I can neither contribute to the company like Sitara, who introduced her friend to us as a new Actress;
Nor provide the leadership to unite everyone, as Fumika and Miss Yotsuya do.
All I am capable of...is honing myself like this.
Nothing more.
That's why...
I know, but still!
I promise I won't get in your way.
And you don't have to teach me or anything.
As long as you let me imitate your moves beside you, that's enough for me.
You're not the only one who's frustrated from us losing to St. Amalthea!
I know you want to catch up to Chieri even if she's far out of reach, because I feel the same way!
One day, I wanna become as good as Chieri—and you too!
I'm sure that's exactly what I wanted to be.
So please! Let me!
Your feelings are something I can understand.
I too have someone I would like to catch up to.
Kaede... Then...
Come, let us practice together.
Got it!

story_2-6-103.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
...Anyways!
Now that we have Mai and Mutsumi here, Narukozaka's all powered up!
St. Amalthea's going down!
Yeaaah!
Let's aim for victory!
Yeaaah!
V-victory?
As usual, let's all stay safe and show the Vice who's boss!
And with that, this staff meeting is now adjour-
But suddenly...
Testing, testing, mic check one, two... OK!
Yo yo yo!
Hey you! My audience!
What!? Is something happening?
This is Fujino Yayoi, Actress rapper, Empire Nakano represent!

Troublesome Rapping Hurricane
Fujino Yayoi
Some kind of promo event for a newbie Actress?
And to Narukozaka's wack crew: Y'all got no skill!

No respect for rhythm, no love for rhyme!
This hopeless bunch ain't worth my time!
Yeah! I'll round you clowns up, Narukozaka!
Right in your face with this war declaration!
Get a good look of my determination!

Reclaiming this position
With my master formation
And never-ending motivation!

A fated confrontation!
An overdue conclusion!

First target? Say farewell
To Nakano, who else!
For Narukozaka: a taste of hell!
It's a face-off, fair and square, yo! Don't you know?
Mmn... So basically...
You're looking to take the Nakano zone from us!
Wo-w! So cool!
Rin joins in on the freestyle...
Face-off! Face-off! Face-off yo!
Yahoo!
O-kay!
Thanks a bunch!

Yo! Ain't that a sight!
Dope lil' Actress comin' in with the bite!
Gotta give props to that feel-good vibe!
Hear this fiery roar straight from my core!
I'm getting kinda hungry too~ ♪
Alright, settle down.
The impromptu duo freestyle is stopped...
If you're dissatisfied with our management of the Nakano zone, then go and petition AEGiS for their ruling.

Submitting to them? Don't be absurd!
Whoever you are, you're just a nerd!

Win and loss hinges on the stakeless flock!
The audience's votes are where one puts stock!
What... No, that sounds terrible. We are never going to do that.
Yumi wakes up from the commotion...
*yawn*...
What is it~? Staff meeting still going on~?
Hey, this is wack! Yotsuya Yumi, right in front of my eyes!
The clout, the joy, all you've torn from me,

I'll take it all back, no doubt!
Three cheers for me, devout!
And you, teary-eyed, will walk right out!
A face-off for two, fair and square, yo! Don't you know?
Hah?
Nah, can't do~
Hey, Commander~ Hope you don't mind me clocking out early today~
Yumi leaves...
Nowhere to run, yo!
And Yayoi gives chase...
What in the world was that...?

story_2-6-104.text: So, what was the deal with that girl just this morning?
I believe she referred to herself as Fujino Yayoi.
And it appears that there is some history between her and Miss Yotsuya.
True, didn't look like Miss Yumi was happy to see her.
That's why it's a face-off, yo!
Rin... Isn't that, like, pretty much how she talks?
Alright, that's enough. Less playing around, more preparing for the next sortie.
We may have more Actresses under our wing now, but that doesn't mark our lack of manpower as resolved yet.

story_2-6-106.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Huh~
So that happened while we were away...
Well, if I was here, arbitrating something like that would've been a piece of cake.
Why was Miss Yayoi fighting with Miss Yumi, though?
That's the problem there. I wonder why, too.
Easiest guess would be something money-related, obviously~
A monetary issue, no doubt.
Really!?
I mean, I use a lot of my part-time pay for hobby reasons too.
But Yumi's on a whole other level~
She's not the kind to plan her finances whatsoever. Everything she earns gets spent without a thought...
She'd be, well, a more-or-less decent person... if not for that.
Yup~
Also, she falls for men right away, and usually end up in messy relationships.
That, and she's a slave driver.
And a granny.
H-hold on, let's not go that far.
It's not nice to badmouth Miss Yumi behind her back like that.
Not a problem!
I'd say those things to her face too!
That's even worse!
It's an expression of love, don't you see!
Say, does Yumi owe any debts?
Just between us, but...
Apparently, and quite a bit too.
Hmph... Not as reliable as I thought, if she's taking loans just to pay for her fun.
Ummm... So Miss Yumi borrows money from somewhere?

And she's using that money on her fun and boyfriends.
...Pretty sure.
Really now. For all that she's been bragging about being the one to receive offerings...
It... must be for a lover in trouble, I think.
Oh my, a tragic love? If it's born of a difference in social status, then I suppose it's a fair cause.
My eyes are getting blinded from how pure they are!
Miss Yumi must be doing her best... How wonderful...
Love shines brighter in the face of the greatest adversities, as they say. Quite impressive for a peasant like her.
These two are done for... I've got to do something about them fast...
I've been thinking, Sitara.
What's up, Tama-chan? You sure look excited.
Miss Yayoi was chasing Miss Yumi, right?
Yeah, what about it?
...Could it be... love?
......That's where your train of thought's going!?
I mean, if that was true...
Don't you think it'd be a wonderful thing?
Uhhh, I mean, it's Yumi, so that's kinda...
Eeeeh!? But Yumi looks like she'd fit so well as a bottom!
...Huh? Did I say something weird?
It's weird, yo!
Hyah!?
Yayoi's here to challenge Yumi, yo!
That's what she said, yo!
Must've been mad about losing in sports~
Ah, whoops! One more time...
Must've been mad, yo!
Hm...? You sure it's not in a game?
Losing a match is a lot more frustrating than losing in sports.
Sports is worse, yo!
No no no, fighting games is worse here.
What are you all saying? Everyone's got it wrong!
She said she was aiming to take the Nakano zone from us!
Does no one remember that!?
We're not giving up any more of our turf!
Not a single inch!
Um... Yotsuyu...
Kaede! What do you think about all this?
I think that gossiping over assumptions and conjectures is a poor idea.
Perhaps letting events run their course without fixating on arbitrary predictions is...
...True... Ugh... I might've gotten a bit ahead of myself there.
Once I started thinking about how Narukozaka might be in a pinch again, I just couldn't stop myself...
As expected of you to be calm even in these times though, Kaede!
No, um...
I am not exactly as imaginative as everyone else, so...
The commotion wakes Yumi up...
*yawn*...
What's going on~? Another ruckus~?
Miss Yumi! What's the deal with Miss Yayoi and-
No comment.
I'm not gonna stick around for all this, so don't mind if I head home early again~
And Yumi leaves again...
Aww~ Wait up, Miss Yumi! At least tell us something~!
And Yotsuyu chases after her, hoping to get some answers...
And I just warned her too...

story_2-6-108.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
I've gone and done some research.
Ooh, that was quick! Way to go, Fumika!
Yes, yes, your flattery is very appreciated.
Even though I haven't even mentioned what it is that I looked into.
It's about Miss Yumi, right?
I can tell that much.
I can tell, yo!
Geez! Stop it with that!
What have you learned, then?
Fumika moves to a terminal and pulls up a page.
Where exactly Yumi was transferred to. Look.
Hm, "Empire Nakano Limited".
The managing company of a few subculture shops around Nakano Station.
Empire Nakano? That sounds familiar...
I believe Miss Fujino mentioned the name.
Yeah, that! "Actress rapper. Empire Nakano represent," she said!
What does "repre-sent" mean though?
Fumika looks it up.
It's apparently a term in rap and hip-hop.
"Represent", meaning that one speaks on behalf of a particular group.
So she's a representative for Empire Nakano?
Representative... director? Could she be the leader of the company?
Fumika pulls up another page.
Doesn't seem like it. She is just an Actress affiliated with them.
Perhaps she came as a company spokesperson?
Coming on behalf of her company to declare a showdown with us... Well then!
She must be looking for a one-on-one brawl with Yumi!
If it's just between them, then it's not our business to interfere!
Seriously, what kind of trouble did she cause over there...
Bet you she must've laid a hand on the company's money~
That would've seen her terminated in an instant!
Then, what about if she fought over a guy with the rapper...
That I can't say is impossible.
That's what they call a "love triangle", right?
Th-that's so grown-up, wow.
Speculations aside, why was Miss Yotsuya transferred over there in the first place?
Her, Miss Sitara and you, Miss Fumika, would have formed Narukozaka's only full team at the time, correct?
Our Director owed a personal debt to their President, so we couldn't refuse when they asked us for help.
Moral obligations, huh? I get that.
Though, if helping them landed us in a bad spot, it would be putting the cart before the horse.
Fumika taps away at the terminal some more...
Like with how Yumi messed up at their company and brought the issues all the way back to us!
...and finds something unexpected.
Wait, huh? This is strange.
Empire Nakano paid out her remaining salary according to contract terms.
Which means...
It wasn't her fault that the contract was terminated at all.
It was circumstances on Empire Nakano's side.
No choice but to ask directly then.
But it's not like we're gonna get anything out of Miss Yumi.
I was referring to the Nakano side.
The rapper person did not seem like someone who would listen to us at all, though?
She's not the only vector we can take.
May I, Commander?

commands.command: I'll leave it to you, Fumika.

items.text: Thank you for the go-ahead.

commands.command: I'd rather not have any trouble.

items.text: Far too late to say that now.
Or would you prefer us to leave this issue alone and watch it get worse?

commands.command: Not like I can change your mind at this point...

items.text: Indeed.
But you can take responsibility for what happens.

story_2-6-108.text:
Like I said, I am going to try and reach out.
...To the Nakano side.
But enough of that for now. Back to work!
Y-yes ma'am!

story_2-6-110.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Go-od Mor-ning~! ☆
I'm Shimoochiai Touka~, the Idol of Egota~!
I've come to visit from Empire Nakano~! ☆

Idol of Egota ♥
Shimoochiai Touka
So, what brought you to us today?

I heard you were looking for a singer for an internal event, so~
I'm here to promote my new songs~
Touka's gonna do her best~ ☆
Touka comes up to you.
Would you be the Commander~?
I'm Shimoochiai Touka~, the Idol of Egota~! Nice to meetcha~!

commands.command: Do you know a Fujino Yayoi?

items.text: Yayoi's, you see, besties with me~ We've been together at Empire Nakano since the start~ ☆

commands.command: What did you think of Yotsuya Yumi when you worked together with her?

items.text: Yumi was, you see, a su-per nice big sis to us~ I have nothing but respect for her~ ☆
No way in hell.
If nothing else, they're just like each other with the faking.
What's the matter~? Touka doesn't really get it~ ☆

commands.command: Sorry, but we lied about the company event.

items.text: Aaah?
...I mean,
Touka didn't quite catch that~ ☆

story_2-6-110.text: ...Excuse me? What did you say?
Miss Yumi's getting hounded by Miss Yayoi. It's been a bother for her.
Ay-yi-yi...
Don't tell me Yayoi's at it again.
She's always like this, skipping work left and right just for some "rapper training", leaving a mess for everyone around her.
Don't know if she's off doing MC battles or freestyling, but who the hell does she think she is!?
We got Yumi to cover for her since she barely shows up, and for a while it was going just fine,
But then she just had to come back and butt heads with Yumi, like, why even!?
What could've led to that?
Hell if I know!
Well, I did hear her say something about Yumi being an enemy we hired to get rid of her...
Huh, so it's just a baseless grudge.
We lent Yumi out on a favor because you needed more Actresses, but this sure is a bit much.
It's Yayoi, chances are not a single thought was put into this.
Could've settled with only making enemies in her rap battles but nooooo.
With how stupid this whole "rivalry" is, of course Yumi would've ran away!
The three of us could've formed a team and took a shot at getting on TV!
It's all Yayoi's fault things turned out like this. I'm pissed off just thinking about it~
Yumi's so much easier to talk to in comparison, speaking in actually comprehensible words and all.
No shot at being an idol, though.
From what you've told us, we have a general picture of Empire Nakano's situation now.
Thank you for your cooperation.
You think I'd happily walk away with just that!?
I'm gonna note down what happened here today!
Wait, what're you gonna do!?
Don't think I'd just let this pass! It's gonna be ten times the payback, just you wait!
I'm not quite sure what you mean.
Commander, do you think we should actually hold an internal event after all?
We can call a different singer.
I'm Shimoochiai Touka~, the Idol of Egota~!
It's been my longtime dream to hold an event here at Narukozaka~~
So please, do gimme a call~ Counting on you~! ☆
Touka moves away...
Ahaha...... That's, wow.
Ah! If it isn't Agatsuma Kaede~
Yes, um... I am truly sorry about what you had to go through today.
Not a problem~ Oh right, I saw you on TV the other day~ You sure put in a lot of work~ ☆
Oh, uh... That was just a short Actress news interview, so...
See, you got a nice job on TV. Sure is hard being someone who really sells, eh~?
Don't you get too carried away now. Capeesh?
I have absolutely no intentions to...
The only Actress idol the world needs is me~ ☆
No, but, I am not an idol...
Oh no~ I'm so scared~
Kaede threatened me~
Eh? I did not...
Yotsuyu comes to Kaede's aid.
There's no chance Kaede would do something like that.
Ah-aaah~ Now I'm mad~
Grrr, I'm done here!
Touka leaves, seemingly in a fit of anger...
Nakano's Actresses sure all have pretty strong personalities.
I have to agree.
And Miss Yumi actually worked with those two.
......That is impressive of her.

story_2-6-112.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Good morning, girls~
Good morning, Miss Yumi! You're here early today!
Well, you know how I've been leaving early on most of the days recently, right?
So I figured I'd come before office hours for a change.
Wow, ain't you early today, Miss Yumi!
Yotsuyu steps aside.
Now, now, c'mon and have a seat.
Good morning, Miss Yumi.
Let me bring some coffee over. Ah, no, you prefer green tea, right?
Yotsuyu hears this from across the room.
Got it! Tea coming right up!
Want some ice cream to go with that? Or do you like snacks instead?
How 'bout I rub your shoulders for you too?
What came over you girls this time? Sure are being awfully considerate there.
This isn't some kind of drawn-out prank, is it?
Rest assured that that isn't the case. We're only-
But of course, things never go as planned...
Yo yo! Yotsuya Yumi, yo!
How long ya gonna keep running for, yo!

What's up Narukozaka, I'm coming in hot!
All the work to get here's leaving me fraught!
8 minutes from Nakano, stuck on a bus! Then 6 or so from the stop? Boring ol' strut!
What a hassle, this trip! My temper's 'bout to flip!
Fight me now! No more running!
Should've taken a taxi if that trip was so much of a hassle.
Nothing at all you comprehend! To my ears, those words offend!
When we ride, we ride the flow! Taxis are a big no-no!
On a bus, audience in tow, now that's a good show!
And the excitement, ho!
Time for the showdown, fair and square, yo! Don't you know?
Again, not happening.
Getting myself tangled in stupid messes like this is directly against my beliefs and all.
Yotsuyu comes to Yumi's aid.
Don't you think that's enough already!? Can't you tell how much Miss Yumi's being bothered by what you're doing!?
Thanks, Yotsuyu. I'll be going then.
Yumi leaves...
No! You've let her get away again, yo!
Miss Yayoi, you're misunderstanding this! Miss Yumi wasn't there to chase you out!
She was just sent to Empire Nakano on a request for help!
Everything would've been fine if you'd just work with her and that "Idol of Egota" person!
Unthinkable, impossible, utterly incognizable!
I only team with my soulmates! No respect for chummy teammates!

That chicken with no fight can go get bent!
There's no love in Yumi's faulty represent!

Come at me, yo, Narukozaka!
You representin' this bunch at large?
Commander? Director? No one in charge?
Uuh, I wouldn't say I'm Narukozaka's representative...
That's your excuse? Your resolve's too loose! No love on your back, I snooze!
I do have my resolve!
You, an Actress? No! Too skillless!
Be it passive, active or special skills!
Y'ain't got any to give! That's just a negative!
Narukozaka's chock-full of lame-ass fools! Lean on Murakumo as a rule! Look at her, venting here, what a tool!
Hey, you're the one who's venting here!
You got no talent, not a shred!
No need, no point to dis, 'nuff said!
Spin me a lyric, or you're just a workaholic!
Yayoi gives Yotsuyu a moment to "spin a lyric" while the latter stands in stunned silence...
Slowpokes like you can't start to match my spew, yo!
Yayoi makes her triumphant exit...
Looks like nothing we say will ever get through to her.
Good work taking the brunt of her disses!
You two are the seniors here! You could've at least lent me a hand.
It felt terrible, not being able to say anything back at her...
That was a one-on-one rap battle, no?
Rule 14 of the internet: don't feed the trolls.
Mmmrgh!
Anyways, back to work. We need to make up for Yumi's share too.

story_2-6-114.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Yo yo yo!
Hey, my audience!
The very nice Actress, not those Vice dunces, Fujino Yayoi, at your service!
You're here again? Did no one ever teach you not to barge into company offices without a care?
Ah-hahaha!
OK! Hear me say! Face pass, free pass, Moon's shards as our future's pass!
Yotsuya Yumi! Face me, head on, fair and square, yo!
Go give her the face-off or whatever it is that she wants already.
I don't think she's going to go home until she's satisfied.
Hell no, ladies' quarrels aren't my thing.
You go and do it in my stead, Fumika.
I'm not interested in the kind of meaningless arguments that rap battles tend to be.
Hey, wackjob! The weaving of rhymes is the soul's war cry! You gonna dis? C'mon! Raise your voice, don't be shy!
Yo! 'Til it's settled down fair, I ain't goin' nowhere! Your Combat Suit's shedding tears, don't you hear!
A fight-less Actress, with her ancient trash dress,
Rendered fortuneless, straight path to sadness! And all that's left⁠—loneliness!
Why are you even bothering with this? We're both Actresses here.
Miss me with a fight that doesn't pay a single yen.
Yen's our money, buy and sell! Meetings of chance, fate-compelled! One day, all's well will end well!
Fujino Yayoi, A.K.A Ace!

If it's a fight, a battle in sight,
That's an invite I won't miss, alright!
Vice and Yumi, we shall meet in flight!
Hey, audience! We'll be right back, yo!
Joining the fight shortly from Nakano, yo!
Yayoi runs off...
What now? She seems intent on joining our sortie...
That's a sortie I'm staying away from~ Wish someone would go and deal with her for me~
Yumi comes up to you.
Commander, do me a favor and find Yayoi some random opponent, thanks~
Would she settle for that, though?
Ah, just thought of something! She's going back to Empire Nakano all the way from here, right?
Yes. And from what she said before, she would be taking a bus then walking.
How about we sortie before she makes it back then?
Can't join us if we're already done with the mission!
Wow, that is low.
Serves her right for being such a pain in the ass~
In open space, contrary to Yumi's expectations...

Stances changed, taxi arranged!
Poor, "sexy" Yumi, her victory estranged!
This heavy shame weighting on Nakano—I'll make you feel it, mano a mano!

story_2-6-116.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Damn, Yotsuya Yumi! What's your problem, yo!

Your fighting is pathetic, attitude apathetic!
Your soul's so cryptic, it'd baffle a mystic!
Fight me seriously, fair and square, yo!
I dunno, last sortie was pretty much a battle, so that's a good place to end it off, right?
I do like my dangos, but this is a no-go!
Take it easy, huh? Not so easy, yo!
Can't you see, Miss Yayoi? Miss Yumi won't be going to Nakano anymore! She's back to working here now!
And I've told her that over and over again, but here we are.
There is a place for you in your company in Nakano, then and now!
So please! Spare Miss Yumi already!
Hey sister!

That's not gonna fly!
"Won't stop"'s my reply!
Not with this thrill, why!
Just stop it with the harrassment already!

I'm not harrassing!
'Tis a high-art battle!
Words fly, heartbreak shuttle!
Wow, she's like if one of my customers went punk and started stalking me or something.
Er, it's rap, not punk.
Tomayto, tomahto.
Past me sure didn't see this blowing up harder than anything at the hostess club.
It's not hard, just give her a fight, yo!
Yayoi just wanted a battle with you, yo!
Hah?

From beginning to end, that's been what I intend!
Again and again, why don't you comprehend?
Eh? But, like, you were going on about how I robbed you of your spot and everything else...

Dissing's part of how rapping beguiles!
All I'm asking for is to freestyle!
You...never hated or resented me at all?
Peace! A rap battle's not an act of hate, yo!

It's a sign of love, love for the community!
Love for your company, so full of unity!
And for your encounters, endless opportunity!
The hell? Sounds like a mess. How would I even understand?
Take the time to say it right, or you'll give the wrong idea.
...Looking back, running away like that, past me sure was a dumbass~!
Yo yo yo! That's the good flow, it feels so good! Keep it going and spin up some rhymes!
...I'm not gonna do that for you.
Not gonna do that for "yo"!
Wow!
Yo yo yo! You Narukozaka Actresses! You tha bomb, yo!
Yumi! Just say "yo, yo" from the start, yo!
Hold up, that's all there is to it?
Of course it is, yo! Feels so good!
That was all you had to do, yo!
Lots happened, but we're soulmates now, yo!
Now hold on for a second there! You've got to be kidding!
No way in hell am I going to play along with you any longer!

Who's your soulmate!
All night's my forte,
and you don't get to stay!

All this child's play.
Like a one-man play.
Rather roam the night and play!

This kind of wordplay,
all this working over trivial details is a real pain in the ass!
YO! Yumi my man! That's the spirit right there, yo!
Hah? The hell are you on about when you're the one not going along with that "spirit"!?
You know, that secret you're hiding behind all the rapping, I know all about it~

My secret you've seen?
A stand-up unseen?
What truth could you mean!?
Oh, but this really isn't my thing, spelling it out and all~ That'd make me look like the bad guy, you see~

Nuh-uh! Damn, Yumi!
Your threat rings hollow! No truth to follow!
I've seen your portrait. Namely, the one at Empire Nakano, right in your resume-
No, stop, please.
And so...
Did Yayoi leave~?
She did.
But not before leaving us a parting shot. "I won't forget this!" she said.
Ahahaha~
What kind of secret did you know that'd make Yayoi of all people run away like that?
Who knows~ I sure don't know much about it~ Wouldn't be telling you all even if I did, either~
Ah, sorry. I probably shouldn't be asking about others' secrets like that...
Yeah... I mean, she's got a lot going on too, no?
That's how life is—all kinds of things happen.
So that's why... I'm not a fan of when someone gets hurts in their lives, see?
Both getting hurt and hurting others, really...
...you get the idea~
Wow... You're amazing, Miss Yumi.
Anyways, now that that fiasco's taken care of, let's go and grab a drink!
I-I'm still a minor!
Not you~ You've still got some growing to do.
So, with that said, mind keeping me company tonight, Commander?

commands.command: We'll drink to your beautiful eyes. ♪

items.text: Let's go to a nice place then, and, ah, have a toast with the best bottle of wine we can find~

commands.command: Can't do...It's not pay day yet...

items.text: Figured you'd say that.
You know what, I'll treat you tonight.

commands.command: The thing is... I don't drink.

items.text: Then I'll be drinking your share for you as well.
And you can have some oolong tea instead.

story_2-6-116.text: Commander, sorry to interrupt at a time like this, but we just got a contact from the Director regarding something important.
