Narukozaka... seems to have entered a partnership contract with Empire Nakano, effective today.
...What do you mean by "partnership contract"?
It means that we, as two separate companies, will be working together in Actress affairs.
That being said... The two Actresses from there that we know of are actually the entirety of their roster.
Which is to say, we are effectively being asked to look after them.
Eeeeeeeeh!?
Are you kidding me? And here I thought I was finally rid of Yayoi, too.
Guess my lot in life just sucks, geez~
Well, I'm done dealing with this today.
You're coming with me tonight no matter what, alright, Commander?
See ya~
Yumi walks out of the office...
No way! You can't just do that-!
Yotsuyu and Fumika turn to you.
Commander!

story_2-7-117.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Wh-what do I do? This isn't working~
Aika! Don't put too much force into your hands, and stir at a consistent speed.
Grrrr!
Why in the world are we stuck dealing with this of all things!
It's something every newbie here has to go through.
Now c'mon! Five more times!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Meanwhile...
We are...required to have a Registered Dietitian, you say?
Yes, according to AEGiS regulations, once an Actress agency employs over ten Actresses at the same time,
They are required to have specialized dietary management measures in place.
Having in-house catering facilities is a part of that.
Ten Actresses... Wait, so we've done screwed up ever since Mai joined?
With Miss Koashi too, we are at eleven members now.
So what'd happen if we pretend those regulations don't exist?
An Administrative Order would be issued to Narukozaka,
And the company would be forced to suspend operations until you're complying.
Back over at Engineering...
The most important thing about making rice is how you wash the rice!
Gotta rinse your new grains lightly, and your aged ones thoroughly!
Okay!
As long as there's rice, you can live on! It's everyone's lifeline!
Wah~ It's starting to smell good~
Mmn, think I got it.
And then, once you master the trick to nabbing discount croquettes at the supermarket,
You guys'll become valuable members of our company!
Wait, where did Ayaka go?
Gone home already. Said "Jiiya will provide her with any rice she has need for" or something.
Aw, but this is so important for a newbie to experience...
Who said yer could cook rice in the Maintenance Area, yer nitwits!
What're yer gonna do if the vapor got into the machines!
But this is the only room with enough power for us to prepare the rice for all the new people!
Ain't we got a cafeteria 'ere? Get yer asses over an' cook yer rice there!
We have a company cafeteria!?
Returning to the office...
In short... Just get a company cafeteria set up for our Actresses here and it's all cool, right?
I suppose so. Murakumo had one as well.
Though... would we be able to finish it in time?
We have the facilities, at least, from back when Narukozaka was much larger.
It's been left unused for a while, but I suppose it wasn't as useless as I thought all this time.
The real problem is finding a Registered Dietitian, though.
Dietary guidance for Actresses is something that demands specialized know-how and experience.
Which, in practice, means that qualified professionals are in constant shortage.
Could AEGiS not assign us one?
We're running short in that regard too...
I can try looking for one, but it could take months before anything turns up.
And having our company shut down until then isn't an option we could afford.
We will start recruiting immediately. Please look for candidates within AEGiS as well.
Alright.
A dietitian specializing in Actresses...
Wonder how likely it is to just come across one out of nowhere~
Um... I may have one person in mind.

story_2-7-118.text: A familiar restaurant
Nnh... Doesn't seem like Miss Koyui is here...
We did meet her here before~
At Commander and Sitara's wedding!
That's not what it was!

commands.command: It was a welcome party for you and your friends, remember?

items.text: Was it~?

commands.command: Nope, it was a wedding reception!

items.text: Oh yeah!
But there was no cake~
When can I eat the wedding cake~?
The "reception" was just a joke from Sitara.
Um... I'd appreciate not being startled again over this.
Did that spook you? My bad~

story_2-7-118.text: Just when we asked the Commander to accompany us here, too.
She did say she wasn't working here!
Just came for the food!
A regular, then, maybe?
Or perhaps she is dining at many different places for professional reasons.
If we can't find her, then everyone at Narukozaka would have to stop working, right?
Kaede nods.
Not immediately, but AEGiS regulations would force us to unless we resolve this issue soon.
Another Actress-specialized dietitian would also suffice, but finding one would still be...
Koyui's worked in the caf at our old company, so she'll fit right in~
And she was looking for a job too, so it's perfect~!
Koyui gets her job~
Narukozaka gets out of trouble~
And I'll get to have her tasty food again~!
Yay, yay! So nice-!
Is Miss Koyui's food that great?
Oooh yeahhh! Super duper tasty!
The meat, the fish, the ramen, the soba, all great!
Oh oh oh, but the tastiest thing she makes is...
The rice! The rice! And the rice!
Ooh, I can't wait to try it!
Let's find Koyui as fast as we can!
Yeah!
Rin, Yotsuyu, you two are forgetting why we are doing this.
Hey, you loved her Japanese food too, Kaede~
Well... you are not wrong.
That flavor from her nimono was something I could never replicate...
Kaede! Think of this as a good thing for Narukozaka too!
You're right... With AEGiS regulations dictating that a Registered Dietitian is necessary...
It's not just for the AEGiS rules or for us Actresses either!
Miss Koyui's the only one who can save Engineering from discount croquette hell!
Yotsuyu, that isn't why-
We're definitely finding Miss Koyui! No matter what!
Yeeeah!
Wait, hold on! We shouldn't be ditching our usual duties for the search!

story_2-7-120.text: A familiar cafe
Umm... I don't think Miss Koyui is here either~
She was here the last time we came with Miss Yotsuyu though~
Say, once we find this Koyui person...
We won't have to deal with cooking and groceries anymore, right?
More than that, Miss Koyui's food is really great.
It'd be nice if you get to try it too, Mutsumi~
That good, huh. I'll be looking forward to it.
Well, good for you.
Even I must acknowledge the quality of her dishes.
But that isn't to say she could compare to my family chef!
Why don't you ask that chef to come, then?
Oh, I certainly could.
It doesn't work that way though, Mutsumi.
They'd need the certifications to be a dietitian, I think.
I see. Guess that's not happening then.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Meanwhile...
Kaede! I found someone!
Did you find Miss Koyui?
Ah, no, erm... I did find this person in the cafe though.
She's apparently stuck without a job, so I brought her here!
I'm Yorishiro Eri. Nice t' meet ya, Mister Commander.

The Sniping Shaman
Yorishiro Eri
So it was not Miss Koyui that you found.
Ah, but she can cook! She did work at the cafe and all.
Leave te cookin' t' me. I can have ya somethin' fierce made, like igamenchi and so.
Um... could you repeat that?
I've a prretty 'eavy Tsugaru accent with me, so hope ya can gimme a break tere.
Eri here's from Tsugaru, actually.
I can see that.
Are you qualified to be a dietitian? For Actresses, specifically.
I don't have them, but I can do Actress stuff so can't I?
That sounds like it works out to me?
I believe what she said was that she is an Actress, rather than a dietitian.
It was! Ya have it right sure.
Te cafe I was workin' at had me fired, and I've nowhere go with me now, so if ya'd lemme join ya.
Commander, please let Eri here join us! Please!

commands.command: Oh well. We'll hire her.

items.text: Thank you so much, Commander!

commands.command: I thought we're only looking for a dietitian?

items.text: Commander! What are you saying!
If you wouldn't help a person in need right in front of you, then I...
I'm not gonna follow you anymore!
I'll quit the company!
This, predictably, startles Kaede and Eri.
Yotsuyu, is that line of thought not a bit too rash-
What would you do if I actually meant that?
I'll do anything as long as you'd let Eri join us.
Think about it please!
Gee, ya'd go so far f'r me... I'm touched myself.
Mister Commander, I'm counting on ya.
The Commander was only reaffirming our need for a dietitian.
He was not necessarily opposed to you joining.

story_2-7-120.text: Tanks a bunch, Commander. Won't I do ma best f'r ya.
...then steps aside.
I wonder if this was for the best.
I'm gonna go and actually find Miss Koyui this time!
Yotsuyu leaves...
Yotsuyu, hold on. Our next sortie is soon.
...and Kaede watches in silence, her words falling on deaf ears.
...Looks like she's going either way.
Um... Commander.
I am personally in support of Yotsuyu's kindness and your judgement.
However... in terms of how Fumika will view this...
I can only wish you luck.
...I could not help you here, even if you give me such a look.
Excuse me, but I have a mission I must attend to.
And Kaede slips away...

story_2-7-122.text: The same cafe
Doesn't look like Koyui's here today either.
Pay attention, Sitara. I don't know what she looks like.
I can't! There are things more important on my mind right now!
Pass me some ideas here, too~ Y'know, about Tama-chan's situation.
What's the matter?
She still hasn't warmed up to anyone other than us in the company, that's what.
Ah. Then...
Sounds like you've got a plan! Say it out loud, c'mon!
We hold an internal game tournament.
That'll get Tama to open up to everyone.
Mutsumi... Oh, my dear disciple!
The path you intend to walk is one I had once taken!
But Fumikah, the dictator of Narukozaka, refused me in a display of inhumane tyranny!
Doo-doo-doo~
Hm...? How come?
So many consoles in the locker room but no game tournament?
The thing is, those are all mine!
If only we had a third to make a full team with...
*wink* *wink*
A bait that obvious isn't gonna hit, you know?
You're the only one who could help us here, Mutsumi!
No one else can do it!
No no no, you know I can't make Aika cry like that.
Yeeeah, sounds about right~
To begin with... If you, Tama and someone else go and form a team by yourselves,
What about Yotsuyu and Fumika then?
That slipped my mind!
Awkward silence ensues...
Just kidding~!
Yotsuyu's probably better off teaming with Kaede anyways.
And Fumika?
Well, in her case...
She'll go with whatever helps everyone else shine, instead of what's good for herself.
And if that'd help Narukozaka get back to its old glory days, then she wouldn't even hesitate.
That's just how she is.
Hm...
Say, think I was sounding pretty dramatic back there?
Didn't what I said sound cool?
Mmn... So, about the third member thing?
Mmmrgh...
Sitara got nothing! Sitara brain wrung more dry than Commander's!
Mmn... Let's head back, then? It's almost mission time.
Would've been a no brainer if I could rope Ginny into this~

story_2-7-124.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Virginia Glynnberets, joining this post as of today.

US-trained Sharpshooter
Virginia Glynnberets
Hey, Sitara!
Sitara is startled from being suddenly called out.
And you too, Mai!
Ginny...!?
Being Actresses in the same company without me, you two? C'mon, that's not fair!
Lemme in on the fun!
Waah, if Ginny's with us, then I...uhm... That, reassures, me a lot...
Wait, really!? You're planning to join up?
Virginia nods.
Yessiree!
What's the matter, Sitara? You're... against that?
Well... no, but,
I just thought she already had a job at some other company.
Back in Pentagon Shard, sure, but I quit before coming here to study.
So I'm free right now!
Th-then! You can be an Actress here with us!
Ah, um... Are you a soldier?
Yup! Active servicewoman right here!
Active in an FPS, more like~
That stands for "first-person shooter".
Or, in Japanese, "First-person shooting game"!
That's just English again!
It's a game genre where you shoot at things in first person~
Yup!
So you're Sitara's gaming friend?
Sitara nods.
That she is~
Sitara turns to you.
You wouldn't mind if Ginny here joins up, right, Commander?

commands.command: More Actresses is exactly what we're looking for.

items.text: Thanks Commander! Love you so much!

commands.command: But, I mean, Fumika...

items.text: Don't worry! You can leave the Fumika-wrangling to me!

story_2-7-124.text: Waah, thank you so much, Commander.
And now we can finally form a team, Tama-chan!
Nice, Tama.
Ah...uuuh...
I'm...so glad.
Some explaining later...
So basically, you went and recruited two more Actresses.
Not even a word about it!
All while I'm busy looking for a dietitian and handling the interviews.
One applicant I thought was a dietitian turned out to be a mere chef!
Another had the certifications but knew nothing about Actresses at all!
There was even some "ramen reviewer", quote unqoute, who "had a dream to open their own store"!
What even brought an idiot like that here!
And while I get to have my nerves frayed dealing with all that, Commander, you...

commands.command: To be fair, Sitara and Yotsuyu were the ones who brought them here.

items.text: What, trying to talk yourself out of this?

story_2-7-124.text: I'm not saying that I don't appreciate more combat-ready personnel.
However, if we don't manage to find a dietitian, the company itself will be in jeopardy.
Considering that, this is the absolute worst time to be increasing our labor costs.
A company has to be kept stable during the expansion stage, or cracks will show up right away.
Do you understand this, Commander?
Fumika's lecture would continue for another three and a half hours, all the way up to the scheduled sortie......

story_2-7-126.text: Everyone, finding Miss Koyui is now a matter of utmost urgency.
AEGiS is formally recommending us to improve our working conditions.
At this rate, I don't think the Admistrative Order is very far behind.
It means that we need to find Miss Koyui yesterday if we don't want to be suspended.
Okay, got it! Guess we're going foxhunting.
Following the trail of a target, and hunting them down—That sort of game, yeah.
If ye all're a fox huntin', then ya leave it to myself.
We're not hunting an actual fox, though.
We're looking for a woman named Miss Koyui.
Wha!? Ya gonna a person shoot? Ain't that cruel with ya!?
In any case, let's start by thoroughly combing the field.

story_2-7-128.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
After all this time... We still couldn't find Miss Koyui.
No, even after going to every single likely place we could think of.
I thought we'd find her right away too, with how easy to spot she looks....
Could it be that a lack of employment has forced her to return to her family?
Where does her family live?
In the Kanagata Shard, from what I hear.
God damn it.
Kanagata's only two hours from here on the Shinkansen!
We can't possibly charter a shuttle as fast as that!
Has there been no one turning up on AEGiS' side either?
I'm sorry, but it's going to take a good bit more time for that.
The excellent ones have all signed long-term contracts with other major companies.
We might have gotten someone if we applied even earlier.
It looks like we just started searching at a bad time.
Never would I have dreamt that our company would go under because we didn't have a cafeteria of all things.
How did it end up like this!? At this point it'd be easier to just look for another job!
Please calm down, Fumika!
I'm sure the Commander has a way to get us out of this!

commands.command: It's not over until the fat lady sings!

items.text: That's right! We still got a bit of time!
Let us give it our all until the very last moment.
Only a matter of time... We have to face the facts...

commands.command: Worry not! I'll find you all nice new jobs!

items.text: Commander... That's not it.
Please show us your the strength of your will, Commander.
Actresses are always in demand. If anything, it's you who would have the hardest time finding a new job.

commands.command: The dietitian you needed is right here!

items.text: Whoa! That's amazing, Commander!
I did not expect you to have the qualifications needed.
There's no such qualification in his resume.
And even if he earned them right now from someplace,
Would he have the required experience in dietitian work with Actresses?

story_2-7-128.text: Everyone. AEGiS has just issued a Heavy-class Vice alert.
It's in an area Narukozaka is responsible for.
Please mobilize immediately.
The Command Center receives a mysterious transmission...
Hello, everyone at Narukozaka~ Would you like some support~? Ready to head out whenever you are~
Ah yes! Erm, who might you be?
That will be up to our Commander to decide. Please give us a moment.
Alright~

story_2-7-130.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
An unrecognizably slimmer Koyui shows up at the office to greet everyone after the Heavy-class alert...
Hello, everyone at Narukozaka~ It's been a while~
Who might you be?
You must be the one who had supported us during the Heavy-class engagement.
I'm Oozeki Koyui.
No way!
I did a little dieting~
That's from dieting!? Seriously!?
How did you manage that? C'mon, tell me the cheat code!
Er... um... The truth is...
I couldn't find a job I liked, so I was in a low mood with a low appetite too~
A while later, and my weight was back to what it was while I was working as an Actress~
You were an Actress, Miss Koyui!?
That's how I joined Murakumo at first,
But I really wanted to have a food-related job, so I got my RD qualifications.
Though, since I can't find any place that'd hire me right now, I'm working as a freelance Actress in the meantime~
Is there an opening for an Actress-specific dietitian position out there somewhere, I wonder~?
Of course there is!
My~! Is that true?
Yeah! You're up, Commander!
I'd love it if you could tell me more about this job, Mister Commander~

story_2-8-131.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
I'm Oozeki Koyui, and I'll be joining this place from from today on~

Marshmallowy Dietitian
Oozeki Koyui
I'll be the dietitian and chef for your company cafeteria, and an Actress too~
It's a lot I'll be responsible for, but don't worry, I do have the proper qualifications~
In fact, tonight's dinner will be everyone's favorite: Hamburg steak~
Once again, I'm looking forward to working with all of you~
Now that we have found Miss Koyui, the dietitian problem should be resolved.
We've met the AEGiS requirement, yes, and even got more Actresses out of it as a bonus.
That is fourteen regularly employed Actresses we have now, with Miss Kouyi accounted for.

Rin will be overjoyed to be able to enjoy delicious meals here.
...The same goes for me, I must admit.
The members of Engineering were so happy they started tearing up, too.
We should be able to recruit more Actresses without worries now, I believe.
Hm, to reasonably defend all of our current zones,
We would need a total of five teams, meaning fifteen Actresses.
It seems that there is still a need to expand our Actress roster further.
That I am of little help in that regard is something I am deeply ashamed of.
If only I could refer someone to us like Sitara did...
Yes, well, that's the kind of contribution only Sitara could have made anyways.
And that's the least she could do, with how much she's been fooling around being useless otherwise!
You're our ace here, Kaede, so you're already doing good by being an example to everyone else in combat and training.

commands.command: Exactly! You're very reliable, Kaede.

items.text: Thank you. I will use every last effort for the mission I have been given.
WIthin reason, please. We'd rather you not collapse from overwork.

commands.command: You can leave the scouting to me!

items.text: I look forward to the good news, Commander.
Just keep our finances in mind, okay?

commands.command: Leave everything else to Fumika!

items.text: Oh? I don't think I heard that right.
I don't exactly mind taking care of menial tasks.
But surely you realize that utilizing us Actresses like so would be a terrible waste of resources.

story_2-8-131.text: Enter Yotsuyu...
Good afternoon!
Hello, Yotsuyu. I see you are late today.
Remember to let us know next time.
I'm really sorry! There was something I had to take care of...
Anyways! I brought Actresses from my school here just like Sitara did!
Your school? Didn't you say before that you were the only one there?
They transferred in recently! They're a grade higher than me, though, but there's two of them!
Two Actresses? That is impressive.
Enter Yotsuyu's two Actress friends...
Hey there! I'm Kotomura Akane!
And I'm Kotomura Amane. Nice to meet you.

The Kotomura Sisters
Leader: Akane
Subordinate: Amane
You see, they're twins!
I can tell.
It's pretty obvious from how they look.
Eh? Huh? Isn't it pretty amazing? They look almost the same and all!
Who cares about any of that!
Yeah! Just wait until you two meet Sitara and Rin. They'll be so surprised!
So please join us here at Narukozaka!
Are you an idiot!?
You really think either of us would join this dumpster fire of a company!?
We're here to crush you! C-r-u-s-h you!
What... What do you mean by that!
All those designated contractor zones you've been hoarding...
We're gonna rip every last one of them away!
Starting with Akasaka! We're challenging you for the zone!
S-Sis...
Akane, Amane! Just who are you two!?
We're Noble Hills Holdings! A company of the new era that's gonna revolutionalize the whole Actress industry!
Narukozaka and Murakumo are too old-fashioned and can't change for their own good!
So we're here to show you old-timers the door!
That's not happening!
I'm not gonna let you have your way! Even if my life's on the line!
Ahahaha! You're on, then! I'll show you just how strong I am!
C'mon, Amane, don't just stand there. Say something too.
I'll...give it a try...
Yotsuyu...
Mmmgh, what is it?
It's...just like Sis said.
I see...
Good job, Amane! Keep it coming!
W-we're gonna...crush Narukozaka...
You can look forward to your final days!
The twins leave...
Mmmngh! What even was that!

story_2-8-132.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
The petition from Noble Hills Holdings has been processed just now.
The contested areas are Akasaka and its neighboring sectors, namely: Yotsuya, Aoyama, Nogizaka,
Roppongi, Tameike-Sanno, and Nagatacho.
As with last time, The Designated Contractor statuses for these areas will be competed over-
-through a comparison of Vice Takedown Point totals within the alloted time.
Just like with St. Amalthea then. That's perfect!
We're not gonna lose this time!
This will be a great opportunity to showcase the fruits of our daily training.
Let us do our best, Yotsuyu!
Yeah!
Welcome back to Tokyo Actress News.
We'll be starting off the day with the Today's Newsflash corner.
Noble Hills Holdings, a new contender in the Actress industry, has initiated a contest with Narukozaka Manufacturing.
Known for their Shard redevelopment projects, Noble Hills intends to revolutionalize the Actress industry with similar methods.
And it looks like they have plans to conduct large-scale developments in the wider area of Akasaka, where their origin and heart of operations reside.
According to published info, the group currently hosts two Actresses:
Kotomura Akane, and her twin sister Kotomura Amane.
Certainly a cute pair, those two! But how will they measure up as Actresses?
And will Narukozaka be able to defend its territories this time?
We'll be providing full coverage of their competition in our Exciting Battles corner!
Stay tuned! ♪

story_2-8-134.text: It's finally time for Exciting Battles, the program you've all been waiting for!
Bringing you live the contest for the Akasaka regions-
-between Noble Hills and Narukozaka!
The program is abruptly turned off...
Nope! The results of the opening round are worth nothing other than getting in the way of recording anime!
Ah... We haven't gotten to the scores...
Both sides only took down small Vice this round, so it'd be 4,000 points.
Any difference would just be marginal!
And that's why there's no point in them.
Buuut if you really wanted to see it still, then worry not. I am recording it for Anna-chan reasons.
Anyways, forget all that, I've got an important announcement to make!
I've come up with a team name for us!
Waah~
Hooray!
And it is...
"Tri-Stella☆"!
"Tri...Stella"?
What does that mean?
Three stars, that's what!
We have the flag of Ginny's home country!
Yep! The good ol' Stars and Stripes!
Our Shards might be scattered to the four winds, but the Old Glory's still standing strong!
And you're a ballerina, Tama-chan, so we have the Etoile☆
Sitara... I don't think I deserve the highest rank in the Paris Opera Ballet...
Too late for the veto there!
And the last star is me, the star of Sitara!
Your star? Huh?
See, "Sitara" is Sanskrit for "Star"!
Kaneshiya Star, then!
Pretty much!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
And with that, here I am to register Tri-Stella☆ as our team name!
"Tri-Stella☆", you say?
Why in Italian then, instead of English, French or Sanskrit?
Shine, o star of Italia!
If you want to be an Actress, then go with Italia!
Yeah, not following.
Tri-Stella☆ covers everything, like how you can't go wrong with backlighting!
Tri-stella☆ shall evolve into Neo-Tri-Stella☆ ZMC,
Then to Rising-Tri-Stella☆!
Yup, I'm completely lost.
"Tri-Sitara" sounds like triple the nightmares for me.
Ah, triplets! That ought to beat those twins!
Not "Sitara"! "Stella"! They mean the same thing, yes, but not like that!
Then why not just go with "Tri-Sitara"? Why not try it?
A pun!? From you!?
Auuugh... Don't just go and change out the name I stayed up all night to come up with...
Commander! Let's go with "Tri-Sitara☆"!
We gotta use the power of triplets against the twins!
I said it's "Tri-Stella☆"...

story_2-8-136.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
At night...
The Kotomura Twins are sneakily doing something in the Maintenance Area, as...
Is someone there?
Hya!?
You two!? You were...from Noble Hills...? Is something the matter?
Not a thing! We're just here to pick up something we left behind!
S-sis...
At this time of the day?
We're leaving, Amane!
Akane leaves...
M-mhm... Wait for me, sis!
And Amane follows closely behind...
Kaede has a flashback of someone leaving her...
Wait... Big sis...
Big sis! Don't go!
Don't go!! Please!!
I suppose there was a time where I...
Not good... I shouldn't be...
Yer saw an Actress yer couldn't make out?
Yes.
She wasn't someone from Narukozaka?
Probably... Um... It was too dark to see.
Yer didn't see what she looked like?
Ain't likin' this. I'm runnin' checks just in case.
Oi Aruto! We're inspectin' every last piece of Weapon and Dress Gear we've got!
Right now!? Can't we leave it to tomorrow?
'Course not, yer lazy bum! We're gon' have to check everything the whole night! Get all of Engineering here, it's an emergency!
We're gettin' it all done before tomorrow's sortie!
Um... Please allow me to assist. I have some experience in this field.
I'll help out too!
I'm not that good at maintenance and stuff like that, but I can help clean and go fetch groceries!
'Preciate that, but this is a job for us Engineering folks.
Can't have yer in poor shape 'cause of us.
Yer might have to sortie tomorrow, don't yer?
Go back and get some good rest, that'd be yer jobs.
I ain't forgivin' yer if yer go without enough rest and screw up the mission!
I see... I understand.
Got it!

story_2-8-138.text: Welcome to another day of Exciting Battles, where we continue to follow the heated battle between Narukozaka and Noble Hills!
Both sides have been earning points bit by bit through exterminating small Vice up to the second sortie, but!
In round three, Narukozaka came in with a Heavy-class takedown,
Triumphantly claiming the lead and leaving Noble Hills in the dust!
That's the willpower of an old phoenix reborn from the ashes of decline on full display right there!
Does their challenger Noble Hills have any tricks up their sleeve to turn this around!?
We'll be looking forward to the efforts of Kotomura Akane and Amane from here on!
Do your best, you two!
Noble Hills Holdings HQ
What's up with that, Amane? Did you not properly screw with their gear?
*sniffle*... I did it just like you told me, Sis...
Hold on! Are you trying to blame this on me now!?
N-no, we got found by Miss Agatsuma that night, and...
Damn you, Agatsuma Kaede! You tattler! Coward!
Aren't we the cowards here for doing the sabotage...?
Hah? If you've got something to say, then spit it out loud and clear!
It's nothing...
Plan B it is, then! We're not stopping until the goons at Narukozaka goes "Yeowch"!
...Does anyone ever use "yeowch" in real life?
We've got everything prepared for! The fight's just getting started!
W-we're still going with it...?
Got a problem with it?
I-I'm not saying that...
Just do exactly as I say, and nothing will go wrong!
Got it, Amane?
...I'm sorry...Sis...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
The Command Center receives a transmission...
Ah, hello there! Narukozaka on the line!
I-is that you, Yotsuyu!? I'm Amane...Kotomura Amane...
She was...the one who snuck into Engineering last night...
Hmph, what is it? What do you want? Picking another fight?
N-no, that's not it... I got lost from my sister...
A-and...I've wandered into the zone of your next sortie...
I'm sorry... P-please send help...
What do we do, Commander?

commands.command: She needs protection. We'll mobilize right away.

items.text: You're right!
If she is in trouble, then we've got no other choice.

commands.command: Wait, this is a trap from the twins!

items.text: Even so, we cannot ignore her plea for help.
Exactly! Let's go rescue her!

commands.command: Sounds like a good chance to earn more points!

items.text: That's not right, Commander!
I do not believe it is good to think in such a way.
Regardless of circumstances, we should respond to any SOS signals immediately and offer assistance.

story_2-8-138.text: Let us rendezvous in the mission area.
In open space...
Thank you for the help!
Even I can do it if I try...!
Let me fight with you.

story_2-8-140.text: Welcome back to another round of digests covering the battle between Narukozaka and Noble Hills, a clash between the old and the new.
In round four, Noble Hills claims two Heavy-class takedowns, handily reclaiming the lead they allowed Narukozaka to gain!
All thanks to the younger Kotomura Amane! With her spectacular efforts,
Noble Hills turned the tables on Narukozaka and is coming out on top!
Meanwhile in this round, Narukozaka has earned no points at all!
What in the world could have happened with them!?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
What's up with that? We took down a Heavy-class, but we didn't get any points?
Perhaps AEGiS miscalculated the scores?
What actually happened, Miss Andou!?
I asked them about it, and,
Apparently the points from your last sortie were attributed to Kotomura Amane, who happened to be there.
That's not right! Why would they count it like that!
According to AEGiS' assessment, Amane was the one who contributed more during the mission.
There's no way that's true! Please tell them to check properly!
As much as I'd like to...
Is this...another one of the twins' tricks...
The assessment was done by the AEGiS Tactical Evaluation System and multiple judges,
And under very strict standards.
There's not much I can really...
Yotsuyu. Pressing Miss Andou would not overturn the results.
Let us do our best in the next mission and regain our lead instead.
Mmmrgh... You're right. We're definitely gonna turn this back around!
Noble Hills Holdings HQ
See? Turned out exactly like how I said it would, didn't it?
B-but... It seems like we did something bad... I...
Hah? What're you on about? Narukozaka's the bad one here!
That's why not even AEGiS sided with them this time!
It's because we're in the right!
Maybe, but... it feels like we took advantage of Miss Hirasaka and Miss Agatsuma...
Are you saying you won't listen to me, Amane?
N-no, Sis.
We don't need to pity them. They're the ones responsible for... our dear Nagi.
Mhm... I know. I'll keep, doing my best.
That's right. We're gonna do this by our own hands.
Narukozaka's gonna be left as a smear on the floor.
We're just getting started!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
The Command Center receives a transmission...
Let's see now! How's it going, you Narukozaka Actresses!
Feel like giving us Akasaka yet?
Not a chance!
We refuse!
Not like you're gonna be able to keep it from us anyways... Annoying bunch.
We aren't gonna give up without trying our best!
This victory shall be ours to claim.
Kaede!
Guess I'll just have to put you out of your misery then!
Go ahead! Struggle until the end!
The call ends...
You think they're gonna try something again?
Whatever they intend to do, we need only to fight them fairly.
Alright!
In open space...
Akane joins the battle with a scrambled signature...
I'll show you what I can do!

story_2-8-142.text: The battle for Akasaka between Narukozaka and Noble Hills is finally reaching its climax!
To recap, both sides started out with similar scores, but Narukozaka broke the silence in round three and rose to the lead with a Heavy-class takedown.
One round later, Noble Hills' Kotomura Amane took down two, and turned it around!
And now in round five, with Noble Hills in a wide lead...
Their Kotomura Akane, with fierce determination, claimed a Heavy-class takedown of her own as well!
With this, Noble Hills now leads with their 48,000 points.
And Narukozaka ends the round with no points gained once again... Just what is going on with them this time?
In any case, the final sortie is finally upon us!
Narukozaka! We're all waiting to see you rise back up! No giving up now!
Do your best, everyone!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Noble Hills took our points again...
If they were just better than us, then I'd have no choice but to accept our loss, but...
How could they do this...
I'm sorry. I tried to lodge a protest too, but...
I couldn't exactly go against my superiors' decisions...
I see AEGiS hasn't changed at all.
What do you mean by that, Fumika?
The big shots causing problems the last time should've been arrested and fired.
While Murakumo's upper management and the colluding AEGiS officials were indeed dismissed...
That only placed more power into the hands of the factions tied to other companies.
But didn't Miss Kasumi say that we're supposed to inherit what Murakumo left behind?
Not everyone is taking kindly to the idea, I imagine.
Unfortunately, Fumika is right.
There's nobody willing to support us?
There probably were a good amount, seven or eight years back...
But apparently some kind of incident happened at some point, and now...
Well... how should I break this to you...
They're, well... a minority... if any still exists at all...
There's none!?
There are many on the anti-Narukozaka side, at least.
St. Amalthea is one of them as well, if you remember what they did to us.
And on top of that, how we were treated during the Murakumo merger crisis. It's plain to see.
Aww... At this rate, they're gonna take Akasaka from us!
Is there nothing we can do!?
How are we supposed to win when they've even got the judges bought out?
Kaede thinks to herself...
At a time like this, what would my sister...
No... That isn't it... I need to ask that to myself.
Big Sis is no longer here. If I were to decide... What would I want to do here?
In the meantime, Yotsuyu and Fumika discuss options...
We need to think about how to minimize the damage.
How?
Hm, for example, reconciling with Noble Hills, perhaps.
As a thought, conceding Akasaka and the other zones to them, and focus on maintaining Shinjuku?
Aren't we just surrendering to them then?
Better that than losing everything.
I can't accept that!
If we lost in a fight, then sure, but we shouldn't just give up from the start without even trying!
Negotiating is a way to fight too.
Um... I was thinking...
What's up, Kaede! You have a good idea!?
Kaede shakes her head.
No, not that...
I was thinking about what exactly we are fighting for.
It should not be for AEGiS, nor points,
Nor zones, nor... any company either.
We should not fight the Vice for such things, instead-
I get that! You're exactly right, Kaede!
We're fighting to protect everyone, right!?
I was almost forgetting something that important!
Good point. We should be prioritizing repelling the Vice, instead of all this political nonsense.
I am not saying that the company isn't important.
However, we should fulfull the basic duty of an Actress first and foremost.
Yeah!
The Command Center receives another transmission...
The twins again!
Heyo! How's it hanging?
This is Narukozaka, yeah?
Are you Akane? Or Amane?
We don't need any more "support" from you!
Aw~ Really? And Kasumi told me to drop by and all~
Miss Ootori Kasumi from AEGiS?
E-yup~ I'm joining you either way, so let's do our best together~!
Is she really from AEGiS? She sounds so casual and everything.
That voice, could it be... But, there's no...
Something the matter, Kaede?
No, it's nothing.
In open space...
Kasumi asked me to come give you a hand, so here I am~
A-nyways~ Let's go get 'em~

story_2-8-144.text: Welcome back to Exciting Battles!
And today, the results of Narukozaka and Noble Hills' competition for Akasaka are finally in!
Narukozaka ended their final round with a whopping three Heavy-class takedowns!
Their feat has earned them 54,000 points, easily overcoming Noble Hills' lead while their guard was down!
Sure does make one wonder what those two zero-point rounds were about!
In any case, Narukozaka has defended their zones while showing us just how tenacious an industry veteran can be!
A big congratulations to all of the Actresses at Narukozaka!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
We did it! We came out on top! A victory for Tri-Stella☆!
A victory right out of our debut, pretty good!
Umm... Did we... even do all that much?
If we didn't, then all the more reason for us to pretend we did!
Ah... Good point...
The power of Tri-Stella☆ has saved Narukozaka from doom!
Yup! Sitara, Mai, we're the best!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Training Gym
We won-! Woohoo-!
Is there a need to be overjoyed?
Well, y'know, it probably means we get to have good food!
Of course~ We're having a party tonight~ Look forward to it~
Ye gettin' savage lotta bite sure, ye wait and see!
W-o-w! Nice, nice~!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Front of Office
It's a good thing Narukozaka won~
For sure. Nobody likes to lose...
I was... actually really worried that we'd lose again.
Oh, but there wasn't a moment when I was worried.
After all, how could a company with me in it possibly lose!
Alright, we should work harder and harder too.
We're not quite done yet.
Why of course! We are still going to become the strongest team in Narukozaka!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Gramps! We're having a party tonight to celebrate!
Let's wrap things up at the standard time today!
Yer idiot! That'd be after we finish checkin' up all the Alice Gear sets that went out today!
Aww, don't say that~ It'd put us into overtime for sure~!
If yer think so, then shut that blabberin' trap of yer's and put yer back into it!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Commander. While we have won by a hair's breadth this time, it looks like the corruption within AEGiS runs deeper than we had imagined.
One does not need to be as righteous as Yotsuyu to be angered by this.
We must make AEGiS reform by our own hands! It's high time we purged the corruption from their ranks!
Aren't you the one letting blood rush to your head, Fumika~?
Rage about reform all you want, but another faction's just gonna take the place of the last one, no?
Are you saying that we should do nothing then, Yumi?
That's not what i meant~
But you know, it's not idealism that drives people to do things, it's greed.
So, what we should do is grow and expand, until they can't possibly ignore our existence anymore.
Then they'll come flocking to us, like bees to honey.
We'll see how that goes.
Noble Hills Holdings HQ
What the hell! That wasn't supposed to happen!
Nobody told us that Narukozaka would get an AEGiS squadron on its side!
Grr! Just you watch! We'll get our revenge yet!
Sis...
Kaede has another flashback of her sister leaving her...
Big Sis... Wait...
The flashback ends...
Was that...Big Sis!? Or...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
There is no way my lost sister could be at AEGiS after all this time...
But, if that's the case, then just who was...
Enter Yotsuyu, interrupting Kaede's train of thought.
There you are, Kaede!
Yotsuyu!?
The party's starting soon! C'mon! We should head over!
I see.
You okay? You look like you've got something on your mind.
If you don't mind me, I'll always be here to hear you out!
No, it is nothing. I...
I am... nobody else but myself.
Yeah! You're you, Kaede.
The Actress I admire...
Eh? Um... Did you say something just now?
N-n-nothing!
Let's get changed and head to the cafeteria already! Everyone's waiting on us!
Yotsuyu dashes off...
...I should not be clinging to my sister any longer.
Not with... everyone waiting for me now.

story_3-1-145.text: My name is Hirasaka Yotsuyu, age 15! I'm working as an Actress here at Narukozaka Manufacturing!
I've done my best with the Commander who happened to join on the same day I did, and by now the company's gotten big!
Agatsuma Kaede, an Actress I look up to from our rival Murakumo Industries, somehow ended up joining us too!
While we lost to St. Amalthea Girls Academy...
And things got heated with Noble Hills and their dirty tricks,
I'm doing very well! I'll do my best at work today, too!
...Um, what's this for, Sitara?
Acting out the start of a shoujo manga.
I figured it was about time for a monologue like that!
We don't need that kind of thing.
That's right, Sitara. If it's a shoujo manga, shouldn't the opening monologue be more lyrical and poetic?
Not that kind, either.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
All of you are too loosened up!
...Wha!
What's too loosened up? Is it the Commander's stomach fat going boingity-boing~?
Eh? Is that what it is?
Miss Koyui's food is tasty and all, but eating too much of it isn't good for you.
Yeah, yeah... That one is a whatever.
It's your minds going lax that's the problem here!
Ever since we won against Noble Hills, everyone's been far too relaxed.
That's true, we've been taking it easy.
"Tighten your helmet strings after a victory", as the saying goes, Yotsuyu.
Got it! I'll do that! I'll tighten up!
And now we move on to the main topic!
There will be a guest visiting us later today!
And this guest is very, and I mean very, important to our company.
Mmn... So the "customer is god" approach, understood!
A god!? We're getting an absolute god of a guest!?
Ah... That's not...
That doesn't work against this bunch, Kaede. Instead...
Shut the hell up and listen, you goddamned brats!
...Y-yes ma'am!
...Continuing on.
This guest that's coming is a wonderful person-
-who might offer to sponsor Narukozaka and deliver us from certain demise.
Do not, and I repeat, DO NOT offend them in any way!
Um... Fumika...? Wouldn't Narukozaka itself be our sponsor?
Y-you're not trying to sell us off, right!?
Don't tell me the Actress business here is getting sold away or something!
What made you think that was even a possibility? As you all should be aware, our company is on the smaller side.
Our budget is nowhere close to Noble Hills' or St. Amalthea's,
Not to mention Murakumo, who was a part of the gargantuan Yashima Group!
That's why we have been looking for corporate supporters for a long time.
A very long time.
Oh so very, very long of a time... We've spent searching for one.
W-we get it already.
We've only managed to find this sponsor after thoroughly working our connections, and talking to AEGiS no less.
So like hell are we going to let them slip away!
Understand? Absolutely! Do not! Be impolite to them! Even if it kills you!
Wahwah! Um, umm... Our guest is here.
Please show them in, Aika.
A-all right!
Make sure to watch your mouths, all of you!
You too, Commander!
Enter Meika.
Wassup~!
's Yorozuka Meika heeeere~ Howsy~
What is this, Aika? An Actress looking to join us?
We are expecting an important guest, so please leave for the day.
If they see that we have such a crude Actress in our ranks, that sponsorship deal is as good as dead.
Y-you're mistaken! Umm, ummmm...
But Meika's here to be Narukozaka's sponsor~
So not cool~ Such a bummer~
Well, I'm outta here, then.
Meika walks to the door...
Wait, hold on for just a second!
...and comes back.
Huh? But I'm still mad AF from the "crude" thing~
U-uhm... Are you really from the company offering to sponsor us?
Wowie, I can't believe you don't trust me.
And our brand's pretty deep in the apparel, accessories and cosmetics industries too~
You seeeeriously don't know about Meika, the fire model-slash-CEO? For realsies?

The Charisma Model Fashion CEO
Yorozuba Meika
Absolutely uncool~
Of course we are aware of you. We would be very glad if you would sponsor-
Say it, then?
What's Meika's brand called?
Oh, yes, of course, we do know the name, what was it called again... Uhm...
Unbelievable. Are you seriously unaware of their name?
Ayaka pulls out a fashion catalogue.
It's <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color>! Sheesh.
No one sensible would hear "Yorozuba Meika's fashion brand" and not think of <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color>!
No doubt!
<color=#ff32aaff>P-PinCy</color>!?
<color=#ff32aaff>Pink Cyclone</color>, or <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color> for short！
Eeeeey! Girl gets it~
I-I sincerely apologize for the offense.
S'cool, s'cool~ As long as ya know it~  For now, I'm all forgivesies~
And, on account of Ayaka sporting your brand's product, please forgive us for being uninformed.
...Deadass?
Fumika, are you kidding me!?
Eh? But, aren't your clothes from her brand...
Obviously not! Is your basic knowledge truly that flawed!?
But... I thought for sure...
I swear! Fumika! Just stay shut!
My most sincere apologies for this.
Yup, de~f feelin' it now~ <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color>'s still got a long way to go~
That was only my inadequate knowledge in the subject matter. There is no doubt that Miss Meika and <color=#ff32aaff>Pink Cyclone</color> are both very popular names.
That obviously fake sweet talk gets me so tired... Just drop it, 'kay~
There is no need to say such things. If possible, we would be extremely grateful for you to become our sponsor.
'Course we'll do that!
If we're not that famous yet, then high-key we need to hand out a whole lotta sponsorships, no?
You're willing to!?
Well, I've got a few termsies~
Of course, as our sponsor, your demands will be respected as much as possible.
Then, get some <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color> on aaaaaall your Actresses here~
It's a <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color> promo, all righty?
T-that's...
Same goes for the Commander there, so go get 'em~

story_3-1-146.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Fumika shows Meika Yotsuyu's and Kaede's Combat Suits.
Usually, Actresses sortie in Combat Suits like these.
Hah? 'Course I know that much, why?
I'm afraid that...
...It'd be difficult for us to sortie in <color=#ff32aaff>Pink Cyclone</color> clothes.
Ain't all Actresses flying 'round with Alice Gear shields that protect ya?
Why stick with those super-duper lame Combat Suits then?
It improves the efficiency of Emission conduction from Actresses to Weapons and Dress Gear units,
In addition to being a necessary safety precaution for the worst case scenario.
Meika takes a closer look at Yotsuyu's Type 88 Combat Suit and Kaede's DM00-M...
...For Suits that show cleavage or lots of thigh like those,
<color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color>'s definitely got that cutesy-dirty style down better, if that's whatcha want.
Eeeey! Got the good vibes coming now!
<color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color> can design your Combat Suits too~
And we totes hafta make your Gear all matchy-coordy too.
Ahaha... Sounds good...
T-that aside, would you like to see what Actress combat looks like for the time being?
Wha? Wha? For realsies?!
At the mo, let's see how Narukozaka's Actresses fight~

story_3-1-148.text: A'ight, now I've seen how y'all fight, but...
We beat the Vice like we're supposed to!
Um... What could you mean by that?
Being serious here... Real dull, don't ya think?
Really? Even though we were shooting them up left and right, and with a bunch of flashy explosions?
Just the Vice and the shooty stuff that's eye-catching, then?
What's the point if the Actresses themselves are a yawn?
For realsies, there's... not enough cuteness?
Like, face the camera and put on a cool face!
Strike some kinda pose like this!
Gotta have those kinds of appeal, get me?
Can't sleep on charm points just because you're fighting~
Eh? You mean, like that just now?
Itty-bittiest you can do if y'all still want that <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color> sponsorship ♥
Uuu... We just have to do it, right?
If you can't even do it here, then howcha gonna do it in a fight?
Yo~ 'Sup~ And this and this, and that and that~
Mmm... Looks a lil' bit off-
Not like that, you two~ Like this~
Try something like that next time you go fight, thankies~

story_3-1-150.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
One more sortie later...
Real talk, y'all look so stiff~
It was in the middle of combat, after all. Everyone takes it very seriously.
If ya say so. What do we do, then?
Howsabout you show me aaaaaaall the Gear you use for now?
Kaede shows a set of Narukozaka's equipment to Meika.
Like so?
Yi~ikes. Su~per lame~ Can't bear to look at 'em~
Don't the vibes totally die from all this gray Gear?
Ooh, your lil' Meika's got the sickest plan~!
Just paint it all pink, cool? Then y'all can fly out there in matchy stuff!
Um... I don't quite understand why...
Matching our equipment would make our offense too unvaried, and compound our weaknesses.
It is plausible that a standardized pink coloring may improve morale, but...
For me, that's...
Hah? You gonna shoot down lil' Meika's absolutely blessed plan right off the bat?
So uncool~ Why you gotta be so cold~?
Guess I'll nope outta the sponsorship deal~
Fumika hears this.
P-please wait!
Th-that was just Kaede's personal opinion!
Then, what's your take, Fumi-fumi?
"Fumi-fumi"!?
Of course, we would, gladly... make our equipment, all p-pink...
Everyone! Having matching pink Gear is very fly!
That saying's so last decade, Fumi-fumi. You from the stone age or somethin'?
F-Fu-Fumi-fumi's a 16-year-old high school girl!
Meikacchi's idea is totally tubular! B-blessed, right!?
Ah, gotcha! Fumi-fumi's p-much gotten what I mean, yeah?
N-no doubt! E-eeeey......
Um... Fumika... You don't have to force yourself as much as...
I-I'm totally not forcing myself~ Fumi-fumi's always been this type'a gal~
Right, Commander?

commands.command: Come back to your senses, Fumika.

items.text: What could you mean by that?
For real! No commenting on this, 'kay!

commands.command: Don't bring your problems to me.

items.text: Fumi-fumi here's getting real mad.
Commander's the one who shoulda been running this from the start.

commands.command: Go get 'em! Ya on fire, Fumi-fumi!

items.text: Eeeey! 'preciate it, Commander!
Fumi-fumi's Narukozaka LOVE spirit's super bad, y'know?

story_3-1-150.text: How long're yer gonna keep spewin' that crazy crap!
Yer think what we engineers do 'ere 's all fun n' games!?
If yer gonna just throw gear onto Actresses with no thought t' what fits 'em,
Well yer can do it o'er my dead body!
Aruto! Get 'er outta 'ere! And make sure she never comes back!
Gh-ahahaha! Mad cold! What a riot!

story_3-1-152.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Meika walks into the lounge.
Sup! Where's Fumi-fumi and Kae-bae?
"Fumi-fumi"!? "Kae-bae"!?
Fumi-fumi's out cold in the sick bay~
As for Kae-bae~ She's swinging away furiously with her practice sword in the gym~
Heheheh... If that was a real sword, she'd probably have killed someone by now...
Ah, um, you see...
Fumika and Kaede are both on break.
Then, you'll do okies, Yo-tsyun and Sitaracchi.
"Yo-tsyun"!? "Sitaracchi"!?
Hm, hm~ Okay, got it.
So, wassup, Meikacchi?
'member that Narukozaka improvement plan your lil' Meika was cookin' up?
That dry-ass fighting style of yours totes gotta go, that's what I'm seeing.
Hmmm... I see!
...I don't get it at all.
With ya Suits, or Gear, or getting the sick poses and looks down, none of that's gonna get fixed in a day.
So then, why don't ya just pop 'em charm points quick here and there? That's an easy one.
How are we supposed to be more charming in the middle of a fight?
For a start, cool it with the "Ya!" and "Tei!" stuff, ya get me?
Eh!? Then, what would I say?
Well~ As your sponsor, methinks it'd be nice to get my brand out there~
Um, I think it was... <color=#ff32aa>Pink Cyclone</color>, right?
That! 'xactly that, yup!
When you attack, yell "<color=#ff32aa>PinCy!</color>"
And go with "<color=#ff32aa>Pink Cyclone!</color>" on a finishing blow!
We're... supposed to say these while fighting?
Loud 'nuff to be heard over the TV broadcast, eyup~!
C'mon, try it! Give it a go!
<color=#ff32aa>Pin...PinCy...</color>
Can't hear you!
<color=#ff32aa>PinCy!!!</color>
The finishing move!
<color=#ff32aa>Pink Cyclone!!!</color>
Okay, okay~ 'member to say that from your next fight, thankies~
Meika-tan must have brain damage from the lack of oxygen...
Wha? F'real? But Meika here's the picture of health~
Sponsor or not, shouting in combat like that is a little...
Huh? I thought you liked that kind of stuff, Sitara.
Nothing wrong with shouting out Tri-Stella☆'s finishing attack, right?
We cannot turn back the hands of the clock.
Shouting out your power moves like that just isn't realistic!
If a sponsor tells us to make our Alice Gear transform and combine from three into one, that I can tolerate!
If anything, it's what I want!
But... No to shouting attack names! ...I don't wanna do it!
I'm... sick of this!
Sitara runs off...
...then comes back a few moments later, as a part of her act.
Do you get it? Miss Meika!
...Nah, not at all, ya said something about hands on a clock?
Is that what it is to be young!? Do I have to "correct" you from there!?
Anyways, just repeat the brand names for me, thankies~♪
Meika leaves...
<color=#ff32aa>Pink Cyclone...</color>
Well, you got your battlecry. Isn't that great, "Yo-tsyun"?
Uuu... This isn't what I thought it'd be like...
<color=#ff32aa>Pink Cyclone!</color> Move out!
At least go with Tri-Stella☆...

story_3-1-154.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Yet another sortie later...
I'm real mad right now~  That just ain't cool! Are y'all for real~!?
Lil' Meika here's asked y'all to say "<color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color>", but ya ain't doing it~
What's this sponsorship even for then?
It's just too hard to remember to do that in a fight.
Hah? F'real? Seweiously?
Of course I am!
'kay, guess the only option left's to make <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> the team name?
Team name? Then...
Absolutely not-!
Tri-Stella☆'s got a proper meaning behind it!
Hah? I'm the one decidin' who's going in Team <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color>, though~
W-who're you gonna go with?
Going by the <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> image, it'd be...
M-me!?
Um... Why is it me who was chosen?
My candidacy was all but expected, but...
Ten-outta-ten! Y'all got the visuals down pat! F'real, this is <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> right here!
Forming a team based on the colors of our casual clothing seems...
Would my image not be better described as "brilliance" rather than "cyclone"?
And, while I'm fine with Kaede, why in the world must Yotsuyu be here too!?
This I cannot stand for!
For me, well... I feel like a long gakuran uniform or something fits my image more than pink.
And those clothes, 'em coordination's pretty divine too, yeah?
<color=#ff32aa>Kae-bae? Yo-tsyun? 'yaka-cho?</color>
Team <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color>! Don't y'all look like you could be a breakout? Def worth a try, am I right?
Hey Commander! Send 'em out, thankies~
No! I refuse!
Sortieing so recklessly with no teamwork training... Is this the best idea?
As long as I'm with Kaede, I don't mind!
We got the cutie dream team right here! Knock 'em dead out there, Team <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color>!

story_3-1-156.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
"Team PinCy"'s sortie comes and goes...
This ain't righty~?
The Team <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> lil' me was thinkin' of deffo ain't like that.
I mean, sortieing in casuals just isn't...
The Head Engineer's gonna get mad at us.
Ah... In addition, sortie team compositions are up to the Commander's discretion.
The right to select the most fitting Actresses for a given mission is something not even a sponsor could have.
Well, not that my team ever had the <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> image in the first place.
None of that makes sense!? The heck am I being a sponsor here for then?
How would we know?
No flyin' out in <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> clothes, no color or deco on your gear, n' not even the dream team idea worked out~
No cool look or pose either, and ya even forgot to shout the brand names. Gotta be kidding~
You Narukozaka Actresses really got no sense!
Wait, please! We'll figure it out! We'll do something about it!
But... Fumika, I don't mean to be rude, but, I don't think we can actually do anything about it...
There's no time for any of that while we're in the middle of fighting Vice!
Wha!? 'Course ya got time for that!
You're not an Actress, Meika, so "ya wouldn't get it"!
Hah? Your lil' Meika here's got all the leeway in the world!
Some blessed appeal like that? I can show you, easy~
There's no way you'd be able to do it!
Real pissed here now! That, nuh-uh, no way I'll let that pass! I'm outta here!
Meika leaves, seemingly for the last time...
Aaaah-!!
Ah, there she goes...
All the effort I spent to get us the sponsorship, all gone...
You've gotta be kidding me...
I-I'm sorry, Fumika.
A downtrod Fumika walks away...
Commander! I'm sorry about all this!
I'll make up for what I've done! I'll put my life on the line!
Yotsuyu. Meika's anger is partially my fault as well.
I suppose I must help.
You couldn't possibly handle this alone anyways.
Kaede! Ayaka!
I'm very sorry for dragging everyone into this...
Let's work together from now on as well! As teammates!
D-don't get the wrong idea. I am not doing this for you!
I just loathe flattering sponsors for a mere pittance of money!
I, too, think "Team <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color>" is a little...
Kaede leaves...
Aww, we can be a team without the PinCy thing, too~
And Yotsuyu follows...
I swear. There is no helping her.
Ayaka turns to you.
What! Stop staring at me and let us sortie already! We have a mission to do!
In open space...
Eeeey! 'Kay, yeah~ Your lil' Meika's got a cray cray look, eh?
Anyway, get a good look of my divine appeal now, thankies~

story_3-1-158.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Good work y'all!
Is it just me or was 'em Vice back there way too cray-cray?
Lil' me's like, "Might be real bad?" and then ya came rolling in~ Real thankies for that~!
You had an Actress license, Miss Meika!?
Eeeyup! Got the aptitude, so I nabbed it back in my high school model days~
Real help with the cash I needed for my shop, what with how easy it was to make a killing back then~!
What a riot, right!
Still went out a few times when <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> first started, promoting the brand bein' worth going through hell 'n all~
Been a while since I flew tho', but that really be tougher than pulling an all-nighter~
And ya Narukozaka Actresses are so good you can actually go n' fight those big bad Vice?
You guys're the best~ A little divine, even!
Well~ Ahaha...
Ah right! I'm so sorry for saying that you weren't an Actress earlier!
Oh yeah, 's all cool.
You were right, Yo-tsyun, fighting is rough, you really don't got time to do that stuff I said.
Un-possible~
Tell Kae-bae and 'yaka-cho I'm sorry~
Will do!
Where's Fumi-fumi?
Eeeey! Wassup~!
<color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color>'s gonna be Narukozaka's sponsor.
And no terms! Just get me the contract to sign, thankies~
Wha? F'real? Meikacchi, you sewious?
"If we are to aim for becoming a public company in the future, it's only natural that we offer support to the careers of excellent women."
Some kinda stuff like that.  I'll go get the board and bank to legit commit for now~
T-thanks a bunch!
Naw, thank YOU for the awesum reception~ Fumi-fumi, you're just divine~!
Meika leaves.
Anyways, bring on the hype-!
...Fumika, I'm feeling respect for you from the bottom of my heart.
Wha... Whatever do you mean?
N-not a word of this to everyone else!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
One week later...
Narukozaka receives a call...
Oh, hello! Narukozaka here!
Ah, Miss Meika!
Hope you've been doing well. I'll get the Commander and Fumika on the line.
Fumika~ Miss Yorozuba's calling in!
W-wassup... F-Fu...Fumi-fumi here...
Eh!? Ah, alright... I'll speak normally.
Anyways... I believe you are calling about the sponsorship contract?
We sent you a draft the other day, have you confirmed its contents yet?
...Sorry, for real. Straight up need to apologize for this...
The sponsorship deal... let's just pretend it never happened.
Huh? Why!?
Is there a problem of some kind? Could we ask for an explanation if possible?
It's, uh... kinda hard for me to say...
But uh... I'm sure you'll see pretty soon...
Meika hangs up...
What!? What was up with all that!?
......I dun geddit~
Eh, eh? Fumika?
What now!? I'm the one who wants an explanation here!
This just doesn't make any sense...

story_3-2-159.text: This just in:
An emergency press conference was hosted by the AEGiS press secretary moments ago-
-announcing the results of internal hearings on the Murakumo issue.
It was revealed that further regulatory breaches were discovered during the investigation,
Implicating the corporate inheritor of Murakumo's former enterprises:
Narukozaka Manufacturing.
The exact details of the legal violations have not been announced.
However, according to reports from various sources,
Murakumo's problematic new equipment, which featured falsified testing data,
was discovered to have used Narukozaka-manufactured components.
This raises the suspicion that Narukozaka is also involved in the data fabrication scandal in some way.
If they really did bribe the regulatory authorities and commit those crimes, then there's simply no forgiving them.
I do hope the truth comes to light as soon as possible.
This is Usamoto Anna, reporting live.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Wa-ha~! Anna-chan's ultra-rare angry face! Soooo cuuute~!
To hell with "cute"! My blood, sweat and tears, all turned to this...
F'real, un-possible~
Aaah, Fumika! Get a hold of yourself!
Yet again... Another Murakumo problem brought to Narukozaka...
And you too, Kaede! This isn't the time to be feeling down!
Let's just go ask the Head Engineer about the parts thing for now!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
That new gear from Murakumo? How 'bout yer ask them instead?
But, Murakumo no longer exists as a company...
The news said it was using parts from us.
Well, we ain't makin' our own Gear no more,
But parts production? That we've still got.
Our precision machining tech's no worse than anythin' the bigger corps got to give.
Really?
Yer youngins ain't got a lick o' knowledge 'bout our company, eh?
That parts production line's the one reason why Narukozaka's still afloat.
It's not just Murakumo buyin' our products, we're talkin' Yashima, EF, Sentence,
Even the AEGiS ADA!
Yer order, we deliver.
And the specs're always a cut above demands.
If somebody's tryin' t' smear us, well they can bugger off.
It's got nothing to do with Narukozaka, then!
'Course not! We ain't low enough t' do that kinda shady business!
Good thing we came and asked you, Mister Iwata. Thanks for the reassurance.
Iwata goes back to work.
Something the matter, Kaede?
If Narukozaka's components are not to blame,
Then why did AEGiS make a press release of that nature?
Mmnh... You're right!
They've really gotta do a better job!
This has to be those anti-Narukozaka factions Fumika was talking about, I just know it!
Kaede falls into thought...
Murakumo was a sensible target with many valid justifications...
But Narukozaka... Why target it at all?
Because of the power it inherited from Murakumo? Is that truly all there is to it?
...Kaede?
Ah, I'm sorry.
We've gotta get back at them! Let's send over a complaint! Tell them we didn't do anything bad!
True. This time... I wouldn't like to have any more regrets.
Their foul play must not be forgiven. Let us ascertain what is truly happening here.
To protect the place where we belong.
Yeah! Let's do our best together, Kaede!

story_3-2-160.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Fumika is talking to Meika over the phone...
Gonna keep it real here– We've got an image to keep up, y'know–
And if we wanna do a sponsorship, we've gotta score financing from the bank.
Real sorry, Fumi-fumi. P-much nothin' I can do now.
Not at all, many thanks for all of your effort...
Mebbe, like, it's none of my beeswax,
buuuuuut didya do somethin' that got someone to come at you this hard?
That shouldn't be...
Word was spreadin' in our company 'bout how "bad" Narukozaka is the other day.
Right as I was layin' down the <color=#ff32aa>PinCy</color> sponsorship,
an' before I'd dropped the news on the company, too–
Like, whaaaaaaat? Isn't that totes weird?
Anywho, that's all your lil' Meika's got to say for now–
'preciate it, Meika-tan.
Meika hangs up, and...
Fumika!
W-wha? What's the matter all of a sudden?
Narukozaka is innocent!
The Head Engineer told me so!
I'm going to need more details on that.
When we asked the Head Engineer about this incident, he asserted that our parts would not have any such issues.
So we're innocent!
That's something I already know.
Ever since I could remember, I've been hearing about the greatness of Narukozaka nonstop.
And when I actually joined the company, I saw just how meticulously Mister Iwata and Suzuki worked, so...
True! Totes gucci, Fumi-fumi!
"Totes"? "Gucci"? Are those really words?
I told you to stop that already!
Think about it for a second...
If our company really was breaking the law, then I wouldn't be working as hard as I am, now would I!
Ah, ahaha... Good point.
Then, I suppose we should plead innocent?
Yeah! We've done nothing wrong!
With how we are Actresses under Narukozaka, the public wouldn't believe us even if we did.
And how do you intend to prove our innocence in the first place?
Mister Iwata said it, so it has to be true!
He'd be considered even more suspect than us in this case.
We could simply have our components inspected, that should be evidence enough.
It doesn't prove that we weren't involved in Murakumo's scandal, though;
Since the accusation is based only on the fact that they bought parts from us, while glossing over the other details.
If we put our hearts into it and try to persuade everyone, they'll all understand! I'm sure of it!
If it was only a misunderstanding, then maybe... But this, this is different.
What do you mean?
Is Narukozaka... being targeted?
More than likely, some party is intentionally trying to ruin our reputation.
They are looking to make us appear as an unethical business on the surface, with no evidence behind anything.
That's unforgivable! We should fight that! Resist with everything we've got to give!
If we try to object, we'll just become a laughing stock on the media.
Do you want to be seen as an Actress who is desperately trying to come up with excuses for her company's misconducts?
That's just playing right into our enemies' hands.
What do we do then? We can't just let things go on like this!
We'll release a statement explaining that the accusation is groundless, complete with a report from Engineering.
And then, to avoid further damaging our image...
Let's have Yumi and Sitara ease up on their fun for a while.
Fortifying our defenses and waiting for the enemy's next move, I see.
Ugh, this feels so roundabout and slow!
Isn't there a way to just get rid of the whole problem instantly?
Nope.
We have to keep on fighting Vice like always and slowly earn our trust back in the eyes of the public.
Kaede nods.
The duty of an Actress. Then let us carry out our missions in silence.

story_3-2-162.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Eeeh!?
Eeeh!?
Eeeh!?
A...recall? Please tell me you're joking!
Unfortunately, AEGiS has officially ordered me to return.
What does "recall" mean, Kaede?
It means that she is returning to her original posting from here.
No way! But that's–it's so sudden!
Seems like what I was sent here for has been achieved, I think.
So basically... they're ending my posting here at once by cutting the duration short.
On the surface, that is.
I'm sure AEGiS is just trying to distance themselves, to avoid public suspicion that they're colluding with us.
Well, the Noble Hills competition attracted many objections.
Apparently, AEGiS' help at the end made it seem like they were on Narukozaka's side.
Uuu... I'm so sorry for all of my complaining back then...
It's all right. What's unfair is unfair.
I couldn't forgive what they did, either.
Still, I didn't think I'd be recalled back to AEGiS so soon...
Oh, right! What're we gonna do about accounting and management, then?
Are you gonna go back to doing it all again, Fumika?
Not like I can. I'm not a professional in those things in the first place.
I can offer assistance in that regard, however much it amounts to.
That's not gonna work, though. There's so much more stuff to take care of than before.
Then, is hiring a full-time office worker our only option left?
No! We'll get no AEGiS subsidies for hiring non-Actress employees!
I don't want to have to worry about our monthly finances even more!
Wow! You sound just like a manager, Fumika.
Seriously! How did things come to this!?
Nnngh... Please, Miss Youko! Say you won't leave!
I'm sorry, but there's nothing I can really...
You can quit your AEGiS job and come work for us instead!
As much as I'd like to do that,
I can't very well breach my employment contract with them.
Yotsuyu, such impossible demands will only serve to trouble Miss Andou.
I'm really sorry.
They've hit us where it hurts. I don't know who they are, but they're definitely serious about destroying us.
Although, I do have someone I'd like to introduce you all to.
That "someone" walks in.
I am Niiya Serina. Pleased to meet you all.

Actress with Two Faces
Niiya Serina
I work primarily as a temp office clerk. I do have an Actress license, but I am still inexperienced in that regard.
I would appreciate it if I could build up experience in Actress work on the side while assisting you in your office affairs.
I look forward to working with you.
Exactly the kind of person we needed right now!
And just look at how proper she is!
I dare say she's the first sensible adult to ever join us!
Serina talks to herself.
Heheh.
I do wonder about that.
Ah, I mean... Thank you. I'll do my best here.
Miss Niiya here is very used to office work. With her help, you should be able to manage somehow.
It hasn't been very long, but thank you for having me.
I'll keep cheering on Narukozaka and all of you from the side.
*sniffle*... In the days ahead... Never give up no matter what you face...
*sob*... And, do your very best.
Miss Youko! Promise you'll come back to us one day!
You've been an incredible help. Thank you for everything.
Miss Andou, please take care.
I will... You too, everyone...
Youko leaves...
We've really gotta work hard now, to make up for Miss Youko's share.
Kaede nods.
Indeed. Let us do our work with sincerity, to regain the trust we have lost.
Miss Youko took care of all of our blasted office business so perfectly. How dare they...
Those AEGiS bastards. I will never forgive them.
F-Fumika, you're scaring me a little.
Please calm down. Recovering our trust comes first, remember.

story_3-2-164.text: A new development in the earthshaking Gear scandal!?
Welcome to Headline News, bringing you live updates on the recent Narukozaka affair.
Today, we're exploring the actual situation of Narukozaka Manufacturing.
And I do believe these three interviews will give us the insight we're looking for.
Let's get to it!
Testimony 1: Actress A, Narukozaka affiliate
Yo yo yo! What's Narukozak-up?
They hide, they plot, they pull every cheap shot! Shred the evidence and leave it to rot! This guile I've detected got me feelin' wretched!

Reprehensible, yo!
Unbelievable, yo!
Testimony 2: Actress B, Narukozaka affiliate
The truth is... I was invited to Narukozaka for an event before~
But it was so terrible... The event was all a lie... And they took all kinds of advantages of poor Touka here...
And then Agatsuma Kaede went and did some super-duper mean things to me~
Even though poor little Touka didn't even do anything wrong~
Huh? No names? Then there's no point in me being on TV, now is there?
The eye censor bar disappears.
I'm Shimoochiai Touka~☆, the Idol of Egota~!☆
My new song's available right this instant~ Look for the name-
The scene cuts off.
Testimony 3: Actresses C and D, experts on Narukozaka
Narukozaka!? Those goons are actually just Murakumo in disguise!
And they've even got pretty much the same Actresses!
That's right.
All they've done is change up the branding. Deep down inside, they and Murakumo are one and the same!
Just a fake company gorging on vested interests!
Mhm, exactly!
What in the world is going on with Narukozaka!?
If you're making young Actresses cry, then Usamoto Anna here's not going to show you any mercy!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Wha! They're making us look like bad guys!
Defaming us through the media, I see.
Patience and prudence. We must endure through this attack.
But they're even badmouthing you, Kaede. I don't know if I can let that slide any longer.
That is not important in the least.
We should be showing our true heart through actions, without being blinded by gossip.
You're amazing as always, Kaede!
Nnh... Hmm...
What's that "true heart" thing?
A pure heart with no deceit. Think of it as a metaphor for sincerity.
Ah, that's pretty deep. Let's show that, then!
Commander! Get us some missions, please!

story_3-2-166.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Hey hey, Commander!
There was another Actress at my school, so I brought her over~!
Hello! Kaeruzaka Raiya here!

Modern Urban-style High School Ninja
Kaeruzaka Raiya
I've made haste here after Himukai-cchi told me about Narukozaka's ongoing crisis.
Behold! The number one Urban-style Ninjutsu practitioner in all of Kyouwan Ikuei High, in the flesh!
Holder of a true master's skills! Nin-nin!
Amazing, right~? Right~?
"Urban-style Ninjutsu"? Do forgive my lack of knowledge, but is it a famous school?
Tsk-tsk-tsk, someone doesn't get it~
The school traces its origins to Xu Fu, and was even reputed to be the style used by Prince Shoutoku's Shinobi!
It thrived during the Sengoku era, and has returned once again to grace the modern day!
That! Is what Urban-style Ninjutsu is!
That's right!
We Urban-style ninjas even have the power to pass fingerprint scans while holding a V sign like this!
Really~!?
A style that constantly evolves and adapts to contemporary needs while maintaining traditions... I suppose.
Heh heh heh.
With Urban-style techniques, every bit of intel in this room is in the palm of my hand!
Ooh, ooh! How?
For paper media, the Digitizing Technique!
For computers, I wield my USB gadget and apply the Data Siphoning Technique!
From defending corporate secrets to investigating rival company actions, Urban-style Ninjutsu's got you covered!
Hmm... What do you think, Commander?

commands.command: Urban-style Ninjutsu! How remarkable!

items.text: Commander! You can leave this incident all to me!

commands.command: Doesn't this seem a little too dubious?

items.text: Haaah~!? What did you just say~?
You're asking to fall victim to my Turn-into-Frog technique!

story_3-2-166.text: AIEEE! A NINJA! WHY HERE!?
Hm-hm! Who goes there!?
Hmph... You stand before Kaneshiya Sitara, Narukozaka's secret HR chief!
Stealing information from this room, you say?
My super hacker friend can shred every device here with ease, system and all!
Erm... Please don't steal or destroy any information in the office, you two.
You might have completely deceived Rin and Kaede, but your lies shall not work before my truth-seeing eyes!
Haaah~!? For blind eyes like yours,
One does as such!
Raiya pokes Sitara in the eyes.
Gaaah-! My eyes! My eyes~!
Urban-style Ninjutsu: Retina-morphing Technique!
Augh... What is this... It's just contacts!?
Sir Commander! Pray thee allow me to carry out exploits as your vassal!
I shall clear Narukozaka's infamy without fail-!
Now then, I must go! Nin-nin!
Raiya leaves...
Eh-hehe~ Narukozaka's as good as safe now~
Being relieved made me hungry~
Gonna hit the caf~
Rin runs off to the cafeteria for food...
Miss Koyui~ Gimme food~ Foo~ood!
That shinobi... Should we be relying on her?
Rin means well, Commander.
She's thinking about Narukozaka in her own way.
So...
Rei bows to you, asking for your understanding.
That is true.
Putting "Urban-style Ninjutsu" aside, if she intends to work for our sake, then we have no reason to refuse.
Let us hope for a good outcome.
Grrrr~ How underhanded! As expected of a ninja, all dirty tricks!
Commander! Deploy Tri-Stella☆!
I will never forgive ninjas, got it?

story_3-2-168.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
You ought to calm down, Yotsuyu.
We can't just take things easy anymore!
Sitara said "I'm tellin' ya that frog ninja won't get us nowhere!" and all!
And Fumika's got Miss Serina and paperwork on her hands right now!
It's gotta be us to take care of this!
I do see your point, but... what exactly are you planning to do?
Let's go talk to Mister Iwata again!
Would we not simply get in the way of his work?
Kaede!
...Yes?
Narukozaka's in a pinch right now! We don't have the time to worry about that kind of thing!
But...
Wait, huh? Someone's already here.
An earlier guest?
Meanwhile, across from the two...
Yer again. The hell do yer want this time?
Oh boy~ Just one look at me and you're already pissed?
Shouldn't 've shown up from the beginnin', not like yer here t' talk 'bout Gear customizin'.
C'mon, would it kill you to be a lil' bit more welcoming?
I mean, I was a regular here back in the day and all~
Yer sayin' that, but that snoopin' 'round yer doin' may as well be called "harassment".
Aww, you know I'm not mean enough to harrass you guys like that~
I'm a Narukozaka fan, see.
...Until seven years ago, that is.
I'm sure you know very well why I quit my Actress job and became a journalist, Mr. Iwata.
That was an accident.
"Testing new Gear", she said.
That was the last thing on her plate, as far as we knew.
But then, right before our eyes... She vanished without a trace.
It took me seven whole years of investigations to finally get to this point, and all you have to say... is that it was an accident?
Like I said, 'twas an accident.
I swear to yer right 'ere. It wasn't us doin' a poor job.
Same deal with the Murakumo equipment scandal?
Be crazy t' say we're in on it just 'cause they bought our parts.
That rumor... You were the one who spread it 'round the news, right?
Ahaha~ Sorry 'bout that one~
Those "reports" Anna mentioned in her news program, that was me~
With AEGiS all stirred up, it was just too good of an opportunity to miss, see~
Swear t' god, yer meddlin' lil' prick. Our girls 'ere ain't happy 'bout the whole thing, hope yer know.
Someone else would've picked it up sooner or later anyways.
All I did was... taking advantage of all the pitchforks pointed at Narukozaka already.
So I can confront you for info like this.
Stop draggin' me into all this, will yer?
I had to know. No matter what.
