About how deeply Narukozaka was involved in restricted Alice Gear research.
Yer don't realize yer comin' t' the wrong guy 'ere?
All we do is make peripheral parts 'n customize Gear.
Core Alice Gear tech's top secret o'er at AEGiS.
's a black box, sealed tight.
Narukozaka's not like Yashima or Hojo.
We ain't got th' power t' influence AEGiS like those big corps can.
Investigate us all yer want, but yer ain't gonna get nothin'.
Maybe not from you, Mr. Iwata. But... what about the Director?
She's... got nothin' t' do with this either.
She's the only one off in god-knows-where, though~ Having up and disappeared after the whole thing...
The Director, Narukozaka, and myself too...
All we ever wanted was one thing...
To draw out th' best performance possible from a Gear.
I'll take your word for it, Mr. Iwata. But know this...

We're not gonna forget about Nagi.
...Not me, nor Anna.
Just keep that in mind.
It's nothin' to do with Narukozaka nowadays.
Yeah, yeah, I don't care about that.
All I want to know is the truth from seven years ago.
I'll do anything, make use of anything, if it'll get me to it.
Yotsuyu has enough.
Cut it out already!
Yotsuyu, wait! They're not done talking yet.
Don't stop me, Kaede! You heard what this person did to our company!
Jinguji Mari! Stop it with the harassment on Narukozaka right now!
Hey you~! You're Hirasaka Yotsuyu, right~?
W-why do you know my name!?
Oh, you've been on an unstoppable streak ever since your debut, but that newbie charm of yours is still right there~
F-flattering me's not gonna change anything!
And you're Agatsuma Kaede right over here. Ooh yeah, the real thing's sooo cuuute~
P-please don't stare at me so much...
Heheh~!
To think I'd get to know Narukozaka's cuties in person, this is the best~!
Gimme an interview~ Lemme get a few pics~
Show me your natural face too~! And while you're at it, your bare skin~!
Uh, erm... That's... I don't...
W-wh-what do you think you're asking us to do!?
I told you to stop harrassing Narukozaka, right-
I'll stop, I'll stop. Won't ever do it again.
So gimme just one picture! With a smile if you can! Oh but casual pics and swimsuit pics would be nice too~!
Wh-oa! Stop it, that's not funny.
I respectfully decline.
We've gotta go for a sortie right now!
Commander, please take care of this for us, thank you.
Yotsuyu and Kaede leave for their sortie...
Awww~ They slipped away.
Perfect timing, actually. Can I have some of your time later, Commander?
I want to have an interview, one all-a-bout-you.
You'll come after that mission ends, right?
I'll be waiting~

story_3-2-170.text: The usual cafe
Commander~ Did you wait long~?
Eh, me? I just got here~
Just kidding~ Kinda fun when you think about this whole thing like a lover's meetup, right~?
Oh? Not amused?
I'm not messing around here, you know?
I am pretty curious about you...
Ha, gotcha~
I'd be a failure of a journalist if I didn't look into my interview subject at least a little~
Narukozaka's new Commander...
Age unknown. Background unknown.
A person shrouded in total mystery...
Even with the AEGiS-registered name, there's no telling if it's real, fake, or some kind of a codename.
In any case...
Thank you very much for agreeing to an interview this time.
Eeeh~ Threatening you?
I'm not trying to do that~
If I get to know you well, Commander,
then maybe I can put in some good words for you over at Anna's and the other media channels.
I get the interview I wanted, and Narukozaka gets a chance to wipe their bad reputation away!
A win-win situation, wouldn't you say?
So I'd like you to be open and candid with my questions, pretty please.
First of all... Do you have a lover, Commander?
Nah, just messing with you. Don't worry, I won't ask personal questions like that.
Let me get straight to the point.
...Who are you?
And what kind of secret order from Narukozaka's director are you under?

commands.command: You're misunderstanding things. I just transferred in.

items.text: Ah-ha-ha-ha. Really now... Coming from someone with no background?
Didn't I ask you to be open and candid with me~?

commands.command: You've seen through me. The truth is...

items.text: Ah, damnit! I'm not here to hear you joke around, you know?

commands.command: I can't answer that question.

items.text: Thought that'd be what I end up hearing~

story_3-2-170.text: My guess is...
You're a spy sent by her...
Or, a puppet manager of hers? Or a successor candidate?
Or even a lover~? Perhaps~?

commands.command: I'm not a spy!

items.text: Oh, my... Pretty standard of a reaction, actually.
But then again, I guess no spy would admit to being one themselves~

commands.command: Management's outside my expertise.

items.text: Don't you play dumb on me!
From the day you joined Narukozaka onwards, the company's revenue has seen a staggering V-shaped recovery.

It's all thanks to the Actresses, you say?
...That's a terrible excuse if I've ever seen one.

commands.command: We're considering marriage already.

items.text: ...Marriage?
..."Marr-iage"? What's that? Never heard of it.
M-marrying late's the norm in Tokyo Shard nowadays...
How old even is the Director, anyways!?
Eeeeeeh!? You've never met her? Are you kidding me~!?
Is Narukozaka's Director entrusting all managing rights to a complete stranger~!?

story_3-2-170.text: "The company embroiled in a scandal is being managed by a strange character with no clear background"...
That's not gonna be a fun article to write at all~
And I really don't want to make your Actresses even sadder~
C'mon, spill the beans. Cough up those secrets.
Do me a favor, please~
Or else... You get it, right?
...Whoa!
Kaede intervenes.
Commander. Are you unharmed?
What do you think you're doing, calling the Commander out to a place like this!?
D-don't tell me she's taking weird pictures and...
Well~ You girls wouldn't lemme get a pic, sooo~
You will not trouble the Commander on my watch.
Aww, those angry faces are cute all the same~
Rin and Rei also show up.
What's going on~? Did the Commander get confessed to~?
Rin, and Rei... What are you two doing here?
I wanna train with you, Kaede, so I went looking for you~
But then the Commander's not there either!
Either way... You don't think twice about meeting whoever was asking, huh. Even though you're our commander...
...Not that I care.
"Our" commander? That kind of stuff's so rare from you, Rei~
Leave me alone.
And Kaede, we're your teammates, talk about stuff with us!
Teamwork makes the dream work!
Sorry. There was no time...
You've been together with Yotsuyu an awful lot lately, Kaede.
It didn't feel that way to me...
Ahaha~ How do I put this...
Kinda feels like there's a strong bond between the two of us now...
Eh? Is that so?
C'mon, you could've played along with that at least~
Our bond with Kaede is strong as well.
Those teammate positions are staying with us.
I'm not gonna just lose either.
Uh, umm...
B-O-N-D! Boom!
Rin gives Kaede a bear hug.
No! Kaede's side is mine~!
Rin!
Mari remembers a dusty old photo from the past...
Hehehe, ahahahaha!
Wha? What is it all of a sudden?
I can't possibly stand against Actresses as cute as you girls~
They really look up to you, don't they, Commander.
Kinda jealous here~
Thanks for the fun day. I'll do something about that report on my end.
Heheh, you owe me one~
Mari leaves...
Huh? Did everything turn out okay somehow?
Should we... be trusting that journalist's word?

story_3-2-172.text: Today, we have yet another Heavy-class takedown by Narukozaka, who remains mired in its scandal.
Even amid the sheer media attention, their Actresses have been going on daily sorties, steadily racking up results in the background.
Despite these trying times for their company, they still seem to be doing their absolute best.
This is a personal opinion I've always had, but...
I believe there's no such thing as a bad Actress. Everyone's a good person deep down.
We have to hope that Narukozaka gets proven innocent, so those girls' effort to protect it doesn't end up in vain.
After all, the hard work of girls, like white rice, doesn't lie.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Waha-! A quote for the history books-! Anna-chan my waifu-!
Is this... what Miss Mari meant by doing something about it?
I do not know. We can only hope that this changes the way the wind blows...
I'm... not falling for it so easily...
Miss Koyui!?
Did you know about Miss Mari?
No, Anna is the one I have my doubts about.
Miss Anna... you say?
What'd you just say-!? Take that back now!
Your resident Anna cultist Sitara's not gonna let that slide-!
There's no way. She has to be lying. She...
She couldn't possibly be a fan of white rice. I... can't see it being true.
Wha!? That's what you meant!?
If she's a Tokyo Shard newslady,
Then she oughtta be eatin' stuff that's trendy.
Mhm. Things like bread and pasta suit her look so much more~
And... there's another weird thing about her.
How could she like white rice but stay so slim?
Now see here. Anna-chan's love for white rice has been a thing since her idol days!
There's even an entire chapter in her autobiography talking about her love for white rice.
This is like one of the most basic things for an Anna fan to know.
Um... well... That... might just be a made-up quirk she has like all the other entertainers.
After all, liking rice, white or not, is an easy way to become popular.
I mean, whether or not Miss Anna likes white rice has nothing to do with Narukozaka-
It does!
It's very important!
White rice holds one singular truth!
As an Anna-chan cultist, the rice-loving quirk's not negotiable!
Anna-chan's color is white... White suits her very well...
Um... What is this conversation about?
Mmn... I'm hungry! I'm craving some... white rice~!
Then how about we continue this debate in the cafeteria over some fresh steaming bowls?
Just what I wanted!
Hooray~! Yay~! Yay~!
Sitara, Rin and Koyui walk out, leaving Yotsuyu and Kaede behind...
Nnh... So this is going well, right?
I wonder? Though it does not seem like anything has truly been resolved...
That is what I feel.
Somewhere out there...
Heheh... Narukozaka...
Do prepare yourselves.
I'll be putting you down...

story_3-3-173.text: I have an important announcement for our viewers today.
After today's programs,
I, Usamoto Anna, will be stepping down as the primary anchor of Tokyo Actress News.
Thank you all for all the support throughout the years.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
What in the-!?
Anna-chan-!
Waaah! Uwaaaaah-! Uwaaah-!
Sitara's breaking down!?
I'm sure this is Anna getting her just desserts~
The god of rice finally came down on her for using rice as a tool for popularity~
Waaah~ That's not possible~
Anna-chan's someone we all love~
I... looked up to Miss Usamoto... when I was in elementary school...
She was a cool Actress, right?
Huh? Wasn't she a newscaster from the beginning?
What're you on about? Anna's more famous for her child acting, no?
From a child actor to an idol, an Actress to a university student......
A guest commentator for Actress broadcasts, and at last, the newscaster we know and love...
All of those make up who Anna-chan is.
The Turn-A Anna-chan who encompasses all of those things! Basically~
Anna-chan in her university days is my absolute favorite~!
Though her hard work at her high school's lacrosse club was also super-duper cute...!
Is it just me, or does that sound just like stalker behavior?
A true fan is obligated to watch over an idol in every part of their career!

Always watching~
＜●＞＜●＞
Always watching~
Begone, degenerate! The power of Christ compels you!
All the suspicion aside, I do feel a little bad for her...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
It's kinda hard to talk about it after Sitara went into shock like that, but...
This, it's gotta be...
Because of her defending Narukozaka on the news, yes.
A... punitive demotion, you say?
Nothing else would make sense. She was made an example of.
To warn anyone from daring to make any pro-Narukozaka comment, lest they be barred from being on-air, most likely.
Poor Miss Anna, she didn't even do anything wrong.
And Sitara, too... with how invested she was.
...How abhorrent.
Could we possibly repay Miss Usamoto's bravery in some way?
If we had that kind of power, we wouldn't even be in our current situation right now.
So we've got no options!?
Don't be unreasonable here.
The incredible power we Actresses have is all thanks to the existence of Alice Gear and High-dimensional Energies.
Without those... we're just students, remember?
Well, yeah...
I'm still new to the company, so I'm not exactly clear on this,
Yotsuyu and Fumika turn to Serina.
but does anything come to mind that could explain the hostilities directed at us?
I may only be a temp, but I would still like to understand the situation of my workplace.
Don't worry, Miss Serina! Narukozaka is innocent!
At the very least, we aren't the unethical business that the media is trying to potray us as.
Hmm... But how trusting should I be, really?
I do remember hearing about a journalist from Daily Tokyo AEGiS News visiting Engineering the other day.
They talked about something in the past, but turns out they just got stuff mixed up, so it's all good!
I see... I suppose that's well and good...

story_3-3-174.text: One day on the streets, Anna is caught by a "TV crew" eager to ask her questions...
Could I have a bit of your time~?
What's with this!? Getting interviewed on the streets isn't very pleasant, you know.
Well... there's been rumors of you being paid to push specific Actresses into the spotlight all this time~
Even a magazine picked up on that~ Would you tell us if that's true~?
As I have stated in the press conference, that is a baseless lie.
The cameraman takes a few photos of Anna's face.
But they went into how Murakumo and Narukozaka bribed you with their dirty money-
-so you could sell their Actresses to the public and all~
More photos taken...
Geez~! No way I'd do something like that~!
Aaah~ So scary~
But Touka's not gonna lose~ ☆
Were you really not taking advantage of your position~? Both as a newscaster~ And as a former Actress~?
That is not the case... I support every working Actress equally from a fair standpoint.
Touka suddenly approaches the camera.
Huuuh? Saying that when you've been shoving Agatsuma Kaede into everyone's faces?
Eh!?
Nothing at all~ ☆
But isn't it weird~? Pushing Agatsuma Kaede when Shimoochiai Touka is so much cuter~?
Just being cute is no-good-at-all for an Actress!
An Actress is, you see,
the crystallization of girls' youthful drops of sweat! And the passion burning bright within their tiny chests!
Whoa!? Rambling there much? Real pain in the ass...
A granny newscaster like her should just go get married and retire from the biz already~
Truth is... I'm a really big fan of yours, Miss Usamoto~
Really? Thank you very much! I hope you'll keep supporting me from now on.
And, speaking as a fan~ You being caught up in a scandal is something I really don't wanna see, you could say~
So it'd make me happy if you could have a wonderful marriage, retire from entertainment,
and become an amazing wife~
...Marriage?
Oh~? Something the matter?
Could it be that you actually stepped down so you could announce your marriage~?
Even more photos taken...
Tell us about it, Miss Usamoto! What are your plans for marriage?
..."Marr-iage"? What's that? I've never heard of it.
Oh no~ She's all frozen up~ I guess thinking about when she can get married broke her~ Touka's so scared~
If she's like this, then it's only natural she had to retire from Tokyo Actress News~
Of course, her replacement will be~
The camera focuses on Touka.
Shimoochiai Touka~☆, the Idol of Egota~!☆
Every one of you viewers, I look forward to your support~ ☆
Mmmgh...
Anna turns the tables.
Miss Shimoochiai Touka.
You've been gaining popularity as an idol Actress who's both cute and strong.
That's right~☆ Touka didn't want to be marketed like that, but the agency did it anyway~
Not to say that you're wrong, though~ I am both cute and strong~ Aww, what's lil' Touka gonna do~
So, Touka, how is your combat record looking this season?
Eh, weeell... Touka's not getting what you mean~ ☆
If memory serves... you have three sorties, twenty small Vice takedowns, and no Heavy-class takedowns at all.
W-why do you know all that!?
I've memorized every combat record for every active Actress this season.
Every single one... for every Actress in Tokyo Shard!?
Going by those records of yours, isn't it only natural that Agatsuma Kaede's getting featured over you?
Grrr~
You gotta start with getting those sortie numbers up, Touka.
I know it's hard to balance entertainer activities with Actress work, but... I'm sure it'll work out somehow.
That, and it's important to form a three-Actress team with friends you get along with.
If there's an enemy you can't take on by yourself, the power of friendship and teamwork will get you through.
So, I hope you'll do your best, Touka! ♪
And I'll be cheering you on with everything I've got while you do!
U-uuugh, n-no way I'm gonna lose...!
Touka runs away in defeat...
Fight on! Do your best!
Anna turns to the camera.
And this was Usamoto Anna, bringing it to you live~! Just kidding.

story_3-3-176.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Mmmnh-! Nnnnnh...
Yotsuyu, being so close to the television is not good for your eyes.
Yotsuyu backs away from the TV.
Miss Anna is still being chased around by reporters!
Can't we do something for her after all?
I would very much like to offer her my assistance as well, but...
If she allies with us while the suspicions remain, it would only worsen her position further.
So if people get that we haven't done anything wrong, Miss Anna would be able to go back on TV?
She would, yes.
"If, on self-examination, I find that I am upright, I will go forward against thousands and tens of thousands."
H-huh?
It means that if we believe in our own righteousness, we may stand against countless enemies without fear.
So we face them head-on! I got it!
Let us work towards restoring Narukozaka's reputation.
We must defeat Vice swiftly, precisely, and flawlessly, without causing any additional problems.
Uuh... It's just like you to set such a high bar, Kaede.
In our current situation, where the public eyes us with suspicion...
Any mistakes, however minor, would be especially damaging to our image.
We must display a high level of skill and devotion, to be worthy of approval.
Absolutely! Let's do it! Swiftly, precisely, flawlessly!
You may leave that mission to us.
Suddenly, in come Sitara, Virginia and Mai, all wearing their Combat Suits.
The time has come for Tri-Stella☆, Narukozaka's Tri-Stars, to demonstrate our power!
Let's go! Bunnytega! Maish!
Roger that! We going with a single file formation?
Of course! The importance of anime tropes trumps even the Shards themselves!
Er... Umm... W-who's "Maish"?
A springboard for the enemy, I think?
W-why me...!
Wrooong! I'm the one who's supposed to be the springboard.
...Phew.
You're the one who gets stabbed right after, Tama-chan.
Hyaaah!? Th-that sounds terrible...
So I take it you'd like to do a no-miss speedrun instead?
U-umm... I... can't really manage...
Don't sweat it. Fighting perfectly in an actual battle is impossible anyways.
Just do your best!
O-okay...!
We do this for Anna-chan! Move out!

story_3-3-178.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
One day, Raiya drops into Narukozaka's office without warning...
Whoa, who are you!? You look super shady!
Are you not that practitioner of Urban-style Ninjutsu from...
Kaeruzaka Raiya, at your service!
Ohhh, right, you were that frog ninja Sitara was talking about.
The one who wouldn't get us anywhere.
Huh-!? In what world? Don't you know of the part I played in saving Narukozaka from its crisis-?
Did you play a part?
What're you even saying?
It was Miss Anna and Miss Mari who have been doing their best for us.
You can't just claim someone else's hard work. Only thieves do that.
Haha, weeell, I did all my work behind the scenes~
I infiltrated the TV studio with Urban-style Ninjutsu's Work Shift Manipulation Technique,
and gathered intel with the Book-browsing Technique!
This is just between us, but...
Apparently Narukozaka and Murakumo gave under-the-table money to Usamoto Anna.
That didn't happen at all!
Forget about under-the-table money, we don't even have any over-the-table money.
That is not something to be proud of, Yotsuyu...
Miss Anna made up her mind and showed everyone her resolve for our sake, but you...
Sitara was right, a frog ninja like you really wouldn't get us anywhere.
Huh-!? To those who dare make light of Urban-style Ninjutsu...
One does as such!
As Kaede swiftly backs away at the sign of danger, Raiya pokes Yotsuyu in the eyes.
Guh! My eyes! My eyes~!
Urban-style Ninjutsu: Retina-morphing Technique!
Ah-hahaha! You shall suffer as Sitara has!
H-huh? Contacts!?
I think my eyesight's gotten better than earlier...
What!
That would be because you were right in front of the television.
Wow! Urban-style Ninjutsu is amazing! How didn't I see that until now!
...W-well, as long as you get it.
Please use that power to help Miss Anna out!
Hmm... Hold on a moment... So in short,
You seek to help Anna, savior of Narukozaka from its crisis times?
I do!
I understand...!
But on the eve of the mission's success, I do humbly request that I be hired!
Erm, that's up to the Commander, so...
Could you settle for taking me as an apprentice instead?
A request for mentorship! Urban-style Ninjutsu is finally making its presence known in the world!
That's exactly it! Exactly what I was looking for!
Now I'm pumped!
I must go. Farewell! Nin-nin!
Raiya leaves...
...Yotsuyu, were you serious?
Eh? About what?
Well... you mentioned studying Urban-style Ninjutsu under...

I thought it seemed amazing, so...
...Is that a bad thing?
Kaede averts her gaze.
No, not necessarily.
If you don't want to me to, Kaede, then... I won't.
And well... I don't really want to become a ninja anyways. Rather...
I am only worried for you, Yotsuyu... so... well...
I suppose... I would not enjoy the idea.
Alright! I'll give up on asking the frog ninja!
I'm already... your...
Wait, um... Yotsuyu?
...student... or something like that.
...My student... I cannot agree to it.
I am not qualified to be a mentor.
Eeeeh? Then, what kind of relationship do we have, Kaede?
What am I to you?
Y-you are my... umm... junior... in the company.
Nothing more than that...?
Yotsuyu...
Awkward silence ensues, until...
Eep!
Sorry, I stumbled through the door.
M-Miss Serina!?
It seems that I got in the way of something between you two. I must apologize.
Th-that is not the case.
Y-yeah, we were just talking about the frog ninja...

The frog ninja?
...Raiya, you mean?
You know of her?
Er... from work. Yes, I saw her at a past workplace once.
Wait... Does that mean she spied on you?
Spy on me? Her?
No, she didn't do anything like that.
She's not the spy around these parts. Heheh...

story_3-3-180.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
One day, Serina is accessing Engineering's computers, when suddenly...
What are you doing, Miss Niiya?
I'm performing checks on our Weapons and Dress Gear. Proper equipment management is important, after all.
I see. Apologies for disturbing you during your work.
No worries, I was actually just finishing up.
Serina excuses herself.
Was I... overthinking things?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Later, Serina is going through office documents for something, when...
What are you looking for?
Aah!
Serina turns around and sees that it was Fumika who called to her from behind.
Is something the matter?
Erm... I'd like to organize our documents, but I couldn't find any of the records from seven years ago.
From seven years ago...?
That's a strange question to ask.
Are you feeling alright?
What's strange about it? I was just considering tidying up our older papers as well on this pass.
That's a basic mistake you made there.
Eh!?
Any seven-year-old documents would have passed the retention period and been disposed of already.
Ah... Now that you mention it, you're right.
Please get your act back together.
By the way, where would any long-term documents from over ten years ago be kept?
Those were probably taken away by the Director, I'd say? I've certainly never seen them.
I see.
Oh, right, Miss Serina.
What's the matter?
Have you seen the Commander today?
No, not yet.
Now where in the world is he lazing around at, I wonder.
He could at least give us a hand around the office or something.
The usual cafe
Meanwhile...
Al~righty, thanks for waiting~
Sorry for being a lil' bit late~
A girl needs a good bit of time to pretty up, you know~
I was looking into what happened to Anna, and time flew right by before I knew it.
Anyway, I've got the details on her resignation. Interested~?

commands.command: Of course, let's hear it.

items.text: Pleasure doing business with you~
Eh? I mean, I'm a pro journalist, y'know?
You gotta pay a fair price for my services~

You're not paying?
...Fine, whatever.

commands.command: No, not really...

items.text: Aww, there you go again~ You'll be making those Actress cuties at Narukozaka sad, y'know?
Well, whatever, just listen up.
I'll even make it free just for you.

story_3-3-180.text: Info for info. 's how things work.
In any case, I'm sure you've realized this much by now, but the scandal around Anna is all just unproven fake news.
The media's in an uproar right now, trying to have her prove that she has nothing to do with the allegations.
That's what they call a "devil's proof"~ With how Narukozaka's been hit with the same trick before, I assume you're familiar with it?
Normally, with accusations of wrongdoings or problems, the burden of proof is supposed to lie on the accusers, right?
The press understands that just as well, and so they're propping up a red herring instead to support their smear campaign.
Utter nonsense, yes, but it still does a number on Anna's public image, which is the cornerstone of her career...
Now, the big question: who is responsible?
The TV studio gains nothing by attacking a high-rated lady anchor like Anna, so they're out.
It could be some news platform or tabloid looking to boost sales with a big scoop, but I doubt any of them could've blown it up like this.
And even if they could, just a bunch of follow-up stories wouldn't be much of an incentive.
A part of some internal conflict within AEGiS?
The scandal would've been too damaging to the organization as a whole.
Kicking up problems right when their reputation's still recovering from the whole Murakumo thing?
Those bureaucrats value their own skins too much to pull something like that.
All in all, this has to be an external attack from-
Suddenly, enter Rei.
What are you doing here, Commander? Fumika was looking for you.
A date, can't you tell~?
...Hmph. Not that I care.
Nah, nah, just kidding~♪ Turn that frown upside down~
I'm not... sad or anything.
You're a Narukozaka Actress too, right? That cool attitude's a real charm point~ Lemme interview you next time~
No.
The mission's soon, Commander. Come back quick.
Rei leaves, having passed on her message.

Uuu... *sniffle*
The cutie dumped meee...

story_3-3-182.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Another day. Kaede is using a workstation while Yotsuyu stands beside her...
Miss Anna... She hasn't shown up on TV at all lately, huh.
Kaede stops working and turns to Yotsuyu.
With her being embroiled in scandal, I believe this is for the best.
But... I mean... People are saying terrible things about her, like how she dropped off the radar to hide from her responsibilities...
It's like she's being bullied in our place, and I can't stand that!
Yotsuyu... I understand how you feel.
Kaede shakes her head.
But there is absolutely nothing that we can do right now.
Our only choice is to wait for good news from either Miss Jinguji or Miss Kaeruzaka.
What can we even expect from a weird harrassing camerawoman and a useless frog-ninja?
Er... I thought you were interested in an Urban-style Ninjutsu apprenticeship?
That move where she threw the contacts was really cool!
But that's not gonna save Miss Anna from the scandal!
Even so... I have yet to come across a good solution either.
I wonder what she's even up to right now.
Speak of the devil...
Hello there!
Aah!
Wha!
Miss Usamoto...!? Um... To what do we owe the pleasure?
Usamoto here. Today, I am visiting Narukozaka Manufacturing, the current hot topic on the news.
And in this visit, we'll be doing some surprise interviews of the company's employees.

Just Like on TV! Idol Announcer
Usamoto Anna
Just kidding~
For real? You're the actual Usamoto Anna?
It is her. There is no doubt.
It's been a while, Kaede. Sorry for making you worry.
Not at all, but more importantly, has defending us not caused difficulties for your career?
All good, all good~♪ It's not the first time I've had to deal with something like that.
And it's not every day that I get such a long vacation, so I'm gonna take this chance to do all kinds of things I don't usually have time for.
No need to worry about me, got it?
More importantly, tell everyone this for me:
"Don't lose. Make sure you all come out on top."
Actresses are best when they're all cheered up!
After all, sharing with everyone the gifts of energy, cheer and bravery through fighting Vice—
That's the most important job of Actresses.
Aww... You're cheering us on even though we're the ones who put you in a bad spot... I feel kinda sorry about that...
You must be Hirasaka Yotsuyu. I've wanted to meet you for a while now.
Eh!? Me?
I've been following your amazing exploits ever since your debut battle.
Um, how do I put it... I'm honored.
I even wanted to feature you on my program at some point.
Auugh... It's all our-
Don't beat yourself up like that.
Narukozaka and I, we're both in difficult times right now, but I know everything's gonna get turned around one day.
And I'm sure you all are going to make that a reality, right?
Yes.
Of course we are!
I'd love to meet all the others and cheer them on too, but...
We are the only ones on standby at the moment, I'm afraid...
Ahhh! If only Sitara was here. I bet she'd be over the moon.
There's Mai and the others too. I bet they're all fans of you, Miss Anna.
Wait right here, I'll go call them over!
Sorry, but I can't stay for long. It'd be a problem if the entertainment journalists found me here...
Ah, you're right. My bad...
Enter Koyui.
...Miss Anna!?
You're... Oozeki Koyui, right?
I've heard many good things about the Actress cafeteria at Murakumo.
Would you like to visit our cafeteria here~? You've come all this way and everything.
I'll treat you to some real white rice~
Ooh, white rice? Then I can't simply leave now, can I!
Koyui takes Anna to the cafeteria...
Aaah! Something so interesting's going on and Sitara isn't even around!
I'm gonna go get her after all!
We have a sortie very soon, Yotsuyu.
Aww~ Commander! Can I stay?
The mission comes first.
Right, Commander?

story_3-3-184.text: Whuwhaaaat!?
Anna-chan! The ultra-cutie Anna-chan! Came here to personally cheer us ooon!?
Uauuhh... The greatest failure in the life of one Sitara, this is~!
Miss Anna... really is someone amazing.
To be able to eat rice with rice on the side...
A fellow "ricer".
To think that I wasn't the only one... She must not be made light of.
Waaaaah~ I wanna eat rice with Anna-chan toooo~
Whacha talking about?~? Rice~?
I can eat lots of rice too~!
You do look like you enjoy the food I make every time, Rin~
E-heh!
But you see, being a ricer is different from just being a big eater~
Enjoying rice as a main dish, and as a staple food, even,
that's something you need a refined taste for~
Huh? I don't get it.
Kaede and Yotsuyu and even Koyui got to meet her.
But I'm the one who couldn't!?
I'll "correct" this kind of world-!
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Meanwhile...
If it's just this level of authentication...
Serina hacks into Narukozaka's computers...
Heheh, piece of cake.
...and starts to dig for information.
No secret bank accounts, no backroom deal records either...
Just data you'd expect a small Actress agency to have, huh.
Wait, this is...!
What are you doing there, Miss Serina?
Aah!
Enter Rei...
Well... I-I was just getting everyone's sortie records for, for the performance reviews...
That's a lie.
The only people who use the systems in this room are Fumika, Yumi, and... the Commander.
I mean it. I was asked to help with that.
By? Can't be Fumika, she stays on top of these things.
And Yumi's more responsible than she'd seem... When it's not about herself.
And the Commander?
The Commander...
...Only has eyes for Actresses and fighting.
I'm sorry.
I kept hearing about Narukozaka being unethical, so I decided to look into it myself.
You can rest easy though. There's nothing remotely questionable about this company.
...I know, and?
Rei, I really was just worried about the company when-
That's also a lie, right?
You were planning to sell off any dirt you could find, I'm sure.
Don't you trust me?
No. Not any more than anyone else.
...It doesn't make me happy to hear that.
I don't care if you're a spy or whatever, Miss Serina. Whatever you do isn't my business.
Just... If you're selling us out, don't let anyone figure out it's you.
Nobody here's used to being betrayed by someone they trusted.
Ahahaha... Alright, you win.
If you want to tell everyone else, go right ahead.
Meh... Not my problem.
Are you showing me mercy?

As if.
...I just don't want to hurt the kind people here.
...That's all.
Hmmm.
Well, alright then. As far as my investigations go, there's nothing to be found here in Narukozaka.
Seriously, there's absolutely nothing.
Not a single trace of data older than seven years.
What's left is such a hollow shell that it feels like there was something there before.
What doesn't exist can't be sold.
I'll keep this a secret, in exchange for you keeping my secret.
How does that sound?
Why not.
I'm not gonna say anything as long as you don't turn traitor.
Then we have a deal.
Serina leaves. Rei then looks to you. It turns out that you were eavesdropping on the conversation this whole time.
...Anyways, that's that.
The rest is up to you to deal with, Commander.
Don't go betraying us. I'm trusting you.
...We all are.

story_3-3-186.text: An update on the Narukozaka controversy:
An insider source at AEGiS has accused Narukozaka Manufacturing,
who is plagued by malpractice rumors,
of promoting Vice damages-
-through consistent negligence and noncommittal sortie performance.
No way!? What are they saying!?
We are dedicating our lives and souls to fighting Vice, and yet...
...At this point, this is less media manipulation and more just making up fake news.
In addition, another unconfirmed suspicion has arisen-
-of the company intentionally selling defective new equipment to AEGiS seven years ago.
The accusation states that the defects were caused by improper maintenance, and were directly responsible for a major accident at the time.
If this information is verified, it would imply the possibility that—similar to Murakumo—
Narukozaka has been covering up significant accidents through data falsification and collusion with AEGiS officials.
They're saying bad things about Narukozaka again-! Boo-! Boo-!
Rei gives Serina a silent, accusatory stare.
I-I'm just as confused as you, though?
Suspicion towards Narukozaka is only deepening as time passes.
It would seem that an industry-wide restructuring is needed in these unstable times,
where rampant corporate cover-ups and AEGiS collusion,
represented by Murakumo and Narukozaka,
has caused numerous incidents and serious damages.
We've all worked so hard, but...
We cannot be discouraged by mere...
A serious-looking Anna enters the office.
Miss Usamoto...
I have good news!
I've learned about who's responsible for everything we've had to deal with, and what they're after.
The one behind it all is...
Noble Hills Holdings.
Noble Hills...?
Ah, it's that company the twins are in!
That's right. Kotomura Akane and her twin sister Amane are both under them.
So all this harassing was because of their grudge from us beating them...
It seems implausible for a company of their scale to take action over such a minor matter...
It was also Noble Hills who pressured the advertising agencies to force my resignation...
No way!
The staff for my TV programs told me about it in secret.
Major buyers of ad placements have lots of influence within the media platforms they buy from.
In Noble Hills' case, they've successfully handled many city development projects in Tokyo Shard, and are even involved in redeveloping foreign Shards nowadays.
That gives them much more sway over private businesses than Murakumo's parent Yashima Heavy Industries has.
And their goal is...
Now that she mentions it, those twins said...
Yotsuyu recalls the time she invited the Kotomura sisters to Narukozaka...
We're here to crush you! C-r-u-s-h you!
What... What do you mean by that!
All those designated contractor zones you've been hoarding...
We're gonna rip every last one of them away!
Starting with Akasaka! We're challenging you for the zone!
S-Sis...
Akane, Amane! Just who are you two!?
We're Noble Hills Holdings! A company of the new era that's gonna revolutionalize the whole Actress industry!
Narukozaka and Murakumo are too old-fashioned and can't change for their own good!
So we're here to show you old-timers the door!
Noble Hills wants every last designated contractor zone Narukozaka has, right?
They intend to destroy Narukozaka... and subjugate the entire Actress industry?
Ex-actly!
Since they didn't manage to obtain Akasaka through a legitimate challenge, they've changed tactics to target Narukozaka directly.
The anti-Narukozaka stance that all the non-TV media sources are taking is them pulling the strings as well...
That bit of info comes from Mari from Daily Tokyo AEGiS News by the way.
"Daily Tokyo AEGiS News"...?
Excuse me, but... you are acquainted with Miss Jinguji?
Of course I am.
Eh!? You know that weird cameraman person!?
We were in the same team in the past, after all.
The same team?
A teammate from your Actress years, I see.
Back then, as part of a show's production, Mari taught me everything about Actresses, and I ended up getting a license.
And together with one more person we found through auditions, we made a team...
It was the most fun I've ever had.

I see.
...I can understand that.
That's amazing! Who's that other person?
Well...
Whoa!
Sorry, I shouldn't have asked something so weird.
Ah, no, that's not it. Nagi is, you see...
......She married.
She's living a happy life right now, I'm sure.
That's good to hear.
Mhm.
In any case, there's only so much time to be an Actress in your life.
I want everyone to live out their Actress careers to the fullest, without regretting anything.
And certainly without being pushed around by adults who aren't even Actresses themselves.
I've quit being an Actress at this point, so there's only so much I can say.
But I'm always on you guys' side.
Okay!
Um... What will you do now, Miss Usamoto?
At this point, I'm probably going to be leaving the TV studio, I guess?
But don't worry, I can work freelance no problem.
Anyways, I should get going. See you all around.
Anna leaves.
Noble Hills... I'll never forgive them.
Now that we have finally discovered the identity of our opponent, there is only one thing to do...
To fight with our full might.

story_3-4-187.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
One day, Kaede is working at a terminal in the Command Center with Fumika beside her, when...
This is...!
So it's here... at last.
Huh? What's here?
Suddenly, Youko runs in.
Bad news, everyone!
Miss Youko! You're back!
Ah, no... That's not why I'm here...
I hurried over to let you all know that things are going from bad to worse.
What do you mean?
You're referring to Noble Hills' request to audit our exclusivity contracts, I assume.
I am. That request covers Narukozaka's preferential status over all zones under its control-
except Shirokane and the surrounding areas that have been handed over to St. Amalthea.
All of our zones... That's no different from denying Narukozaka's business legitimacy altogether.
The request was fast-tracked due to swelling public opinion,
and the audit has been approved already.
It will be a Vice takedown points competition, just like before.
This is exactly how Noble Hills wanted it to go. We lose, and that's all of our zones gone...
We'll just smash up that crooked plan of theirs!
This is a good opportunity to display our righteousness.
We've beat those twins before, we can do it again no problem!
Will it really be so easy?
The twins have Noble Hills' full backing.
They will undoubtedly bring their underhanded tactics to bear against us.
Whatever cheap tricks they try to pull, we just gotta be ready and fight it head-on!
Well said, Yotsuyu!
Let's both do our best, Kaede!
There's nothing I can do to help you overtly,
but I'll be rooting for you from behind the scenes.
We appreciate it!
There is no way Noble Hills won't exert their influence over AEGiS to help them win.
Miss Youko, if anything unusual happens on your end, please let us know as soon as you can.
My position's too low for me to learn anything important,
but I can keep you updated on the situation at AEGiS, if that's all right.
That's more than enough. Please be as careful as you can over there.
This is a battle we cannot afford to lose under any circumstance. Let us face it with our full strength.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
In the office, Yotsuyu and Kaede host an emergency meeting.
News of this may have already reached your ears, but Narukozaka will be undergoing an audit in all of its designated contractor zones.
This will be a competition based on Vice takedown points, as with previous occasions.
Although, due to the sheer scale of the areas involved,
this competition will be tripled in duration and span eighteen sorties in total.
Our opponent in this dispute is Noble Hills Holdings.
We may have claimed victory over them during the Akasaka competition, but be on full alert regardless.
The fate of Narukozaka itself rests upon this very battle.
Let us brace our minds and confront it at maximum readiness.
And that's the end of our gathering!
It is an emergency staff meeting, Yotsuyu.
Oh, right, whoops.
Shortly afterwards, the Kotomura twins pay a visit to the office...
Well? Narukozaka? Feeling like surrendering to Noble Hills yet?
Akane! And Amane too!
An evil company filled with problems like this ought to just up and die already.
You guys should take a good look in the mirror yourself!
Spreading all those lies to make us look bad, then trying to rob us of our zones? You're just terrible!
Aah!
Amane is scared away.
What's terrible is Narukozaka, and I will never, ever forgive it.
But I have no beef with any of you guys, so if you surrender, I'd be willing to forgive you.
Heck, if you do, we can even let you become Actresses for Noble Hills.
Never!
You shall not defeat us. This threat will be repelled.
Don't get cocky just because you had that one small win over us back then.
It's not just me and Amane this time, I'll have you know.
Shanti! Get over here!

story_3-4-188.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Akane's ally is called into the office.
Pleased to meet you. I am Shanti Rana.

Noble Gurkha Warrior
Shanti Rana
They don't deserve a nice greeting like that. They're our enemies, remember?
I see.
Shanti has a good look at the Narukozaka Actresses present.
Hmm...
All of you look like harmless civilians to me.
She looks to Yotsuyu.
You are full of fighting spirit, but lack the experience.
I've got pep to make up for that!
Then, to Kaede.
You undergo martial arts training every day.
You can tell!?
Then, to Rin.
And she must be be very athletic.
E-hehe~ You can see it~?
Shanti, right? You don't look so bad either~
Let's compete~!
Heheh. None of you are a match for me.
After all, nobody here has experienced a true battlefield.
And then, Shanti notices Virginia and Mai.
She takes a closer look...
Aha! Interesting. It seems I was wrong.
Hyah!?
M-me?
What're you talking about?
Shanti turns to Virginia.
It's my pleasure to meet you.
You are a professional soldier, right?
Yup! In an FPS, that is.
Hmmmm... I haven't heard of that before.
I thought you were a SAS or Delta Force member at first...
But I'm sure that's a special forces unit in a Shard somewhere!
U-umm... "FPS" is a genre of video games, so uh...
You are wrong.
Hyaah!?
Mai is scared away.
I'll be honored to face you on the battlefield.
Ahaha, looking forward to it!
If there is a pro on the other side, then I'll be able to fight without holding back.
Shanti suddenly approaches Virginia and shifts to a lower tone of voice.
You'll be dead before long.
Do prepare yourself.
Shanti leaves...
...Damn it!
Ginny, what did Shanti say to you?
Oh, nothing big. Let's do our best too, as Tri-Stella☆.
I guess... you're right!

story_3-4-190.text: Narukozaka Manufacturng · Command Center
AEGiS has published their evaluations.
Narukozaka has scored slightly over 6,000 points this round.
We got nothing but small Vice...
However, we did receive a bonus in points thanks to the Commander securing a valuable contract for us.
How's it look on Noble Hills' end?
Kaede checks...
60,000 points!?
No way!
Their total includes bonuses from three Heavy-class takedowns.
They're not cheating again, are they? I mean, it's those twins we're talking about here.
Of course not! This is all Shanti's work.
Look at the personal scores, and... you'll see.
It is as Virginia says.
The vast majority of their points were earned by Miss Shanti alone.
Ginny?
Ahahaha!
Looks things are getting real interesting, you could say.
The game's just getting started. We sure can still turn the tables on them!
Yeah! No way we're gonna lose to just that much!
Agreed. Let us claim this victory with certainty!

story_3-4-192.text: Lies... It's not possible... This just can't be right...
We cannot fault Sitara for being in such a state of shock either.
Things are still getting started, Sitara! This isn't like you at all!
but I didn't get to meet her both times... That just can't be right...
I wanted to go fetch you, Sitara, but there wasn't really a chance to.
More importantly, our showdown with Noble Hills is still going on.
Indeed. We must focus on the battle ahead of us!
There you go again, all you think about is war...
What good will building a world that ignores Anna-chan do!?
She was just memeing around back there, no need to think too deeply into it.
I was a bit too mean to her.
Oh, you'll see her again, as long as both of you are still alive.
Miss Shanti! What're you doing here?
Could I have a moment of your time? I have a question for all of you Narukozaka members.
I was wondering... Why would you all not fight me seriously?
This is different from what the client, as well as Akane and Amane, have told me.
Could it be that you aren't in top shape? Or is this part of a strategy?
We wouldn't pull anything so underhanded!
We're just not getting any jobs with Heavy-class Vice in them.
In that case... Can I confirm it with my own eyes?
This, too, is part of my job... I will handle my share with due diligence.
Allow me to see your strength... so that I may confirm it!

story_3-4-194.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
After the sortie...
You all did well, I'd say.
Though there is still room for improvement. With proper training, your maneuvers can become even more agile.
Move nimbly, strike fearlessly. Live by those words.
That is well-spoken advice.
You're just like a teacher~
I did receive instructor training in the past.
Oh~? You're a sports instructor~?
Not in sports, no. I am not one for playing around.
There is no place for records or joy in combat.
To defeat your opponent with haste and certainty.
...That is all that matters.
Mmm... Sounds so boring though.
And... you are fine with this, Miss Shanti?
Who knows? I have no particular opinion on it.
It's only work. Nothing more, nothing less.
Wow! You're like a real professional!
Am I? This is how things normally are in the Nepal Shard.
You're from Nepal, Miss Shanti?
Yes. I was scouted from a training academy,
after my Actress aptitude was found.
You were scouted! That's amazing!
From how Actresses here have the time to attend school, I can tell that Tokyo Shard is a prosperous place.
Did you not go to school?
Work takes precedence.
That's really responsible of you! You're incredible!
...I-is that so?
But y'know, we're still gonna do our best to win this.
Right, Kaede?
Indeed. Our tenacity yet remains.
Let us have a fair competition, Miss Shanti.
Nnh? Hmmmm...
Alright. It will be my honor to fight against you.
Shanti then approaches Virginia for a confrontation...
I don't know what kind of reason you might have...
But if you, the only veteran here, refuse to show your full strength,
then Narukozaka will have no chance against me.
The answer's no.
All I want is to have fun together with Sitara, Mai, and everyone else.
There's nothing better for me than that.
I see.
If that is the case, then I will merely continue with my mission.
Goodbye.
Shanti leaves.
*sigh*...

story_3-4-196.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
At a Command Center terminal, Kaede reviews the competition scores so far.
Narukozaka is at 38,000 points, while Noble Hills is at 125,000...
Instead of narrowing the gap, it's been widened even further.
Why's it that we're getting nothing but small Vice cases?
Noble Hills has been taking down Heavy-class ones since the start of this whole thing.
Kaede pulls up some information.
The only Heavy-class mission we received was during the time when Miss Shanti sortied with us.
Conversely, Noble Hills has received nothing but Heavy-class missions, with that time being the only exception.
...Hmph, so that's their tactic.
Wait, you mean... Don't tell me...!
It's exactly what you're thinking.
Normally, AEGiS assigns missions to companies based on-
-a comprehensive evaluation of Vice activity data from the Early-warning Surveillance Network.
This time, the assignment process on AEGiS' end has been rigged somehow.
It's giving Noble Hills all of the missions with high point values, and Narukozaka-
Is left with missions worth barely any points at all, I assume.
Wait, then how're we ever supposed to turn this around?
...Exactly. Noble Hills has been playing a winning hand from the start.
Would you like me to lodge a complaint or request an investigation?
They'll just dodge around that with excuses like "It's been evaluated comprehensively" or "It's being investigated".
And once Narukozaka loses its preferential statuses, they'll call an end to it with a slapdash, perfunctory report.
In short, the match was already decided from the very moment Noble Hills submitted their audit request.
"Thus it is that in war the victorious strategist only seeks battle after the victory has been won..."
"...whereas he who is destined to defeat first fights and afterwards looks for victory."
The Art of War? Can't say I like how that quote sounds like a prophecy for our defeat.
The actual victor is not known until the very end.
Should we persevere despite our disadvantage, a moment of vulnerability will surely surface in our opponent.
That's true! We can't just give up!
It's just Heavy-class Vice! I can draw those in on my own!
How?
Haha, well, I've got no clue.
But we should keep fighting with that kind of spirit, is what I mean.
That is true. This is one defeat we cannot afford to suffer.

story_3-4-198.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
One day, Sitara is going about her day...
Hm~♪ Hm~hm hm~♪
*yaaawn*
When suddenly, she sees...
Fueh!?
Eh...? Hol... Wha!?
I'm not dreaming!?
Wa-haaaaaaa!
Anna-chan!
She immediately runs up to Anna.
Aah!?
Anna-chan! Anna-chan! Anna-chaaan!
C-calm down, alright?
You were... Sitara, right? Kaneshiya Sitara from Narukozaka?
Wa-haaaaaaa!
Anna-chan said my name! Anna-chan! Said! My! Name!
D-don't panic, okay?
Wa-haaaaaaa!
Anna-chan...
So, freaking, cute...!
T-thanks.
I've been a fan of you ever since... Ever since I was a kid.
Is that true? Thanks for all the support, Sitara.
Augh...
What's the matter! Are you okay?
Anna-chan thanked me... So precious...
So soothing...
I've got no more regrets anymore. I can die whenever now.
That's no-good-at-all! It's not funny to say stuff like that, even if you're joking.
Wa-haaaaaaa!
Ahh... Again~?
What's going on, Miss Anna?
Yotsuyu! Thank goodness you're here~ I've got something important to tell everyone~
Wha! What happened here!?
Grrr~! Curse you, Yotsuyu! Trying to take my Anna-chan away from me?
What're you saying? Can't you see how uncomfortable you've made Miss Anna?
What... did you say!?
Apparently she's got something important to talk about, so you can't just stick to her like that, Sitara.
That's tyranny! Wherever Anna-chan is, there will be Sitara!
No! I can't let you bother Miss Anna any more than you already have.
Yotsuyu leads Anna away.
Augh... Anna-chan...

Did I raise the wrong flags?
...Where!?
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office.
We're really sorry for what Sitara did.
It's cool, it's cool. I thought I'd be used to that kind of thing by now...
But guess I still have a long way to go~
Um... So, what is this important matter you wish to discuss?
I've figured out who Shanti is.
She's a pro.
A pro...? But aren't we technically pro Actresses, too?

That's not what I meant. She's a professional in combat.
...A mercenary.
She spent her entire childhood at a mercenary training facility in Nepal Shard...
Getting foreign languages, martial arts, and combat techniques drilled into her.
An Actress mercenary hired by Noble Hills for the express purpose of winning against Narukozaka–
–That's who Shanti is.
I had wondered why she was so unusually skilled. That certainly explains it.
So they aren't just cheating, but they've got a super-strong team, too...
But even so, we have no choice but to emerge victorious.
Hey, did you just say "cheating"? What do you mean by that? Tell me about it.
Yes, well, you see...
Kaede explains Noble Hills' manipulation of mission assignments to Anna.

I see, that makes sense.
You're right in suspecting Noble Hills of rigging the missions assignments in their favor.
Just what do they think Actresses are!? Geez!
Girls' sweat and tears aren't such trifling things!
I'm not gonna sit around and watch this happen!
Um... What do you intend to do, Miss Usamoto?
I'm gonna go send AEGiS a press application with a made-up TV show name.
That oughta stop them from cheating out in the open.
But, Miss Anna, didn't the TV studio...
Just leave it to me! I might not look it, but I am fairly well-known to people.
The media can ignore me all they want, but I still have lots and lots of fans.
That is quite reassuring.
Lots and lots of fans...
If they're all like Sitara, then, I dunno...
I'll go set the stage for you all and make sure you can put up a good fight.
Thank you so much, Miss Anna.
Let us fight at our very best, so that we may fulfill Miss Usamoto's expectations.
In open space...
Usamoto here! Reporting live from the battlefield.
With the young Actresses working so hard out there, I just couldn't resist jumping out of retirement!
If the other side gets to have mercs, then it's only fair we do too, right?

story_3-4-200.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
We did it!
Wow! Miss Anna, you're just as amazing as I thought you'd be!
Um... I thought you had retired as an Actress already?
To tell the truth, I've been looking for a chance to make a comeback.
When I saw everyone doing their best earlier, I just had to get back out there no matter what~
And that's why I came out of retirement earlier than I planned to.
It's all thanks to you that we managed to take down those Heavy-class Vice and close our gap with Noble Hills!
But now that you have fully allied with us, your position at the TV studio would be...
They've already forced me to resign either way.
And there's no way I'm going to let a company like Noble Hills do whatever they want in the Actress scene.
So there you have it, Commander. Usamoto Anna here would like to register with Narukozaka Manufacturing~
"Register"?
Even if I'm returning as an Actress now, I'd still like to work as a freelance reporter...
I won't be able to stay on-site all the time, but if you call me up for a sortie, I'll rush right over~

commands.command: It'll be our pleasure to work with you.

items.text: I'll give it my best, or my name isn't Usamoto Anna! Looking forward to your guidance and support!

commands.command: But, the labor costs... What would Fumika say...

items.text: I won't be troubling you much, so...
I believe Fumika would understand.
Sitara's gonna hate you forever if you say no, y'know.

commands.command: Wahaaa! Anna-chan! I gotta be dreaming!

items.text: Ah...
Commander.
Ahaha... Commander, you sounded just like Sitara for a second there.

story_3-4-200.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
But, that's so sudden! Are you really leaving us?
I'm sorry. It may not have been long, but thank you for having me.
Was there something here that wasn't to your liking?
To be honest, I declined to extend our contract because I have received an offer from another company.
Their terms were incredibly good.
Most of the paperwork left has been taken care of; everything should be fine until the next hire arrives.
I spoke to Miss Andou at AEGiS about the situation, and she should be looking for a successor to my position right now.
If that's what it is, then I can't very well stop you from leaving.
Considering our current financial situation, it would be impossible for us to increase your salary...
I would have liked for a person with common sense like you, Miss Serina, to stay with us, though...
I like it here as well, and I would've stayed for the long term if I could.
But... I do have my own circumstances...
I understand. Please take care, Miss Serina.
Give my regards to everyone else, if you would.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Front of Office
What? You're leaving?
Yeah, if Narukozaka isn't an unethical company, then I have no business here.
Hmph.
Better than a shady Actress being in your midst, no?
Meh, not that I care. Go do what you want, then?
I will. Take care.
Serina walks away...
Good grief.
Good that she didn't betray us, but leaving like that all of a sudden...
...but then sneaks up behind Rei, catching her by surprise.
Feeling lonely?
You, didn't you leave!?
Forgot to say goodbye to the Commander, that's all.
Serina turns to you.
Commander, my job as an office clerk may be over for the time being,
but I would appreciate it if you could keep me registered as an Actress.
It'll reassure you if I stay within reach, right?
Wha!?
Something the matter, Rei?
...Are you for real?
Not happy? Don't like seeing the Commander being so close to another girl?
Aren't you way past being a "girl" at this point? You're an office crone.
I can't say I approve of a quip like that.
Maybe I should tell Yumi or Koyui about this.
...Showing your true colors after qutting the desk job, huh.
Well, you two already know who I am, right?
...Real joy of a person you are.
Not as much as you, Rei.
Just go already, clingy woman.
Yeah... Well, I hope you're not too attached to me, either.
After all, if you hadn't found me out, I'd still be playing dumb and working my desk job right now.
Thanks in advance for the registration thing, Commander~
I should get going. Take care.
Serina leaves.
...Lying cat.

story_3-5-201.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
Our points now total over 64,000, compared to their 150,000.
We must take the lead within the remaining twelve sorties.
Thanks to Miss Usamoto's assistance, their assignment manipulations through AEGiS have been eliminated.
We should be protected from any unfair point gain rulings as well.
All that remains... is to win.
To make a focused effort towards Heavy-class takedowns, and turn the tides!
Regarding Noble Hills... All of us should know of Miss Shanti's skills by now.
We cannot expect our opponents to make any mistakes.
Our only option is to overcome Noble Hills in Vice takedown count.
To that end-
We've gotta show our guts! That's how we'll win!
Show our guts-!
I'll beat Shanti and Noble Hills!
And we'll win-!
Um... Why not put more thought into this, you two?
Yotsuyu and Rin fall silent...
Kaede...
I know how you feel.
And I think everyone else does too, even if they don't say it.
Y-you're right. That was remiss of me to have allowed my emotions to take over.
Nah, it makes sense why you're mad, Kaede.
We haven't seen Noble Hills do anything else but cheat since we first met them.
They sure do that a lot. Do they want to stay in the Actress business that badly?
Isn't that why they're trying to take our zones?
Noble Hills is a Shard development company, right?
...Would having Actresses even help promote that?
Good point...
I had not considered the reasons behind Noble Hills' obsession with the Actress business at all.
Narukozaka is involved through Alice Gear modification and component manufacturing...
For Murakumo, it was through equipment development...
And rocket thrusters.
That was their main business, the president once told me.
And for St. Amalthea, I guess it'd help promote their school?
We do have a ridiculous number of applicants for next year.
Huh?
Then, what would Noble Hills gain at all from doing Actress work?
I do not know.
There has to be something.
It's a decision made by grown-ups who're probably smarter than we are.
Nnh... Well, if they're playing this dirty,
It probably wouldn't be anything good...
...Let's stop them then!
Whatever that reason is, we'll just win against Noble Hills anyways!
Certainly. Let us do our best to that end.

story_3-5-203.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Narukozaka's survival is at stake in this battle.
We may be against overwhelming odds, but our defeat is not yet assured.
Let us persevere and fight until the final moment.
To truly turn this around, we'll have to pursue Noble Hills relentlessly.
If we don't catch up while we still can, there's a good chance that the gap will become unbridgeable by the end.
Each and every upcoming battle must be treated with importance.
Commander, we await your orders.
And know that we are staking everything on you to lead us to victory.
Don't make any mistakes, please.

commands.command: Let's do our best together!

items.text: Indeed. I have faith in you, Commander.
We'll protect our Narukozaka until the very end!
Everyone here is counting on you.

commands.command: Don't put so much pressure on me.

items.text: Commander, please take care not to harm our morale.
Yeah. Let's put our backs into it!
A Gear-enhanced punch ought to make him a bit less pathetic.
Um... I do not believe he would survive such a thing.

We wouldn't go that far.
Oh, but instead...
How about we take a small trip to the rooftop, Commander.

commands.command: Worry not! I've got an ace up my sleeve!

items.text: Impressive, Commander! You are what all warriors should strive to be.
Er... Why're you looking so shifty-eyed?
Alright, alright.
Let him worry about his "secret plans" and "winning tactics" on his own. We have a sortie to prepare for.
Why are you two so distrustful of him? I do not understand...

story_3-5-203.text: Hello there, Narukozaka speaking.
Sup? How's it hangin', Yo-tsyun?
M-Miss Meika?
Heard y'all're takin' it to Noble Hills?
Puhahahah! Funniest thing I've heard all year!
This ain't no time to laugh! Narukozaka's in a real tricky spot!
Wha? F'realsies?
Anywho, comin' over to, well, say sorry, pay ya back, e-t-c? For that sponsorship deal gettin' tanked.
Ah, er... we're kinda in the middle of something...
Too late, already here.
End'a the day, <color=#ff32aaff>PinCy</color>'s still, like, as a company~ We ain't got the business muscle to fight a crazy megacorp like that~
But if it's just me, then I gotchu covered.
Y-you sure!?
Legit, I rolled up here to give ya some totes hot support~
With lil' Meika in the mix, y'all got this clear-cut, locked down~
In open space...
Yo! This time, your lil' Meika's got a hot new revamp!
Eeeey! Get hype! We're trashin' 'em Vice and bringin' the good vibes!

story_3-5-205.text: Looks like it's not all Heavy-class jobs for Noble Hills now, either!
So, whaddaya say? Lil' Meika's as fresh as ever, right?
I'd join up with y'all every time~
Buuuut my brand wouldn't do so fire if I did that.
I'mma just get myself registered with Narukozaka right now~
If somethin' comes knockin' that'd make y'all go "Aw snap!", then ring me up~
Another Actress on our side, isn't that nice?
...There is nothing stipulating that we are obligated to summon her in times of need.
I am... not saying that I am uncomfortable around Miss Meika or anything.

story_3-5-207.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Our counteroffensive against Noble Hills has only just begun.
Yeah...
We may finally be fighting on equal footing now, but they still have Shanti on their side.
Meaning any Heavy-class takedown mission would guarantee a massive influx of points for them.
To make matters worse, Miss Serina left us, even though she only just finished her training...
Fumi-fumi... can't take it no more...
Please rest for the time being, Fumika.
You can leave everything else to us!
We and the Commander can handle the Noble Hills affair and any combat-related matters by ourselves.
Thanks.
...So, who will do the management and accounting, then?
Kaede and Yotsuyu both look away...

We'll figure it out!
...Probably.
At least look me in the eyes if you're going to say that, you two.
Please allow me. I should be able to handle the task.
I-it'll be fine, right?
There's no job that never ends, as they say.
Suddenly, enter Youko.
Hello!
Miss Youko! Perfect timing!
Eh? Is Miss Youko coming back?
Uh, I'm just here for the problem of Miss Niiya's successor.
...Oh, okay.
I started looking as soon as I could, but there just aren't many Actresses who can handle office work.
But don't worry, I'll introduce you the moment I find someone.
Er, no pressure on that end, we know we're asking for the impossible...
That aside, I do have some good news! Miss Ootori has an Actress she'd like to introduce to you.
An Actress endorsed by Miss Ootori?
She must have formidable skills, then? I don't know if Narukozaka can afford to hire someone like that...
Oh, I get it!
Miss Anna told us about how Noble Hills hired a merc, right?
Miss Kasumi must be introducing someone strong to us to even the odds!
That'll let us turn things around!
...I'll get her. Come on in, Miss Fumishima.
The Actress walks in.
My name is Fumishima Asuka. It'll be lovely to work with you from now on.

Uncaged Mori Girl
Fumishima Asuka
Asuka introduces her pet Java sparrow as well.
This little one is Pippi.
Pippi♪
Ah, Pippi! You can't just fly around like that~
The Actress... endorsed by Miss Ootori...
Formidable... skills...?
A... strong... Actress merc...?
Yes~? What's the matter?
Fighting... isn't my strong suit, but I'll do my best.

story_3-5-209.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Hey hey~ We turn things around yet?
We're at 114,000 points, and they're at 182,000.
We've only gotten closer by about one Heavy-class' worth.
At this pace, we might be in trouble.
Eeeeh~!?
Can't turn it around?
Even though we got helpers and new friends and stuff?
Reinforcements don't give points by themselves.
So we just gotta go sor-tee and get out there!
You, me, Kaede, we'll turn this around~!
Good idea.
Not putting Yotsuyu and the others down, but given our past records? Yeah.
All~right! Let's go ask the Commander~!
Tri-Stella☆'s not gonna just sit around either-!
We'll go put in a sortie request too-!
Sitara runs off.
Ah... Sitara...!
Ginny...? Are you all right?
Yeah, why wouldn't I be?
U-umm, well... You seem kind of... off?
...Is it hard to talk about?
What do you mean? You know how I'm always bright and positive.
If we're gonna be sortieing, then let's give it all we've got!
...Did something happen between you and Shanti?
Nothing at all. It's nothing worth mentioning.
Ginny... You know, I believe in you.
I know if anyone can win against Shanti, it'd be you.
Mai...
If you're not feeling good, I can at least back you up...
So, let's do our best.
Yeah, thanks.
Mai leaves.
...Gah!
...Got no choice now. I can't go on betraying my comrades any longer.
Fine, then, Shanti. I'll show you what I'm really capable of...

story_3-5-212.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
A few sorties later, Sitara checks the updated point totals.
Narukozaka's got 154,000 points to Noble Hills' 206,000 now!
We're catching up with those last two Heavy-class takedowns~
We did it, Ginny!
It's all thanks to you and Sitara, Mai.
But! There's still more fighting to do!
We can't forget about Shanti on their side.
Meanwhile, across from the three...
Aww, we didn't take the lead~
Six more sorties left. Closing this points gap is plenty doable.
All~righty! Let's do it~!
Observation Deck
Noble Hills Holdings HQ, Actress Department
What's going on, Sis!? Narukozaka's catching up at a crazy pace...
Huh, they're not half bad.
What do we do... If they take our lead...
They haven't seen the last of us yet! Taking down multiple Heavy-class Vice at once is no trouble with Shanti working for us!
We'll bring Narukozaka down... Whatever it takes.
Noble Hills still has some special plan they're holding in reserve, too.
A plan...? What kind?
Don't ask me! It's top secret!
Are things going to be okay...?
Amane!
Just do exactly as I say, and nothing will go wrong!
O-okay... I get it, Sis...
Tokyo Bay · Wharf
So, what's this about? Calling me out to the middle of nowhere and all.
Just picking a place with little traffic, simple.
And you should know very well what my business is, Miss Glynnberets.
Had you told me it was a night date, I could've dressed up a little.
What about you, though? Your look just screams secret agent.
Did Langley forget about intelligence 101?
Not as much as you, Lieutenant.
Dissing West Point every chance you get, eh?
This passes as fashion around these parts, just so you know.
Nobody's gonna bat an eye here in Tokyo Shard.
A suitable cover for a soft Shard with no regular army, I see.
Exactly! So this better be the last time we meet up like this.
I don't want even the slightest bit of suspicion from my friends.
If that's what you think, then stop trying to draw attention to yourself.
Blending in with the locals is fine, but remember your mission.
I'd never forget.
You must locate where ALICE is hidden within the Tokyo Shard...
The fate of the States itself rests upon your shoulders.
I know.
Well...
I did say the Pledge of Allegiance when I first joined the forces, you know the drill.

story_3-6-213.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Lounge
One day, Raiya drops into Narukozaka from the roof, as she does.
Ha!
Kaeruzaka Raiya, at your service!
Raiya, I swear... Couldn't you enter the office a bit more, I don't know, normally?
Oh, okay, I'll be careful next time.
-No no no, I mean, this is an important part of spreading Urban-style Ninjutsu's good name across the lands!
Huh? Raiya? What're you here for this time?
Whaaa~...
Didn't you say you'd study Urban-style Ninjutsu under me if I helped Anna!?
Ah, about that, Kaede said no, so it's off.
Haaah-? What the heck!
How dare you try to deceive a shinobi! Yotsuyucchi! Kaedecchi!
I'll defame you two on the internet with Urban-style Ninjutsu's Impersonation Technique-!
Don't do that.
That's treading on criminal territory, so... let's report her to the police.
Ah, that was a joke, yes! I wouldn't go that far.
You didn't even help Miss Anna in the first place, did you, Raiya?
No way, it's all thanks to my behind-the-scenes work that she got off as lightly as she did.
...Is it just me, or is she sounding sketchier by the minute?
A-ha-ha! Are you sure you don't want to take that back?
I'll have you know that I've even managed to obtain secrets directly from your opponent, Noble Hills themselves!
What did you say!?
Wait, that, please share that with us!
Mmm... One moment...
Raiya produces some flyers from... somewhere.
Aha! Feast your eyes on these!
Wha? Flyers? Are those ads?
Nikko Shard, and Uzumasa Shard?
There's the foreign Texas Shard too.
Weeell, basically~, these are Shards that Noble Hills redeveloped.
And hear this, they're aiming to redevelop Tokyo Shard too!
"Redevelop Tokyo Shard"?
Exactly! To sum up their plans, "Edo Shard"!
2010s Tokyo isn't all that popular, yeah~?
Think about it. Edo! Samurai!
And ninja!
With these, the number of tourists and immigrants will go up, and the Shard will undoubtedly take the spotlight in all of Outland!
Mmm... If that happened, would I be a town girl instead of a high school student?
Our lives would become unimaginably less convenient.
I guess Kaede would be a kendo girl in a dojo?
Wait, that actually doesn't sound half bad!
Yup, yup! And instead of an Urban-style ninja, I'd be an Oniwaban of Iga or Koga!
And you found all this from sneaking into Noble Hills?
Weeell, to tell the truth~ They had a model of it in the company HQ's lobby!
Wouldn't that just... be a blue-sky concept they're using for advertising reasons?
Oh crap-!
Stop fooling around and investigate properly!
That will not do.
Forcing a shinobi to work endlessly with no pay? Is Narukozaka truly evil under the surface?
You're the one saying we should hire you once you've done a good job, Raiya.
Quite upsetting that you're calling us evil, when you haven't fulfilled your end of this pay-per-result arrangement.
Then I'd like to at least be registered as an Actress with the company.
Huh, we've sure been getting those kinda people a lot lately.
Alright, I'll do something about your registration.
Yay!
In exchange, I'd like you to look into Noble Hills' true objective. With proper evidence this time, if you would.
Understood...!
Raiya leaves to start her investigation...
Is it really okay to hand out a promise like that without checking with the Commander first, Fumika?
Well... I don't see her coming back with anything, anyways.
And even if she does, a registered Actress wouldn't add much to our expenses.
Heheh, nice and cheap!
Fumika... If the Edo Shard thing ends up becoming real, you'd fit right in as an evil magistrate or merchant.
Excuse me!?

story_3-6-215.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Heheh.
Th' hell's this, Commander?
I cleared th' place out 'cause yer told me yer got some important talk.
So why'd yer bring that damn paparazzi 'ere?
Cold as ever, eh~? Mister Iwata~?
Had to make a deal with Commander here since you just wouldn't meet me on my own~
A deal?
Yer even need any Gear maintenance anymore?
I thought yer quit bein' an Actress-
-with yer aptitude droppin' 'cause of yer age.
Aah~ Geez~! You know a girl's age is a forbidden topic~
No amount of maintenance skills can help your image if you're so snappish.
Shut th' hell up. Go home if yer ain't got any business.
No can do~ We've still got a deal and all.
Right, Commander?
Be a dear and make Mister Iwata here tell us everything, 'kay? Info for info.
Don't screw with me! I ain't never agreed to this.
Yup, figured that's what you'd say.
Well, in any case, lend me an ear. This has to do with you, too.
Remember that new equipment by Murakumo we talked about before?
What about that? Thought th' topic was over.
Those crazy specs seem rather similar to the Gear you worked on seven years ago, wouldn't you say.
Who knows, 's been too long. 've forgotten 'bout it already.
A-ha-ha! Figures~
I still remember, though, and I don't intend to forget...
Now, this is just my guess, but...
It's not that Murakumo planned to falsify their data from the beginning.
At the development stage, they did manage to achieve those crazy specs.
But for some reason, they couldn't release them...
Which meant they had to publish the fake data we saw at the end.
Sounds like a certain company that, seven years ago, had an accident caused by poor maintenance... Or so they say, right?
Some real mad ideas, no, delusions yer comin' up with 'ere.
Not quite~... I mean, you were the one saying-
How core Alice Gear tech is AEGiS' top secret, a tightly-sealed black box...
Both Murakumo and Narukozaka must've touched that secret and paid the price, in ruin.
Don't go killin' us off. Narukozaka's still up 'n kickin'–
But the in-house Alice Gear development arm is practically dead, right?
And the Actress business, alone and without help, is still under threat even now.
Say, Mister Iwata. Just what is Alice Gear?
It converts the High-Dimensional Energies an Actress draws out, and-
That's not what I was asking!!
...Fine, I'll tell yer what this Alice Gear crap really is!
The whole damn thing's made by th' superintelligent AI "ALICE" three centuries back,
and to this day we still ain't got a goddamn clue what it all is!
The top brass o'er at AEGiS... No, th' ones above 'em.
Those bastards might know a thing or two.
But if yer try t' look into it and push the tech as far as it can go...
You'll be buried in the dark...
Then, the reasons behind Murakumo being shuttered, and now Narukozaka being targeted, is probably...
Thanks, Mister Iwata. I think I see the big picture now.
...Yer better stop, or they'll come aft'r yer too.
And?
I've already lost everything I cared for seven years ago.
Tsk, yer on yer own then.
Iwata leaves...
Thank you too, Commander.

commands.command: Hold on, where's your side of this info trade?

items.text: Well aren't you on top of things~
Don't suppose you'd consider this as repaying that favor for the info on Anna?
...No? Aw, well... I'll tell you, then.
The one who arranged all the pieces on this chess board you're on? It's Noble Hills.
The moves they made on Murakumo and Narukozaka were fully planned out from the very beginning.

commands.command: So, in the end, who are the baddies?

items.text: Noble Hills.
You never thought it was weird?
Murakumo's sudden downfall, Narukozaka's scandal, external influences on AEGiS...
All of the pieces were carefully arranged from the start.

story_3-6-215.text: Followed by having Murakumo acquire Narukozaka, kicking up problems, and eliminating the existing companies.
And then, they can walk right into the industry and take control...
It was all part of a thorough and careful plan.
Hard to explain how everything just so happen to go in their favor, if we assume otherwise.
All that planning is now being thrown off, though, by Narukozaka's Actresses...
Well, rather, It's mostly your fault.
So if you value your life, I suggest treading lightly.
All~ righty, that's all you'll get~
Want any more info, and you gotta pay up.
A~nyways, have a good one~
Mari leaves. Shortly afterwards, you notice...
Ah... Commander.
Um...
No, I... I did not hear anything.
Even if I did... I will make sure to forget... Please do not worry.
Excuse me...
And Kaede leaves too.

story_3-6-217.text: During the next sortie, not long after Mari's latest visit...
Heyo~ How's it's going, Narukozaka's cutie Actresses~
You're all just soooo adorable, so Big Sis here's gonna lend you girls a bit of a hand~
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
After the sortie...
It's 180,000 to 214,000 now! Nice!
You've helped us close the gap even more, Miss Jinguji.
Heheh~ Then how about you let me have a pic as thanks? C'mon~
Um, that's, well...
Ahhh~ You're so cute when you're looking shy, too, Yotsuyu~
Erm... Miss Jinguji.
What's the matter, Kaede? You want in on the pic, too?
Then get in real close, you two~ Do a hug~ Snuggle those cheeks~
Eeeh!?
That's a bit too... I mean, that's embarrassing even for me...
Aaah, geez~ You're making me wanna join in on the fun, too~
W-wh-wha... What the heck are you saying?
You can't do that!
Ahem... Miss Jinguji? I have a question I hope you could answer for me.
Why are you allying yourself with Narukozaka?
Why, isn't that obvious?
