I, Jinguji Mari, will always be on the side with the most cuties!
Ahhh~ Girls are so cuuute!
Cute girls are e-verything! Cuteness is where the truth's at! And with it, where Mari's at!
Even if you're saying that with a straight face...
Maybe... that first impression is telling after all...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Alice Gear Maintenance Center
Later...
Swear t' god. The hell yer sayin' all this time... Retiring 'cause yer aptitute was dropping...
Ain't yer doin' just as well as the old days?
Eeeh~? Did I ever say anything like that~?
Crafty lil' bastard.
Isn't that a bit mean to say to someone who helped your side out~?
Mari turns to you.
Commander, you owe me for this one too, okay?

commands.command: Thanks, we're glad to have your help.

items.text: A-are you now?
That threw me off a bit. I wasn't expecting you to actually thank me like that.

commands.command: If you're just trying to get us to owe you, then no thanks.

items.text: Eeeeh!?
Isn't this the part where you'd be so touched we'd break into a hug?

commands.command: Sorry, but I don't believe in repaying debts...

items.text: You really just said that without missing a beat.
Look, Mister Iwata! We've got someone here who plays more dirty than me!
's the Commander our Director brought in from god-knows where that yer talking 'bout.
We'd be in trouble if he wasn't a lil' bit shrewd.

story_3-6-217.text: Can't have the company just up and vanish without coughing up the truth I'm looking for first.
So with that said, lemme register.
Anna's registered over here too, right?
Between my hobby, profit, interview chances and finding the truth, I'll be involving myself reeeal deeply with Narukozaka again~
Great, more annoyin' crap...
I'll be countin' on yer to keep those Actresses managed, Commander.

story_3-6-220.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Office
Presently, Narukozaka is at 185,000 points, while Noble Hills...
We are barely within the catch-up range.
If we can take down a whole bunch of Heavy-class Vice, we'll be able to turn this around!
However... This is bizarre.
Noble Hills has not defeated any Heavy-class units within the last few sorties.
They must've run out of luck! That's gotta be it!
Serves them right for cheating so much.
I can only hope so...
Excuse me, do you two know where the Commander is?
Now that you mention it, he's not here.
Ah... I do believe he was speaking with Rei not long ago.
Good grief... Taking a stroll when there are still reports to write, the nerve.
A café
Er...
Why are you here?

commands.command: Weren't you the one who asked me to come?

items.text: That's not what I meant.

commands.command: Why, you ask... because you're here ☆

items.text: Wh-why'd you say it like that?

commands.command: Sorry, I'll leave.

items.text: You can't just walk away like that!

story_3-6-220.text: I absolutely do mind. Why did you follow him here?
Letting him come here alone was too worrying.
Mmh... I don't think an adult conversation like this is a good place for kids to be at.
Hmph...
Picking a fight? I can give you one.
Ah well, whatever.
Anyway, where should I begin...
Want to hear about my new workplace?
Not really.
I'm asking the Commander, though?
Heehee.
Doesn't look like your minder is willing to keep quiet, so I'll just start talking.
Tch!
I'm working at a place in Akasaka, you see. Their pay and benefits are both incredible...
Good for you.
...Now you don't have to come back.
Even if it's Noble Hills Holdings I'm talking about?
Wha!?
You really are turning traitor, then?
Don't you want to hear me talk about the goings-on over at Noble Hills?
If not, I've got no reason to be here.
...Sorry, Commander. I... I'll leave.
Rei walks away...
You're being naughty, Commander. It won't do to bring an innocent kid here, you know.
Now, to thank you for staying, I'll give you a little gift.
The true reason behind Noble Hills' work to dominate the Actress industry...
You're aware of what Noble Hills' primary business is, right?
Shard development, yes.
They've submitted plans to redevelop Tokyo Shard back into the Edo period, or into the so-called "Bubble Economy Era" in the 1980s.
"As cultural heritages from the lost Earth Sphere and samples of historical civilization, those are much more valuable than Tokyo in its current form..."
Those are the kinds of reasonable-sounding justifications they've been trying for over a decade. Never to any success, mind you.
And it's not hard to imagine why.
The development costs would be astronomical, not to mention how living standards would regress by over two centuries.
There is no way the residents of Tokyo Shard would approve.
But, hypothetically...
If Tokyo Shard was razed to the ground by a Vice attack?
If the cities were destroyed, and their residents gone, then...
They'd be free to do as they wish...
Heheh, not something you'd want the children to hear, right?

story_3-6-222.text: Noble Hills Holdings HQ, Actress Department
What is going on here?
Why are we not destroying any Heavy-class Vice?
Like I said...
Those are the client's orders! Follow them!
You signed a contract!
Yes... I will follow the contract.
However, according to that same contract...
I have been hired to eliminate any attempts at sabotage-
-by Narukozaka, your unethical rival.
If that is the case, then... why are we overlooking the Heavy-class Vice?
We could have taken the chance to force Narukozaka out of the Actress industry.
As a contractor, I demand an explanation from my client.
I don't know why either.
All those Noble Hills people said was that it'd "accelerate the plan".
There's probably some kind of strategy involved, I'm guessing.
A strategy?
Our actions have allowed multiple Heavy-class Vice to approach the Tokyo Shard.
This must be a plan to draw them into the danger zone to farm more evaluation points, then!
Considering our significant lead, there is no point in doing so.
To me, this... cannot be anything but intentionally increasing the risk of accidents.
Forget about that!
Just do exactly as I say, and nothing will go wrong!
And then, a transmission...
Ah...
We got our next orders, Sis.
They want us to leave the Heavy-class Vice alone again...
Umm... Isn't this... kind of dangerous?
Wouldn't they be causing damage at this rate...?
Are you saying you won't listen to me, Amane?
N-no, Sis.
Shanti motions to leave.
Shanti! Where do you think you're going?
Kill or be killed... That is the mission.
Who said you could act on your own! You'll be sortieing with us!
You two should be able to handle the smaller Vice with ease.
As for me...
Shanti leaves...
Wait! Shanti! Gah, I'll never forgive you for this!
S-Sis... What should we do? A-at this rate...
Sh-shut up! How am I supposed to know!
Just clean this up somehow!
Akane leaves angrily...
*sniffle*... Sis... I... I can't do that...
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
Bad news, Kaede! There are Heavy-class Vice inside the Shard...
So many at once!?
Calm down, Yotsuyu.
Let us acquire an emergency contract from AEGiS and meet the enemy.
Yeah!
The Command Center receives a transmission.
This is Shanti speaking! Come in, Narukozaka!
We cannot expect Noble Hills to mobilize for this crisis.
I will support you myself.
All sortie preparations are complete on my end.
Just give the order!
Nice! With Shanti on our side, getting two or even three Heavy-class takedowns is gonna be a piece of cake!
Certainly... However...
Are you saying... this is another one of the twins' traps!?
Uuugh... They've stabbed us in the back so many times, I don't know if we should be trusting them now...
Shanti's fine, you can trust her!
Gurkhas are fierce and courageous mercenaries who always stay on their mission.
They're fearsome enemies, but reliable allies!
Ginny...
Hey, Shanti!
What is it?
If we're fighting together, that'd make us comrades-in-arms.
Can you swear not to betray your comrades?
...On your pride as a soldier?
Yes. On my pride as a Gurkha... no, as a member of the Magar people.
Loyalty to comrades is the duty of a soldier.
And fighting the Vice is the duty of an Actress.
In open space...
I will be repaying my favor to you.
As long as I am able, I will fight by your side. That is my duty.

story_3-6-224.text: Narukozaka Manufacturing · Command Center
We mopped up all the Heavy-class Vice before they managed to damage the Shard, all thanks to Shanti!
I am glad we managed to secure the Shard safely.
Um... Was it fine for you to sortie alongside us, rather than Noble Hills?
On grounds of deception, their contract with me has been voided.
Noble Hills lied to me-
-that Narukozaka was an unethical company who abused the people of Tokyo...
They were wrong.
It is rather Noble Hills who sought to exploit the Vice for financial gain.
...I cannot forgive that.
But... is it fine for you to abandon the contract so readily?
It is illegal in every Shard within Outland to act to the Vice's benefit.
Therefore, any contract that threatens the safety and order of a Shard is null and void.
So justice is always given precedence, I see.
However... I cannot remain at Tokyo Shard after this.
Wait, why!? We're friends and all now, so wouldn't it be nice for you to stay here?
It was specifically due to my Actress contract with Noble Hills-
-that my stay at this Shard was approved by AEGiS.
Oh! If that's the case, you could just work as an Actress at Narukozaka!
Yotsuyu turns to you.
Right, Commander?
Miss Shanti's skills will be a great boon to Narukozaka's fighting strength.
Please take her in!
I'm willing to accept a mercenary's average annual salary and an Actress bonus in that case.
The... average annual salary of a mercenary?
And I would like bonuses for each Heavy-class takedown as well.
U-umm! Narukozaka doesn't really have a lot of money like Noble Hills does.
*sigh*... Then, I suppose the negotiation is over.
Are you fine with Narukozaka's pay?
I will find work in other Shards.
...Aww. Oh well.
I do have a need for money.
Thank you.
And, goodbye.
Shanti leaves...
Usamoto Anna here. It's been a while, folks.
As of today, I'm back as the main anchor of Tokyo Actress News.
Without further ado, let's jump right into our first topic on the agenda.
The results are finally in for the Narukozaka–Noble Hills contest, fought over all of the former's priority zones.
And by taking down all of the Heavy-class Vice involved, Narukozaka has claimed their victory in the wake of the latest Shard interior breach.
All those recent bad rumors around them were swept right away with this big comeback.
On the other hand, their opponent Noble Hills isn't doing so well. According to our sources...
Their board of directors is facing possible lawsuits over their manipulation of AEGiS mission assignments and suspected bribery of officials, including the contest evaluation staff.
In addition, their failure to engage the Heavy-class Vice, and luring of them into the Shard Interior, are effectively crimes against the entire Shard...
This may be the first time we're seeing an individual or group prosecuted under the charge of "Instigating a Vice Attack".
Noble Hills Holdings has released a statement condemning the reckless actions of their Actress department,
and has announced the department's dissolution, alongside the greater company's withdrawl from the Actress industry.
A café
Ahaha, what am I going to do now.
There goes my new workplace with all those good terms.
You don't look so troubled to me.
Heehee. Exacting justice isn't all sunshine and rainbows.
But you got to sell off info on Noble HIlls, didn't you.
Er... I'm not quite sure what you mean?
And couldn't you be a bit kinder to a poor office worker who lost her job to workplace circumstances?
So what? Just come back.
That's really mean. You certainly don't like me.
Why don't you just come back?
Eh!?
...To Narukozaka.
...You could join us again.
...Hmm~
What's with that smirk? Gross.
If you ask me, a Rei who's actually worrying about me is much more gross.
...Thanks.
...Whatever.
Just saying that because Fumika always looks busy.
Hmm, well, since you're offering. I can't do full-time, but I'll come in and help out every once in a while.
I might not look it, but I'm actually quite in demand.
Lots of companies have a need for my services.
From a light-fingered office drone who can't resist stealing corporate secrets?
Heheh, no, an ally of justice.
...So childish.
I prefer "pure of heart".
Serina turns to you.
Anyway, Commander, let's meet again another day.
Give my regards to everyone at Narukozaka for me.
Do it yourself. You'll be swinging by anyways.
Good point. Well, I'll see you two around.
Narukozaka Manufacturing · Maintenance Area
Commander, you're laaate.
Where'd you run off to~? On a date with an Actress~?
Aaah, geez–! Take me with you!
Good God, noisy as ever. What're yer here fer this time?
You're celebrating your victory over Noble Hills, right?
Lemme join! I am registered here.
Oh yeah, and introduce me to Narukozaka's Actresses, too.
You've got so many unique girls, everyone's worth taking pics of~
Yer not plannin' t' sniff around 'ere for some dumb reason or other?
Nah~
...Surely you don't think this whole incident has been wrapped up already, do you?
The score's been settled, n' we protected th' business.  Noble Hills's ruined.
Everythin's been put ta rights, yeh?
Noble Hills, AEGiS, Murakumo Industries...
There are people in those groups who engineered this latest interior breach, who tried to destroy Tokyo Shard by drawing Heavy-class Vice inside.
People at the top of the Actress industry, and in the heart of the Shard's defense organization.
People who worship the Vice as gods, and see humans as evil...
Oi, yer can't be sayin' that...
The cult devoted to the Vice, who call themselves "SIN"...
They've wormed their way into Tokyo Shard already...
